Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mi wi'i ɓe: “Taa aynooɓe maɓɓita dammuɗe Urusaliima sey to naaŋge ɓaŋgtake. Saa'i maɓɓugo boo, ɓe maɓɓa, ɓe pala ɗe hiddeko aynooɓe ngara koosa kuugal muuɗum'en. Koo'e aynooɓe caka jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima, ndarne woɗɓe haa pelle kuuɗe maɓɓe, woɗɓe boo yeeso cuuɗi maɓɓe.”
Fulfulde_DC: Mi wi'i ɓe: “Taa aynooɓe maɓɓita dammuɗe Urusaliima sey to naaŋge ɓaŋgtake. Saa'i maɓɓugo boo, ɓe maɓɓa, ɓe pala ɗe hiddeko aynooɓe ngara koosa kuugal muuɗum'en. Koo'e aynooɓe caka jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima, ndarne woɗɓe haa pelle kuuɗe maɓɓe, woɗɓe boo yeeso cuuɗi maɓɓe.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Wi beka hú̧í̧ nú garo Jerusalɛm nɛti ha̧ daŋa-wese na; ŋgimbi nɛ o wi-pɛm-nú garo tɛ hɔ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, o nú garo tɛ ɓɔn kànà nɛ̀ kpea-a keŋ. O bíí Jerusalɛm tɛ pɛm mɔ, kpai nɛ ŋmaa, o ŋma sɛn mgbák fara-pɛm-mɔ, ɓɛɛ o ŋma woyo sɛn nú tua kɔ‘i.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mi tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Wi beka hú̧í̧ nú garo Jerusalɛm nɛti ha̧ daŋa-wese na; ŋgimbi nɛ o wi-pɛm-nú garo tɛ hɔ hɔ̧ɔ̧ na, o nú garo tɛ ɓɔn kànà nɛ̀ kpea-a keŋ. O bíí Jerusalɛm tɛ pɛm mɔ, kpai nɛ ŋmaa, o ŋma sɛn mgbák fara-pɛm-mɔ, ɓɛɛ o ŋma woyo sɛn nú tua kɔ‘i.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma 'ya sha hɛ: «Kaghwene degha ta Zhɛrəzalɛm mbeli kentsəma kwəsərə we, ma hetɛhwɛɗi, pa mbeli ŋzlete hɛ le lakelɛ nda teslə ka ya ŋkwa te slene. Pa mbeli nteyi ka ya ŋkwa kevə kevə kezha ka Zhɛrəzalɛm, yayata wəndə te ŋkwa slene ta ŋkɛ ba'a yayata wəndə mɛ degha ta ŋkɛ.»
Tupurri: Ndi kal riñ rage gano: Jag faage ma Jerusalem bul wo go tañgu maga mboëay bay holge gaa, day aè teçg ra go de manyaçaç de nen äay. Jar Jerusalem gor ge wo ngeele, wosela äuy ti ngeel äe, wosela äuy jag tiñ ni äe.

Francais: Or la ville était spacieuse et grande, mais il n'y avait que peu d'habitants au milieu d'elle, et toutes les maisons n'étaient pas rebâties.
Anglais: Now the city was large and great: but the people were few therein, and the houses were not builded.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hoyok-ziyn goy beɗiya, ŋolo kaw, may sumun hayam kiɗaya, ziyn may ini kuloɗi kaw.
Bulu: Tison é mbe ndam a anen, ve teke bôt abui; menda fe me mbe teke nlôñan.
Guiziga: Walahaya i madiɗa, yo naŋ fuk fuko ma gar, amma mizli ngi raˀahaya so na, taŋ neˀkinihi. Hayay kwana i manja ndirey aruŋ ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Berniwol mawni, yaaji, ammaa jooɗiiɓe ton ɗuuɗaay. Ɓe nyiɓtaay cuuɗi tawon.
Fulfulde_DC: Berniwol mawni, yaaji, ammaa jooɗiiɓe ton ɗuuɗaay. Ɓe nyiɓtaay cuuɗi tawon.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Jerusalɛm duka so nɛ́ gasa ye nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ bíí dɔk sɛnɛ na; wa tɛ mbo o tua woyo hɔ̧ɔ̧ na mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Jerusalɛm duka so nɛ́ gasa ye nyɛmna, ɓɛɛ bíí dɔk sɛnɛ na; wa tɛ mbo o tua woyo hɔ̧ɔ̧ na mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ya kwela nza meleme ta Zhɛrəzalɛm kewəbanyɛ ba'a kebezlenyɛ ne, ɓɛhwɛ mbeli nyi mbe le nza. Kenaka kweci ghɛ kaŋate geva we.
Tupurri: Äi leegen hay de diy lay, hay kluu lay ane jar bay äil äe debañ wa, tiñ hay bay wo de boorge ni wa lay.

Francais: Mon Dieu me mit au coeur d'assembler les grands, les magistrats et le peuple, pour en faire le dénombrement. Je trouvai un registre généalogique de ceux qui étaient montés les premiers, et j'y vis écrit ce qui suit:
Anglais: And my God put into mine heart to gather together the nobles, and the rulers, and the people, that they might be reckoned by genealogy. And I found a register of the genealogy of them which came up at the first, and found written therein,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lawna vanu vulan varta kay nan tok sa ŋulona, sa ɗiger-lawta hiɗi sumun kaf, kay li ŋaɓta visi goyo. Nan fi ɗerwelda ta ŋaɓta vi jafna vi sa kali kulo hay Yerusalem sem ma jewna ka hayta, kayni mi va ma nan fum ɗoy haya:
Bulu: Nde Zambe wom a nga futi ôsimesan e nleme wom été ya sulane benya bôtô, bivet a jama bôte na me lañe be. Me nga yene kalate bindane bi bôt be nga taté bet, a koone ntilane na.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Buymisemuŋ ɗu a ciy wuluk keŋ a hirnga ɓa i kuso mizli madiɗa ngi buyoy ati buyoyo waɗ mizli mekelemey gar, ɓa ngi toho slimiɗ ngi mizli gar. I luuma ɗerewol mutohoko slimiɗ ngi mizli dumbuŋ zleˀe mumoko tir li mihilaka taŋ nga diga na. Yo ar ɗerewol nah na, a tohoko mingiɓi ani:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Allah hokki yam numo, mi mooɓti mawɓe e kaliifa'en e ummaatoore ngam haa mi winnda inɗe maɓɓe fodde asli maɓɓe. Mi tawi deftere asli aartuɓe wartugo. Ndaa ko winnda nder maare :
Fulfulde_DC: Allah hokki yam numo, mi mooɓti mawɓe e kaliifa'en e ummaatoore ngam haa mi winnda inɗe maɓɓe fodde asli maɓɓe. Mi tawi deftere asli aartuɓe wartugo. Ndaa ko winnda nder maare :
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m ha̧a̧ ŋma taamɔ ha̧‘m mɛ mɔi̧ o dita-bíí, o gasawi in dukbíí, ha̧‘m mɛ tɔr wa. Mi kpaa kalata-tɔra-bíí ko o wi nɛ hɔɔ so nɛ ti. Mɔ nɛ wa yɔra sɛnɛ n'am tɔra nɛ mɔ'ɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ kɔ‘m ha̧a̧ ŋma taamɔ ha̧‘m mɛ mɔi̧ o dita-bíí, o gasawi in dukbíí, ha̧‘m mɛ tɔr wa. Mi kpaa kalata-tɔra-bíí ko o wi nɛ hɔɔ so nɛ ti. Mɔ nɛ wa yɔra sɛnɛ n'am tɔra nɛ mɔ'ɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Shala ta ɗa veyi ɗa zəzə kwa wənə kezha tsene mbelia jama, ka meha ghwə le kweci mbeli nyi ketene kezha rafete ŋkwa mbeli. Pa 'ya newakɛ palepa nya nza sləa mbeli nyi keghate kazhɛneke geva se hwa ŋkwa, pa 'ya kemave ɓela ta nci kala nya:
Tupurri: Baa äin raw kañge ne ndi äil ga ndi mo tay jar kluurin wo, jar car kiidan wo de jar ma äuyn wo ma kee rage. Ndi raw da' ëu jar maga hay fer wo le tañgu de yerge go ti moobe ta' ta' äil kefder gano:

Francais: Voici les gens de la province qui revinrent de l'exil -- ceux que Nabuchodonosor, roi de Babylone, avait emmenés captifs, et qui retournèrent à Jérusalem et en Juda, chacun dans sa ville, --
Anglais: These are the children of the province, that went up out of the captivity, of those that had been carried away, whom Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon had carried away, and came again to Jerusalem and to Judah, every one unto his city;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si nisi sa hay nagata sa hotay hay gorvota pana, nisi sa Nebukadnesar mulla vi Babilon yawsi goy gorvo'o, sa hotay hay Yerusalem hay Yuda, gigekaw hay hoyok-ziyna valamu valamu.
Bulu: Bôte ya éfuse si ya Yuda be nga so minkôm, mbe Nébukatnétzar, njô bôte ya Babilôn, a nga kee be, a mbe be nga bulan e Yérusalém a e Yuda, môt ase e tisone jé.
Guiziga: Mizli mijahay nga hirwuy Zuda, Nabukodonozor, buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ mija taŋ zleˀe, mumoko nga Zeruzalem, hirwuy Zuda na, slimiɗ ngi mizli mekelemey a wuzla t'ani: Mbur gar na, a mo ng'ar walahay naŋ walahay naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa limtuki yimɓe iwɓe lesdi Yahuuda, wartuɓe diga daheeki. Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila dahino ɓe. Ɓe kooti Urusaliima e Yahuuda, koo moy haa wuro muuɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa limtuki yimɓe iwɓe lesdi Yahuuda, wartuɓe diga daheeki. Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila dahino ɓe. Ɓe kooti Urusaliima e Yahuuda, koo moy haa wuro muuɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «O ŋma bíí nɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ baa kai so yaknɛ nɛ bara-biro pia ɗoŋ. Wa pia pii Jerusalɛm in nù Juda, kóó o ndé pii saaye kɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «O ŋma bíí nɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ baa kai so yaknɛ nɛ bara-biro pia ɗoŋ. Wa pia pii Jerusalɛm in nù Juda, kóó o ndé pii saaye kɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma hwa mbeli nyi fəhwe Nabəkodonozor, meghea ka Babilone kaka mavashi ne, kwele kwele nyi kezhɛne geva kadzembe Zhɛrəzalɛm ba'a hɛɗia Zhəwda. Yayata wəndə kazhɛne geva kadzembe meleme ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ keege jar ma ti prog Juda maga hay fer wo le, diñ jar maga Nebukanetsar wañ Babilon hay hoo ra wo go ti dañgay day fer wo le Jerusalem wo de sir Juda mono, wosela äuy äi leege äe.

Francais: qui revinrent avec Zorobabel, Josué, Néhémie, Azarias, Raamias, Nahamani, Mardochée, Belsan, Mespharath, Bégoaî, Nahum, Baana:
Anglais: Who came with Zerubbabel, Jeshua, Nehemiah, Azariah, Raamiah, Nahamani, Mordecai, Bilshan, Mispar, Bigvai, Nehum, Baanah. The number, I say, of the men of the people of Israel was this;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi hotay hiɗi Zorobabel, Yosuwa, Nehemiya, Azariya, Raamiya, Nahamani, Mardose, Bilsan, Misperet, Bigvay, Nehum, Baana. Ŋaɓta vi jufayna jar sa Israyel kaf kayni:
Bulu: Be nga so ba be Zôrôbabél, Yasua, Néhémie, Azaria, Raamia, Nahamani, Mardôsé, Bilkan, Misperét, Bignayi, Nehum, Baana. Tañe befame ya bôte yʼIsraél:
Guiziga: Taŋ mumoko na, ngi mbuŋ taŋhay i ti: Zorobabel, Yesuwa, Nehemiya, Azariya, Raˀamiya, Nahamani, Mordokay, Bilesaŋ, Misperet, Bikvay, Nehum waɗ Baˀana. Yo mizli Israyeley vuna, slimiɗ taŋhay anihĩ:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ngartidi bee Zorobaabila e Yeesu'a e Nehemiya e Azariya e Ra'amiya Nahamani e Mardokay e Bilsan e Misperet e Biguway e Nehum e Ba'ana. Ndaa limgal Isra'iila'en :
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ngartidi bee Zorobaabila e Yeesu'a e Nehemiya e Azariya e Ra'amiya Nahamani e Mardokay e Bilsan e Misperet e Biguway e Nehum e Ba'ana. Ndaa limgal Isra'iila'en :
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa pia in Zorobabɛl, Yesua, Nehemii, Azaria, Ramia, Nahamani, Mɔrdɔkai, Bilsaŋ, Mispɛrɛt, Bigbai, Nɛhum in Baana. Dɔka o be  Israɛl  nɛ pia so'i nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa pia in Zorobabɛl, Yesua, Nehemii, Azaria, Ramia, Nahamani, Mɔrdɔkai, Bilsaŋ, Mispɛrɛt, Bigbai, Nɛhum in Baana. Dɔka o be  Israɛl  nɛ pia so'i nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
Kapsiki_DC: Mbeli nyi te ghəa nci ne, yɛ Zorobabɛl, Yɛshəwa, Nɛhɛmi, Azariya, Ramiya, Nahamani, Mordokay, Bileshan, Mispɛrɛt, Bigvay, Nehəwm ba'a Ba'ana. Wa nyi sləa nci le ɓela ta zhilia ka Israyɛl nyi:
Tupurri: AÀ hay fer wo le wer Sorobabel, Josuwe, Nehemi, Asariya, Raamiya, Nahamani, Mardose, Bilkan, Mispered, Bigfay, Nehum wo de Baana. Keege werpiiri ma Israyeln wo:

Francais: Nombre des hommes du peuple d'Israël : les fils de Pharsos, deux mille cent soixante-douze;
Anglais: The children of Parosh, two thousand an hundred seventy and two.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Parewos birim ma' hiɗi kis kalam dok-siɗiya yam ma',
Bulu: bone be Paréôk: 2172;
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Parosoy: zileye durmuk cuw ti mizli skat ti kukur tarnaˀ nga cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Par'os, yimɓe ujine ɗiɗo e teemerre e cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e ɗiɗo (2.172).
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Par'os, yimɓe ujine ɗiɗo e teemerre e cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e ɗiɗo (2.172).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Nú-gara ko Parɔs nɛ́ bíí 2.172;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Nú-gara ko Parɔs nɛ́ bíí 2.172;
Kapsiki_DC: zhili nyi kwa peləa Parosh: 2.172,
Tupurri: Jar ni Pareos wo ndar äog de jar kis ti äe do renam ti äoge.

Francais: les fils de Phahath-Moab, des fils de Josué et de Joab, deux mille huit cent dix-huit;

BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurona vi Pahat-Mowab, jar gurona vi Yosuwa hiɗi Yowab, birim ma' hiɗi kis-glafandi kalam doogo yam glafandi;
Bulu: bone be Pahat-Môab, ba be Yasua a ba be Yôab: 2818;
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Pahat-Moˀapay, mbiɗeˀvra, muy ngi Yesuwahay ati ngi Yoˀapay: ziley durmuk cuw ti skat skat dangafaɗ ti mizli kuruˀ nga dangafaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Pahat-Mo'ab, waato danygol Yeesu'a e Yo'ab, yimɓe ujine ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njoweetato e sappo e ɗiɗo (2.812).
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Pahat-Mo'ab, waato danygol Yeesu'a e Yo'ab, yimɓe ujine ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njoweetato e sappo e ɗiɗo (2.812).

KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Pahat-Mɔab, mɛ nɛ wen nɛ tɔ̧, o bezaŋ Yesua in Yɔab nɛ́ 2.818;

Anglais: The children of Solomon's servants: the children of Sotai, the children of Sophereth, the children of Perida,

KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «O bezaŋ o wi-de-tom ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ o bíí nú-gara ko Sotai, ko Sɔfɛrɛt, o bem ko Pɛrida;
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya tsetse wəvəsəa ka shihɛnyɛa ka mene slene ta Salomon: ŋwalea yɛ Sotay, Sofɛrɛt, Perida,
Tupurri: Jar ni weere joçoçre Salomoñ wo: Jar ni Sotay wo, jar ni Sofered wo, jar ni Perida wo,

Francais: les fils de Saphatias, les fils de Hatil, les fils de Phochéreth-Asebaïm, les fils d'Amon.
Anglais: The children of Shephatiah, the children of Hattil, the children of Pochereth of Zebaim, the children of Amon.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurona vi Sefatiya, gurona vi Hattil, gurona vi Pokeret-Hatsebayim, gurona vi Amon,
Bulu: bone be Sefatia, bone bʼAtil, bone be Pôkérét-Atsebayim, bone bʼAmon.
Guiziga: dideˀ ngi Sefatiyahay ati ngi Hatiley, ngi Pokeret-Hasebayimey waɗ ngi Amoŋhoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__

KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Sɛfatia, ko Hatil, ko Pokɛrɛt-Hasɛbayim, ká bá nɛ̀ ko Amɔŋ.

Tupurri: Jar ni Sefatiya wo, jar ni Hatil wo, jar ni Pokered-Hatsebayim wo, jar ni Amoñ wo.

Francais: Total des Nathinéens et des fils des serviteurs de Salomon : trois cent quatre-vingt-douze.
Anglais: All the Nethinims, and the children of Solomon's servants, were three hundred ninety and two.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: tapta vi sa Netiniyena hiɗi gurona vi sa sunda vi Salomon: Kis-ɦidi kalam dok-zleeŋe yam ma'.
Bulu: Benétinieñ bese a bone bebo bisaé be Solômon 392.
Guiziga: Gawla ngi Salomoŋhoy gar ati dideˀ ngi gawla naŋhay gar na, taŋ: skat skat makir ti mizli kukur ngoltir nga cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal huuwooɓe kuuɗe pamare nder haykaliiru e danygol jeyaaɓe Suleymaanu fuu, teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe njoweenayo e ɗiɗo (392).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal huuwooɓe kuuɗe pamare nder haykaliiru e danygol jeyaaɓe Suleymaanu fuu, teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe njoweenayo e ɗiɗo (392).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «O geɗek wi-de-tom sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ in o bezaŋ o wi-de-tom ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ bíí 392.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «O geɗek wi-de-tom sɛn kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ in o bezaŋ o wi-de-tom ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ bíí 392.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛa wəvəsəa ka mene slene mbe ghɛa Shala le ka shihɛnyɛa ka mene slene ta Salomon ne, zhili gwəmsə mahekene ba'a meslimsə bakeghəmbe.
Tupurri: Jar Netiniyeçeç wo de jar ni weere joçoçre Salomoñ tay wo äuy kiskis swa' ti äe do kaawa' ti äoge.

Francais: Voici ceux qui partirent de Thel-Mêla, Thel-Harsa, Chérub, Addon et Emmer, et qui ne purent pas faire connaître leur maison paternelle et leur race, pour montrer qu'ils étaient d'Israël:
Anglais: And these were they which went up also from Tel–melah, Tel–harsha, Cherub, Addon, and Immer: but they could not shew their father's house, nor their seed, whether they were of Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si nisi sa may goy hay Tel-Mela pa, Tel-Harsa pa, Kerub-Addon pa, hiɗi Immer, sa asay kay ɗek goy kay ziyna visiɗi, ɗek goy kay jafna visiɗi, la nisi si Israyella kla:
Bulu: Bana be ne bôt be nga so Tél-Méla, Tél-Arka, Kerub-Adôn a Imér, mbe be nga kate liti na nda bôte jap a mvoñe bôte jap be mbe Israél:
Guiziga: Mizli ada, a soko baɗ ti ruwuy Tel-Mela, Tel-Harsa, ti Kerup-Adoŋ waɗ ti Imer. Mizli tayna, ɓa a bigaka zliv i dideˀ taŋhay i muy ngi Israyeley gisiŋ kwa na, a si na ka ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi boo warɓe diga Tel-Melaha e Tel-Harsa e Kerub-Addon e Immer, ɓe mbaawaay wi'ugo to ci'e maɓɓe iwi haa Isra'iila malla naa non.
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi boo warɓe diga Tel-Melaha e Tel-Harsa e Kerub-Addon e Immer, ɓe mbaawaay wi'ugo to ci'e maɓɓe iwi haa Isra'iila malla naa non.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «O wi nɛ tɛɛ nɛ Tɛl-Mɛla, nɛ Tɛl-Harsa, nɛ Kɛrub, nɛ Adɔŋ in Imɛr nɛ nyɛm so mɛ iŋ‘e nutua ko dáà kɔ‘i in dùk kɔ‘i nɛ́  Israɛl  na, nɛ́
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «O wi nɛ tɛɛ nɛ Tɛl-Mɛla, nɛ Tɛl-Harsa, nɛ Kɛrub, nɛ Adɔŋ in Imɛr nɛ nyɛm so mɛ iŋ‘e nutua ko dáà kɔ‘i in dùk kɔ‘i nɛ́  Israɛl  na, nɛ́
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbeli nyi kezhɛneke geva se mbe mava same kwa Tɛl-Mɛla, Tɛl-Harsha, Kerəwb-Adon ba'a Imɛr ne, keleke ghena hɛ tiɗiɗi te hwelefe ta ka shihɛ nci kezha ɗepete kenza ŋkɛ kaka Israyɛl hɛ we:
Tupurri: Mokay diñ keege jar maga sen hoo wo le Tel-Mela, Tel-Harka, Kerub-Adon wo de Imere, day kaçaç wo ma ko feele mani äaaran wo de ëu moore äaara wo ma kañ nen ga saara diñ jar Israyel gaa mono:

Francais: les fils de Dalaïas, les fils de Tobie, les fils de Nécoda, six cent quarante-deux.
Anglais: The children of Delaiah, the children of Tobiah, the children of Nekoda, six hundred forty and two.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Delaya, gurona vi Tobiya, gurona vi Nekoda, kis-karkiya kalam dok-fiɗi yam ma'.
Bulu: Bone be Delaya, bone be Tôbiya, bone be Nékôda 642.
Guiziga: I Dideˀ ngi Delayahay ati ngi Tobiyahay waɗ ngi Nekodahay: ziley skat skat merkeɗ ti kukur mufaɗ nga cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɗum danygol Delaya e Tobiya e Nekoda, worɓe teemeɗɗe njoweego e cappanɗe nayo e ɗiɗo (642).
Fulfulde_DC: Ɗum danygol Delaya e Tobiya e Nekoda, worɓe teemeɗɗe njoweego e cappanɗe nayo e ɗiɗo (642).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Delaya, ko Tobia in ko Nɛkɔda; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ 642.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Delaya, ko Tobia in ko Nɛkɔda; wa lɛŋ nɛ́ 642.
Kapsiki_DC: ma pɛtɛa nci ne, gwəmsə ŋkwaŋe ba'a wəfaɗemsə bakeghəmbe hɛ, kaŋwalea yɛ Delaya, Tobiya le Nekoda hɛ.
Tupurri: Jar ni Delaya wo, jar ni Tobiya wo de jar ni Nekoda wo kiskis hiira' ti äe do naa ti äoge.

Francais: Et parmi les prêtres : les fils de Habia, les fils d'Accos, les fils de Berzellaï, qui avait pris pour femme une des filles de Berzellaï, le Galaadite, et fut appelé de leur nom.
Anglais: And of the priests: the children of Habaiah, the children of Koz, the children of Barzillai, which took one of the daughters of Barzillai the Gileadite to wife, and was called after their name.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jar muliyan-sa-ɗifinna kaw: Gurona vi Hobaya, gurona vi Hakkos, gurona vi Barzilay, ma sli goot-cat kep jar guro-boyna vi Barzilay ma Galaadna, nisi yisi hiɗi semda va'a
Bulu: Ba ya betuni: bone bʼÔbaya, bone bʼAkôt, bone be Barsilayi, nyô a nga luʼu ngone Barsilayi môte ya Galad, a nye a nga yôbane jôé dap.
Guiziga: Mekelemey a wuzla masayaya kwana i ti: dideˀ ngi Hobayahay ati ngi Hakosoy waɗ ngi Barzilayay. Barzilay hana a zuɓ ngi ngwasa i zuŋ ngi wuzla ziri mongoso ngi Barzilayay, mbur Galaˀat. A zilaka Barzilay na aseˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Caka liman'en boo: Danygol Hobaya e danygol Koos e danygol Barjillay. O inndinaama Barjillay ngam kaaka maako ɓaŋgno ɓiɗɗo debbo diga danygol Barjillay mo Gile'at.
Fulfulde_DC: Caka liman'en boo: Danygol Hobaya e danygol Koos e danygol Barjillay. O inndinaama Barjillay ngam kaaka maako ɓaŋgno ɓiɗɗo debbo diga danygol Barjillay mo Gile'at.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Sɛka o ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ nú-gara ko Hɔbaya, ko Hakɔs in ko Barzilai a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ hegɔ mbɛt. Barzilai bo nɛ mgbák nin-a na; a̧ baa so nɛ́ nin for-aa nɛ duka so nɛ́ ŋma be Galad.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Sɛka o ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ nú-gara ko Hɔbaya, ko Hakɔs in ko Barzilai a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ hegɔ mbɛt. Barzilai bo nɛ mgbák nin-a na; a̧ baa so nɛ́ nin for-aa nɛ duka so nɛ́ ŋma be Galad.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kweci ka dzeghe Shala ne, mbe pelə nya kwetɛŋe hɛ: ka shihɛnyɛa Hobaya, ŋa Hakos ba'a ŋa Barzilay. Ma nda hekate nda slə mbeli kala nya ke nde keɗaŋe nya ne, va nya wəmeve kwete ŋkɛ hwa ŋwalea kwɛa Barzilay, nde Gala'ad.
Tupurri: Day yoo jar sië jagn wo mo lay no diñ: Jar ni Hobaya wo, jar ni Hakos wo, jar ni Barsilayi maga hay da waçy yoo mayre mani Barsilayi je Galadn wo day aè ëen de ëu äe mono.

Francais: Ils cherchèrent leur titre attestant leurs généalogies, mais on ne le trouva point. Ils furent déclarés impurs et exclus du sacerdoce,
Anglais: These sought their register among those that were reckoned by genealogy, but it was not found: therefore were they, as polluted, put from the priesthood.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi gar ɗerwelda vi ŋaɓta vi jafna visiya, may nisi may faɗi. Nala nisi patay goyo hay lop ɗifinna,
Bulu: Be nga jeñe bindane biap, ve teke yene bie. Ajô te be nji fe beta saé ésaé betuni.
Guiziga: Mizli tayna a sipaka ɗerewol ngi slimiɗ ngi dideˀ taŋhaya gar gar, ko a lumaka ta. Dar mizli a njikaka taŋ di kpah ar li babara, a ɓaka taŋ: taŋ i mizli misi dilihey, mubahay le avra tir slra ngi mikuli.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Liman'en ɓe'e ɗaɓɓiti inɗe muuɗum'en nder defte asli muuɗum'en, ammaa ɓe tawaay ɗe. Ngam maajum ɓe ngurtinaama kuugal limanku.
Fulfulde_DC: Liman'en ɓe'e ɗaɓɓiti inɗe muuɗum'en nder defte asli muuɗum'en, ammaa ɓe tawaay ɗe. Ngam maajum ɓe ngurtinaama kuugal limanku.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i kia so mɔ zaŋ kalata tugun nam kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa kpa nin-wa na. Hegɔ, ɓɛɛ o bíí fo wa yinɛ tɛ tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧, wen wa'e war-tɛ-wa sa̧ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i kia so mɔ zaŋ kalata tugun nam kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa kpa nin-wa na. Hegɔ, ɓɛɛ o bíí fo wa yinɛ tɛ tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧, wen wa'e war-tɛ-wa sa̧ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa zele palepa nyi nza sləa ka shihɛ nci mbe hɛ ne, kekemave ŋkɛ hɛ we. Vatse zhɛrete hɛ mbeli kambeli nyi wale wale ba'a fɛake hɛ mbeli kemene slene ta dzeghe Shala.
Tupurri: Saara kië wo wer mani äaaran wo äil kefder wo, ama saara laa da' rage gaè. AÀ raw nii rage go ti siëgi jag no.

Francais: et le gouverneur leur interdit de manger des choses très saintes, jusqu'à ce que le prêtre se levât pour consulter Dieu par l'Urim et le Thummim.
Anglais: And the Tirshatha said unto them, that they should not eat of the most holy things, till there stood up a priest with Urim and Thummim.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nala guverner di tisiya kay nisi ma ti sle ma suwi peldetnaɗi, ta-ta mul-ma-ɗifin mara kep ɗuw Urim* hiɗi Tumim* tuwa.
Bulu: Ngovina a nga jô be na be bo te beta di biôm bia dañ étyi, akekui ntuni éziñ a tatéya yemelan nkômbane Zambe a zene ya Urim a tumim.
Guiziga: Buy miwi li a ɓa taŋ, ɗaf ngi mikuli  mipal   wãˀ da Buymisemuŋ na, anja taŋ a zumam ta, hã masay mujuwa le a mevele ngi mucufuɗa Buymisemuŋ ti  Urim ati tumim   ɗagay far.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngomna wi'i ɓe, taa ɓe nyaama kuuje ɓurɗe senaago, sey to limanjo mawɗo ta'i haala ka'a bee uriima e tumiima .
Fulfulde_DC: Ngomna wi'i ɓe, taa ɓe nyaama kuuje ɓurɗe senaago, sey to limanjo mawɗo ta'i haala ka'a bee uriima e tumiima .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wi-duk-zu nù dora mɔɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nú-wa, hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ Urim in Tumim sɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wi-duk-zu nù dora mɔɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nú-wa, hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ Urim in Tumim sɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋgwamna le ghəa ŋkɛ geze nda ke hɛ kezha ɗema hɛ zeme wəshi gəmə nyi keveyi geva tekeleke kaŋa Shala nahe, nda teslate kwasheghediɗi nde dzeghe Shala laka yɛ Əwrim le Təwmim.
Tupurri: Je waçaç ree progn raw riñ rage ga aà mo ree wo feçeçre ma bay ëagn wo wa ëa, say je sië jag po mo wii jag Urim wo de Tumim wo ëa.

Francais: L'assemblée tout entière était de quarante-deux mille trois cent soixante personnes,
Anglais: The whole congregation together was forty and two thousand three hundred and threescore,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tokŋa vi sumun kaf ir birim dok-fiɗi yam ma' hiɗi diram kis-ɦidi kalam dok-karkiya,
Bulu: Bôte bese be mbe 42360.
Guiziga: Mizli musoko tayna ti ruwuy mulak na, taˀ taŋ gara: mizli durmuk kukur mufaɗ nga cuw ti mizli skat skat makir ti kukur merkeɗ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal yimɓe jama'aare fuu waɗi ujine cappanɗe nayo e ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe njoweego (42.360).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal yimɓe jama'aare fuu waɗi ujine cappanɗe nayo e ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe njoweego (42.360).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «O bíí nɛ mɔi̧a lɛŋ nɛ́ bíí 42.360;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «O bíí nɛ mɔi̧a lɛŋ nɛ́ bíí 42.360;
Kapsiki_DC: Jikə ta ka Israyɛl nyi keshave mbe mava pɛtɛ ne, mbeli 42.360,
Tupurri: Ngaäa jarn äuy hay ndar do naa ti äog de jar kiskis swa' ti äe do hiira'a.

Francais: sans compter leurs serviteurs et leurs servantes, qui étaient au nombre de sept mille trois cent trente-sept; parmi eux se trouvaient deux cent quarante cinq chanteurs et chanteuses.
Anglais: Beside their manservants and their maidservants, of whom there were seven thousand three hundred thirty and seven: and they had two hundred forty and five singing men and singing women.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sa sunda visi sa jufayna hiɗi sa boyna may ŋaɓay hayɗi, nisi ir birim siɗiya hiɗi kis-ɦidi kalam dok-ɦidi yam siɗiya. Jarsiya jufayna hiɗi boyna sa gi nulla ka kis-ma' kalam dok-fiɗi yam vasl, nisi ka hiɗi kulumay kis-siɗiya kalam dok-ɦidi yam karkiya, kulumay-besna kis-ma' kalam dok-fiɗi yam vasl may.
Bulu: Te lañe bebo bisaé bap be ne befam a ba be ne binga tañe bôte 7337. E bôte bete été beyia bia, befam a binga, be mbe 245. Bikabela bi mbe 736, bemulé 245;
Guiziga: mbak gawla migi slra taŋhay ati ngwas migi slra taŋhaya le. Taŋ kwana, jom gara mizli durmuk tarnaˀ ti mizli skat skat makir ti kukur makir nga tarnaˀ, yo mizli dimiseye, ziley ati ngwasaya, taŋ mizli skat skat cuw ti kukur mufaɗ nga zlum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ngoodi maccuɓe e horɓe nder jama'aare. Limgal maɓɓe waɗi ujine njoweeɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe tato e njoweeɗiɗo (7.337). Ɓe ngoodi boo yimooɓe worɓe e rewɓe teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo e cappanɗe nayo e njowo (245)
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ngoodi maccuɓe e horɓe nder jama'aare. Limgal maɓɓe waɗi ujine njoweeɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe tato e njoweeɗiɗo (7.337). Ɓe ngoodi boo yimooɓe worɓe e rewɓe teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo e cappanɗe nayo e njowo (245)
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o wiwii in o kó-de-tom kɔ-wa bo zaŋ-aa na: wa nɛ́ bíí 7.337; wiwii in o kó-bii-gima nɛ́ 245.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o wiwii in o kó-de-tom kɔ-wa bo zaŋ-aa na: wa nɛ́ bíí 7.337; wiwii in o kó-bii-gima nɛ́ 245.
Kapsiki_DC: kaɗema mbeli keɓelate ka mene slene le ka kwaterashi nyi ka 7.337, ka gha cimə nyi kazhili le nyi mi gwəmsə bake ba'a wəfaɗemsə mcɛfeghəmbe ya va hɛ,
Tupurri: Sen na aè bay de kee weere joçoçre äaaran wo de mayre gebere äaara maga hay wo ndar renam de jar kiskis swa' ti äe do swa' ti renam wo ni wa. Yoo äaara ni jar 'wad siñ ma twerpiiri de ma tenaare hay wo kiskis äog ti äe do naa ti dwee. Piiri äaara hay wo kiskis renam ti äe do swa' ti hiira'a, gerheçeçre wayla äaara hay wo kiskis äog ti äe do naa ti dwee.

Francais: Ils avaient sept cent trente-six chevaux, deux cent quarante-cinq mulets,
Anglais: Their horses, seven hundred thirty and six: their mules, two hundred forty and five:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lamgana kis-fiɗi hiɗi diram dok-ɦidi yam vasl, kurona birim karkiya hiɗi kis-siɗiya kalam dok-ma'.
Bulu: bekamel 435 a bijakase 6720.
Guiziga: Taŋ ti zlogomohoy skat skat mufaɗ ti kukur makir nga zlum waɗ zunguhoy durmuk merkeɗ ti skat skat tarnaˀ ti kukur cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e geelooɗi teemeɗɗe nayi e cappanɗe tati e jowi (435) e bamɗe ujine joweego e teemeɗɗe joweeɗiɗi e noogas (6.720).
Fulfulde_DC: e geelooɗi teemeɗɗe nayi e cappanɗe tati e jowi (435) e bamɗe ujine joweego e teemeɗɗe joweeɗiɗi e noogas (6.720).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dɔka nyaŋa nɛ́ 736, sunda nɛ́ 245, ŋgeloba nɛ́ 435 ɓɛɛ o tuifuu 6.720.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dɔka nyaŋa nɛ́ 736, sunda nɛ́ 245, ŋgeloba nɛ́ 435 ɓɛɛ o tuifuu 6.720.
Kapsiki_DC: tsagha zlegweməa lɛmə gwəmsə wəfaɗe ba'a mahekenemsə mcɛfeghəmbe ba'a kwara lɛmə 6.720.
Tupurri: Yoñyoñ wo kiskis naa ti äe do swa' ti dwee, gerheçeçre wo ndar hiira' ti äe kiskis renam de gerheçeçre do äoge.

Francais: quatre cent trente cinq chameaux et six mille sept cent vingt ânes.
Anglais: Their camels, four hundred thirty and five: six thousand seven hundred and twenty asses.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa ŋulona vi jafna ŋolo li vulda kay lopna. Guvernera vul gurjuta ta ora ir birim ɗaw', ŋalayta dok-vasl, sligar-tuwna ma cukum kay li ɗifinna ir kis-vasl kalam dok-ɦidi.
Bulu: Abui minlô ya menda me bôt mi nga ve biôm asu bisaé melôñ. Asu nkobe ya melôñ, ngovina a nga ve bedrakme be or toyini; bilaé mewôm metan; melôʼô, asu betuni, mintete mitan a mewôm mela.
Guiziga: Mizli cah a wuzla buy ngi hayay, a vulam gwat ngi gi slra ngi ndira hay ngi Buymisemuŋ. Buy miwi li a vul ng'ar sunduruk ngir hay Buymisemuŋ, ɓiri tapasl tapasl durmuk, sikiɗ ngi pusla mbaazla ngi mezegweley kukur zlum, zana ngi masayay skat skat zlum ti kukur makir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woɗɓe caka baaba-ci'e'en ndokki jawdi ngam kuugal nyiɓtaago. Ngomna waati haa ndesaari ceede kaŋŋeeri ujineere e taasaaje cappanɗe jowi e toggooje limanku teemeɗɗe jowi e cappanɗe tati (530).
Fulfulde_DC: Woɗɓe caka baaba-ci'e'en ndokki jawdi ngam kuugal nyiɓtaago. Ngomna waati haa ndesaari ceede kaŋŋeeri ujineere e taasaaje cappanɗe jowi e toggooje limanku teemeɗɗe jowi e cappanɗe tati (530).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «O ŋma gasawi nutua ha̧a̧ mɔ wen tom. Wi-duk-zu nù ha̧a̧ kɔya-lɔr booro, yee ɓu-mɔɔrɔ in laa gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-nɛ-ɓu-taar wen o wi-dafi-sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «O ŋma gasawi nutua ha̧a̧ mɔ wen tom. Wi-duk-zu nù ha̧a̧ kɔya-lɔr booro, yee ɓu-mɔɔrɔ in laa gɔmŋmaa-mɔɔrɔ-nɛ-ɓu-taar wen o wi-dafi-sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa kweci mbelia jama nyi kwa yita fəke wəshi gəmə kezha zhɛne kaŋa ghɛa Shala. Pa ŋgwamna veyi dəɓərəa mze kwa tere tere slibə, yɛ helape mcɛfemsə ba'a yɛ lekwesa ta ka dzeghe Shala gwəmsə mcɛfe ba'a mahekenemsə.
Tupurri: Wañre ma ti feele wo debañ haç wo feçeçre ma kay joñren wo. Je waçaç ree progn haç solay boo biñni ndare, tasa wo do dwee, OÇoçbe ma joñre siigi jag wo kiskis dwee ti äe do swa' ma kay joñren wo.

Francais: Plusieurs des chefs de famille firent des dons pour l'oeuvre. Le gouverneur donna au trésor mille dariques d'or, cinquante coupes, cinq cent trente tuniques sacerdotales.
Anglais: And some of the chief of the fathers gave unto the work. The Tirshatha gave to the treasure a thousand drams of gold, fifty basins, five hundred and thirty priests' garments.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa ŋulona vi jafna vul kay lopna gurjuta ta ora ir birim dok-ma' hiɗi gurjuta ta minna* birim ma' hiɗi kis-ma'.
Bulu: Minlô ya menda me bôt mi nga ve bedrakme be or toyini mewôm mebaé asu nkobe melôñ a bemine be argent toyini ébaé a mintete mibaé.
Guiziga: Mizli mekelemey a wuzla buy ngi hayay mitaˀ taˀa, a vulam gwatay ngi gi slra ngi ndira hay ngi Buymisemuŋ, ɓiri tapasl tapasl durmuk kukur cuw, waɗ ɓiri bara durmuk cuw ti skat skat cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woɗɓe caka baaba-ci'e'en mbaati haa ndesaari kuugal: Ceede kaŋŋeeri ujine noogas e cardi baakin kilo ujineere e teemerre (1.100).
Fulfulde_DC: Woɗɓe caka baaba-ci'e'en mbaati haa ndesaari kuugal: Ceede kaŋŋeeri ujine noogas e cardi baakin kilo ujineere e teemerre (1.100).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Mɔ nɛ o gasawi nutua nɔ‘i ha̧a̧ nɛ́ kɔya-lɔr booro-ɓu-yiitoo in kilo bu-mbɔi booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Mɔ nɛ o gasawi nutua nɔ‘i ha̧a̧ nɛ́ kɔya-lɔr booro-ɓu-yiitoo in kilo bu-mbɔi booro-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa;
Kapsiki_DC: Pa kweci mbelia jama nyi kwa yita fəke dəɓərəa mze kwa tere tere 20.000 ba'a kiləwəa mze kwa ghwə ghwə 1.100 kawəshi gəmə.
Tupurri: Wañre ma ti feelen haç wo solay boo biñni ndar äoge, solay boo ni ndar ti äe kis ma kay joñren wo.

Francais: Plusieurs des chefs de famille donnèrent au trésor de l'oeuvre vingt mille dariques d'or et deux mille deux cents mines d'argent.
Anglais: And some of the chief of the fathers gave to the treasure of the work twenty thousand drams of gold, and two thousand and two hundred pound of silver.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Caw sumun ma hinina vul gurjuta ta ora birim dok-ma' gurjuta ta minna birim ma', sligar ma li ɗifinna dok-karkiya yam siɗiya.
Bulu: Bôte bevoʼo bese be nga ve bedrakme be or toyini mewôm mebaé, bemine be argent toyini ébaé a melôʼô betuni mewôm mesaman a zamgbwa.
Guiziga: Yo mizli mekelemey gar muvulama kwana, a gi le: ɓiri tapasl tapasl durmuk kukur cuw, ɓiri bara durmuk cuw waɗ zana ngi masayay kukur merkeɗ nga tarnaˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe luttuɓe boo ndokki ceede kaŋŋeeri ujine noogas e cardi baakin kilo ujineere (1.000) e toggooje limanku cappanɗe joweego e joweeɗiɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe luttuɓe boo ndokki ceede kaŋŋeeri ujine noogas e cardi baakin kilo ujineere (1.000) e toggooje limanku cappanɗe joweego e joweeɗiɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ oi mɔ nɛ o bíí ha̧a̧ nɛ́ kɔya-lɔr booro-ɓu-yiitoo in kilo bu-mbɔi booro, sɛka laa ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo wen o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ oi mɔ nɛ o bíí ha̧a̧ nɛ́ kɔya-lɔr booro-ɓu-yiitoo in kilo bu-mbɔi booro, sɛka laa ɓu-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-kpɔk-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo wen o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa kweci ka Israyɛl fəke dəɓərəa mze tere 20.000, kiləwəa mze kwa ghwə ghwə slibə ba'a yɛ lekwesa ta ka dzeghe Shala ŋkwaŋemsə mberefaŋeghəmbe.
Tupurri: Te jar Israyel ma äuyn haç wo solay boo biñni ndar do äoge, solay boo ni ndar de oçoçbe ma joñre siigi jag do hiira' ti rename.

Francais: Ce que le reste du peuple donna fut de vingt mille dariques d'or, deux mille mines d'argent et soixante-sept tuniques sacerdotales.
Anglais: And that which the rest of the people gave was twenty thousand drams of gold, and two thousand pound of silver, and threescore and seven priests' garments.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna, sa ŋom vun-galana, sa gi nulla, sum sa ɦawana, sa Netiniyena hiɗi sa Israyella kaf lak hay hoyok-ziyna visiya visiya.
Bulu: Betuni a Belévit, bebaʼale mimbé, beyia bia, bôte ya ayoñ, Benétinieñ a Israél ase, be nga tabe bitisone biap.
Guiziga: «A dirba nah so na, masayay, Levihey, mijigina mizlingrehey, mizli dimisey, mekelemey a wuzla sukwi ngi Israyeleye, migi slra ngir hay ngi Bumbulvuŋhoy ati Israyel mekelemey gar na, a pam ar walahay taŋhaya.» Taŋ mindilaka kiya mitarnaˀ naŋ na, naɓa Israyeley gar a cifam le kuy kuy ar walahay taŋhaya muduba so.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Liman'en e Lewi'en e aynooɓe dammuɗe e yimooɓe e yimɓe woɗɓe e huuwooɓe kuuɗe pamare nder haykaliiru e Isra'iila'en fuu njooɗi nder gure muuɗum'en. Nde lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru waɗi, Isra'iila'en njooɗi nder gure muuɗum'en .
Fulfulde_DC: Liman'en e Lewi'en e aynooɓe dammuɗe e yimooɓe e yimɓe woɗɓe e huuwooɓe kuuɗe pamare nder haykaliiru e Isra'iila'en fuu njooɗi nder gure muuɗum'en. Nde lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru waɗi, Isra'iila'en njooɗi nder gure muuɗum'en .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii, o wi-pɛm-nú-tua, o wi-bii-gima, o ŋma oi bíí hee o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ ga in o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ sii ɗoŋ tɛ ye kɔ‘i. Mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ hɔa, ɓɛɛ o be  Israɛl  ɔ tɛ o ye kɔ‘i.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii, o wi-pɛm-nú-tua, o wi-bii-gima, o ŋma oi bíí hee o wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ ga in o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ sii ɗoŋ tɛ ye kɔ‘i. Mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ hɔa, ɓɛɛ o be  Israɛl  ɔ tɛ o ye kɔ‘i.»
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka dzeghe Shala, ka Lɛvi, ka ya degha, ka gha cimə, kweci ka Israyɛl, kala ka mene slene mbe ghɛa Shala le mbeli ketene pɛtɛ ntishɛnji mbe meleme ta nci. Ma te kwa mberefaŋe ta tere mbe va, pɛtɛ ka Israyɛl kenzanji mbe meleme ta nci.
Tupurri: Jar sië jagn wo, jar Lefidn wo, jar gor jag tiñn wo, jar 'wad siñn wo, jar ngaäan wo, jar Netiniyeçeç wo de jar Israyel wo äuy raw wo lagge go äi leege äaaran wo.

Francais: C'est ainsi que les prêtres et les lévites, les chantres, les portiers, des gens du peuple, les Nathinéens et tout Israël s'établirent dans leurs villes.
Anglais: So the priests, and the Levites, and the porters, and the singers, and some of the people, and the Nethinims, and all Israel, dwelt in their cities; and when the seventh month came, the children of Israel were in their cities.

Francais: Le septième mois étant arrivé, et les enfants d'Israël étant établis dans leurs villes, tout le peuple s'assembla comme un seul homme sur la place qui est devant la porte de l'Eau. Et ils dirent à Esdras, le scribe, d'apporter le livre de la loi de Moïse, que Yahweh a prescrite à Israël.
Anglais: And all the people gathered themselves together as one man into the street that was before the water gate; and they spake unto Ezra the scribe to bring the book of the law of Moses, which the  Lord  had commanded to Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol kayni sumun kaf tok tuwsi ki san kep ɦawa nala hay liyn ma ka vok vun-galana vi niyna. Nisi di tam Esdras sa ma wi ɗota kay nam ma mar ɗerwelda vi gatta vi Musus, ta Ma-Vatɗina ɗo' tam sa Israyella.
Bulu: Ngone zamgbwale é nga kui bone bʼIsraél be too e bitisone biap. Eyoñe te ñhe bôte bese be nga sulan ane môte wua, e vôm a mbe ôsu ya mbé mendim. Nde be nga jô Esdras, Ntili bekalate na, a zuu kalate metiñe me Môze, mme Nti a nga bendé Israél.
Guiziga: Sukwi Israyel gar a ngiɓam ˀay ar li purla, a jumom jom ar li misi a mizlingre ngi Yam. A ɓaka Esdras, mbur misina toho gwata, ɓa a so ti ɗerewol ngi Ɓimujuwa ngi Moyis, Bumbulvuŋ muwuɗ da Israyeley na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ummaatoore fuu mooɓi bana goɗɗo gooto haa daldal yeeso Dammugal Ndiyam. Ɓe mbi'i moodibbo Esira o wadda deftere tawreeta Muusa, ka Jawmiraawo umruno Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Ummaatoore fuu mooɓi bana goɗɗo gooto haa daldal yeeso Dammugal Ndiyam. Ɓe mbi'i moodibbo Esira o wadda deftere tawreeta Muusa, ka Jawmiraawo umruno Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  mɔi̧a ŋmaa lɛŋ sɛn Jerusalɛm, mgbák ká̧ Nu Garo Yi. Wa aka Ɛsdras wi-yɔr-kalata mɛ ba kalata Heembea ko Moisɛ nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so ha̧ o be  Israɛl  tɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  mɔi̧a ŋmaa lɛŋ sɛn Jerusalɛm, mgbák ká̧ Nu Garo Yi. Wa aka Ɛsdras wi-yɔr-kalata mɛ ba kalata Heembea ko Moisɛ nɛ GASA WAN ha̧a̧ so ha̧ o be  Israɛl  tɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛ ka Israyɛl tsenete geva kanya kwetɛŋe mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm te kwete ŋwela mɛa mɛ degha ta Yɛmə. Pa hɛ gezete nda ke Ɛsdras, nde rafe wəshi mahalegə kezha keleke palepa ta wəsə mahalegə nya ndeke nda Mahwətə ke ka Israyɛl laka Moyize.
Tupurri: Few ma de renamn raw age, jar Israyel hay wo go de lagge äi leege äaaran wo. Mo so no jarn wo äuy raw wo tayge le go see kaçaçra do jobo boñ nono ti ngeel ma jag faage Biin wo. Saara raw riñ Esdras je had waçaçre Baan ga aà mo mañ kefder jag liñgi mani Moyis maga Manwur hay yern ne Israyel le.

Francais: Et le prêtre Esdras apporta la loi devant l'assemblée, les hommes et les femmes et tous ceux qui étaient assez intelligents pour l'entendre : c'était le premier jour du septième mois.
Anglais: And Ezra the priest brought the law before the congregation both of men and women, and all that could hear with understanding, upon the first day of the seventh month.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mul-ma-ɗifinna Esdras mar gatta vok tokŋa, ay tokay kayni si jufayna hiɗi boyna hiɗi nisi kaf sa asay kay hum slena. Kayni hay buurta jewta vi til ma siɗiyana.
Bulu: Ane Esdras, ntuni , a nga soo kalate metiñ ôsu ékôane bôt, é mbe befam a binga, a ba bese be mbe nguleya wôʼô jam é nga jôban. Jame di é nga boban ngone zamgbwale é too alu da.
Guiziga: Masay Esdras a so ti ɗerewol ngi Ɓimujuwa nga mbuŋ mizli ar kuso. Ar kus nah i ziley ati ngwasay waɗ ziriy zliv macinam gu. Naɓa i hin mudumbuŋ ngi kiya mitarnaˀ naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyannde go'oore nder lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru, Esira, limanjo waddi tawreeta yeeso mooɓtorde, worɓe e rewɓe e derke'en heewtuɓe faamugo fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyannde go'oore nder lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru, Esira, limanjo waddi tawreeta yeeso mooɓtorde, worɓe e rewɓe e derke'en heewtuɓe faamugo fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛsdras wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ baa Heembea e ti gii o be  Israɛl  nɛ mɔi̧a so: mɛ nɛ o wiwii, o okoo in o bíí lɛŋ nɛ nyɛma mɛ zii gba̧a̧-a̧. Mɔ‘i dee tɛ kuti wese, tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛsdras wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ baa Heembea e ti gii o be  Israɛl  nɛ mɔi̧a so: mɛ nɛ o wiwii, o okoo in o bíí lɛŋ nɛ nyɛma mɛ zii gba̧a̧-a̧. Mɔ‘i dee tɛ kuti wese, tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa nde dzeghe Shala Ɛsdras keleke palepa kadzawa kema ta tsene ta mbeli: yɛ zhili, mi le ŋwale nyi gare fave ghena. Te kwa ghate ta hɛ mbe tere kwa mberefaŋe menete geva ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Esdras je sië jagn raw mañ jag liñgin le pel ngaäa maga hay de tayge diñ werpiiri wo, naare wo de wosela äuy maga laa wo wer fen maga se laan de sug äe mo äuy no. Sen na ti naw ma tañgu nen few ma de renam no.

Francais: Il lut dans le livre, depuis le matin jusqu'au milieu du jour, sur la place qui est devant la porte de l'Eau, en présence des hommes et des femmes et de ceux qui étaient assez intelligents pour l'entendre; tout le peuple prêtait l'oreille à la lecture du livre de la loi.
Anglais: And he read therein before the street that was before the water gate from the morning until midday, before the men and the women, and those that could understand; and the ears of all the people were attentive unto the book of the law.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam jaŋ ɗerwel goyo, tun caw grawta pa ta-ta falayta, nam ka coli hay liyn ma ɗiger vok vun-galana vi niyna, goy vok jufayna, boyna hiɗi nisi sa asay kay huma. Sumun kaf lakay kiliŋ kay hum jaŋga vi gatta.
Bulu: A nga lañ e kalatʼété, ataté mametyé a kui zañe môs , a tele vôm a ne ôsu mbé mendim: befam, binga a ba be mbe nguleya wôk be too. Bôte bese be nga tuʼa vôʼôlô nlañane kalate metiñ.
Guiziga: Esdras a slufa ɗerewol tuwa, a mbuŋ mizlingre ngi Yama, a mbuŋ ziley ati ngwasay waɗ ziriy zliv macinam gu, zle ngi li biŋ biŋ, hã wuzla papas. Mizli gar a jikaka slimiɗe le kuy kuy ngi cine ɓi ngir ɗerewol Ɓimujuwa nah.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O jaŋngi deftere man haa babal yeeso Dammugal Ndiyam, diga subaha haa caka naaŋge. Ummaatoore fuu, worɓe e rewɓe e derke'en heewtuɓe faamugo ɗon keɗito jaŋgɗe deftere tawreeta.
Fulfulde_DC: O jaŋngi deftere man haa babal yeeso Dammugal Ndiyam, diga subaha haa caka naaŋge. Ummaatoore fuu, worɓe e rewɓe e derke'en heewtuɓe faamugo ɗon keɗito jaŋgɗe deftere tawreeta.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛsdras tɔra mɔ sɛn zaŋ kalata Heembea'i sɛn fara nɛ duk ká̧ Nú Garo Yì, ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ tutuyɛ hɔ nɛnɛ wese see zu. A̧ tɔra ha̧ o wiwii in o okoo, in o bíí lɛŋ nɛ nyɛma mɛ zii gba̧a̧ Heembea'i, ɓɛɛ dukbíí lɛŋ yeŋ zer mɛ zii wen'i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛsdras tɔra mɔ sɛn zaŋ kalata Heembea'i sɛn fara nɛ duk ká̧ Nú Garo Yì, ku̧u̧naŋ-a mɛ tutuyɛ hɔ nɛnɛ wese see zu. A̧ tɔra ha̧ o wiwii in o okoo, in o bíí lɛŋ nɛ nyɛma mɛ zii gba̧a̧ Heembea'i, ɓɛɛ dukbíí lɛŋ yeŋ zer mɛ zii wen'i.
Kapsiki_DC: Se masheke pa kwa ghə veci Ɛsdras kajaŋga palepa shɛ zlape zlape kwa kema ta zhili, mi le ŋwale nyi gare fave ghena te ŋwela nya mɛa mɛ degha ta Yɛmə. Pɛtɛa mbeli kefate jaŋga shɛ le mehele.
Tupurri: Se kal kee kefder le de jag toñ haçaç wo wur de deele ti ngeel maga jag faage Biin wo, pel werpiiri wo, naare wo jar maga laa wo wer mopo mono. Jarn wo äuy lag wo seëem co' sug keege kefder jag liñgi no.

Francais: Esdras le scribe se tenait sur une estrade de bois, dressée pour la circonstance ; et à côté de lui se tenaient, à sa droite, Mathatias, Séméïas, Anias, Urie, Helcias et Maasias ; et à sa gauche, Phadaïas, Misaël, Melchias, Hasum, Hasbadana, Zacharie et Mosollam.
Anglais: And Ezra the scribe stood upon a pulpit of wood, which they had made for the purpose; and beside him stood Mattithiah, and Shema, and Anaiah, and Urijah, and Hilkiah, and Maaseiah, on his right hand; and on his left hand, Pedaiah, and Mishael, and Malchijah, and Hashum, and Hashbadana, Zechariah, and Meshullam.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Esdras ma wi ɗota ka coli kulo kay balakŋa ma nisi pum kay li lop namna. Ka lakay talam hay galam ma jufna kayni si Matitiya, Sema, Anaya, Uriyas, Hilkiya, hiɗi Maaseya, hay galam ma gulla kayni si Pedaya, Mikayel, Malkiya, Hasum, Hakbaddana, Zakariya hiɗi Mesullam.
Bulu: Esdras, ñyeme bekalate, a nga tele e monʼéwolo bilé yôp, nye a nga kômban amu awolo te. Bôte bana be nga tele nye fefel e mbo nnôm: Matitia, Séma, Anaya, Uri, Ilkiya a Maséya: e mbo ngal: Pedaya, Mikaél, Malkiya, Asum, Asbadana, Zakari a Mesulam.
Guiziga: Esdras, mbur misina toho gwata, a cici deŋ ar li miɗiyaka ti dum hĩˀĩ vriw a muŋ. Mideŋ deŋ a cikeˀe tir vay hazumo i ti: Matitiya, Sema, Anaya, Uriya, Hilkiya waɗ Maˀaseya. Yo tir vay gula kwana, i ti: Pedaya, Mikayel, Malkiya, Hasum, Hasebadana, Zakari waɗ Mesulam.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Moodibbo Esira dari dow ba'eteeɗum leggal ko ɓe mbaɗi ngam daliila man. Mattitiya e Sema e Anaya e Uriya e Hilkiyya e Ma'aseya ndari haa nyaamo maako. Pedaya e Miisayel e Malkiya e Hasum e Hasbaddana e Zekariya e Mesullam boo ndari haa nano maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Moodibbo Esira dari dow ba'eteeɗum leggal ko ɓe mbaɗi ngam daliila man. Mattitiya e Sema e Anaya e Uriya e Hilkiyya e Ma'aseya ndari haa nyaamo maako. Pedaya e Miisayel e Malkiya e Hasum e Hasbaddana e Zekariya e Mesullam boo ndari haa nano maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛsdras wi-yɔr-kalata daŋa so nɛ́ zu taŋaɗa nɛ wa dee so wen mɔ‘i, yor sɛnɛ. Matitia, Sɛma, Anania, Uria, Hilkia in Masɛya yora katɛ a nɛ war wiiko, ɓɛɛ nɛ war gale nɛ́ Pɛdaya, Misaɛl, Malkia, Hasum, Hasbadana, Zakarii in Mɛsulam.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛsdras wi-yɔr-kalata daŋa so nɛ́ zu taŋaɗa nɛ wa dee so wen mɔ‘i, yor sɛnɛ. Matitia, Sɛma, Anania, Uria, Hilkia in Masɛya yora katɛ a nɛ war wiiko, ɓɛɛ nɛ war gale nɛ́ Pɛdaya, Misaɛl, Malkia, Hasum, Hasbadana, Zakarii in Mɛsulam.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Ɛsdras sletenyɛ pelɛ sheghwə nyi sleɓete mbeli kezha slenea shɛ. Te kwa zeme ta ŋkɛ yɛ Matitiya, Shɛma, Anaya, Əwriya, Hilkiya ba'a Masɛya, te kwa gwela ta ŋkɛ yɛ Pedaya, Mikayɛl, Malkiya, Hashəwm, Hashebadana, Zakari le Meshəwlam.
Tupurri: Esdras je had waçaçre Baan hay go de oole ciñ ti koo po maga aè hay kañn ma seno. Matitiya, Sema, Anaya, Uri, Hilkiya wo de Maaseya hay wo de odge ti do war äe, Pedaya, Mikayel, Malkiya, Hasum, Hasbadana, Sakari wo de Mesulam hay wo ti do guur äe lay.

Francais: Esdras ouvrit le livre à la vue de tout le peuple, car il était élevé au-dessus de tout le peuple; et, lorsqu'il l'eut ouvert, tout le peuple se tint debout.
Anglais: And Ezra opened the book in the sight of all the people; (for he was above all the people;) and when he opened it, all the people stood up:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Esdras mal ɗerwelda goyo kir sumun kaf, kay nam ka coli kulo ɗiŋiriŋi suw sumun kaf, hay li ma nam mal ɗerwel goy malla, sumun kaf lak kulo'o.
Bulu: Ane Esdras a nga kui kalate bôte bese be lôô, amu a mbe a tele ôyabe yôp a dañe bôte bese. Eyoñ a nga kui nye, nde bôte bese be nga tebe betetele.
Guiziga: Esdras a wuna ɗerewolo a mihiri ngi mizli gar, asi naŋ vriw a muŋ ar mizli gar. Naŋ muwuna ɗerewolo wun si na, mizli gar a slikiɗam puyõˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Esira maɓɓiti deftere, ummaatoore fuu yi'i ɗum, ngam o ɗonno towti dow yimɓe fuu. Nde o maɓɓiti nde, ɓe ummi.
Fulfulde_DC: Esira maɓɓiti deftere, ummaatoore fuu yi'i ɗum, ngam o ɗonno towti dow yimɓe fuu. Nde o maɓɓiti nde, ɓe ummi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛsdras hu̧i̧a̧ kalata nɛ yí dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ, wen a̧ yor nɛ́ zu kusa fara see zu dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ. Ŋgimbi n'aa hu̧i̧a̧ kaɗi, o bíí kura yor ŋgɔn lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛsdras hu̧i̧a̧ kalata nɛ yí dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ, wen a̧ yor nɛ́ zu kusa fara see zu dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ. Ŋgimbi n'aa hu̧i̧a̧ kaɗi, o bíí kura yor ŋgɔn lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Waɗe Ɛsdras pelemte palepa kwa ntsə ta mbeli pɛtɛ, kwa nza ŋkɛ pelɛ ŋkwa nya biya. Ma kwa pelemte palepa ŋkɛ, mbeli pɛtɛ satenji meslete.
Tupurri: Esdras raw bul äil kefdern go de nen jarn äuy werga aà hay go de oole ciñ haçaç de dañ jarn wo no, day de maga se bul äil kefdern go mono, jarn raw hooge go deele äuy.

Francais: Esdras bénit Yahweh, le grand Dieu, et tout le peuple répondit en levant les mains : "Amen! amen!" Et ils s'inclinèrent et se prosternèrent devant Yahweh, le visage contre terre.
Anglais: And Ezra blessed the  Lord , the great God. And all the people answered, Amen, Amen, with lifting up their hands: and they bowed their heads, and worshipped the  Lord  with their faces to the ground.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Esdras subur Ma-Vatɗina, Lawn ma ŋolla, sumun kaf hot dita hiɗi ɓisi kulo yaway ala: Amen, Amen! Nisi guɗof gaa'a, dab voksi gaa vok Ma-Vatɗina gaa kay nagata.
Bulu: Esdras a nga botane Nti, e Zambe a ne anen, a bôte bese be nga yalane na: Amen! Amen! Ve kumbu a kañ asu Nti, mesu me butu si.
Guiziga: Ar nah na, Esdras a ga sise da Bumbulvuŋ, Buymisemuŋ madiɗa. Joˀ mizli gar a tiɓaka: «Anja kine! Anja kine!» haŋ yom a muŋ. A dirba nah, a hurukom, a hurukom huruk huruk a mbuŋ Bumbulvuŋ, midibiɗ a ruwuy a ruwuy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Esira maŋgti Jawmiraawo, Allah Mawɗo. Yimɓe fuu ɓaŋgti juuɗe muuɗum'en, njaabi: “Aamiina, aamiina!” Nden ɓe turi, ɓe cujidani Jawmiraawo, geese maɓɓe meemi lesdi.
Fulfulde_DC: Esira maŋgti Jawmiraawo, Allah Mawɗo. Yimɓe fuu ɓaŋgti juuɗe muuɗum'en, njaabi: “Aamiina, aamiina!” Nden ɓe turi, ɓe cujidani Jawmiraawo, geese maɓɓe meemi lesdi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛsdras zɔna GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ gasa, ɓɛɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ nyɛi̧ er si ŋgɔn tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Aamɛn! Aamɛn!» Wa guu nù, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ zugur-wa mbɔɗɔnu sɛn ti GASA WAN, ba yí-wa hikiɗi nɛ nù.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛsdras zɔna GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ ɔ gasa, ɓɛɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ nyɛi̧ er si ŋgɔn tɔ̧ nɛnɛ: «Aamɛn! Aamɛn!» Wa guu nù, ɓɛɛ wa gbɛ zugur-wa mbɔɗɔnu sɛn ti GASA WAN, ba yí-wa hikiɗi nɛ nù.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Ɛsdras tsate nda hana ke Mahwətə, Shala nya wəba, ma ke mbeli pɛtɛ zhɛnete le slete yɛ dzeve yitea ghweme: «Amɛn! Amɛn!» Gwəɗəŋə hɛ ntiŋə ghə mbe hɛɗi kahawe va Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Esdras raw joñ suse' ne Manwuri, Baa ma kluu no. Jarn wo äuy raw yiñ jag de hoor do ciñ ga: Amen! Amen! Saara raw laa koyoçgre gesiñ, raw wo leë mondra pel Manwur de mbuë nen gesiñ.

Francais: Et Josué, Bani, Sérébias, Jamin, Accub, Sépthai, Odias, Maasias, Célita, Azarias, Jozabed, Hanan, Phalaïas et les lévites instruisaient le peuple de la loi, et chacun restait à sa place.
Anglais: Also Jeshua, and Bani, and Sherebiah, Jamin, Akkub, Shabbethai, Hodijah, Maaseiah, Kelita, Azariah, Jozabad, Hanan, Pelaiah, and the Levites, caused the people to understand the law: and the people stood in their place.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosuwa, Bani, Serebiya, Yanim, Akkub, Sabbetay, Hodiya, Maaseya, Kelita, Azariya, Yozabad, Hanan, Pelaya hiɗi sa Levitna sa ka di caw gatta goy tam sumuna, sumun ka lakay kulo'o may.
Bulu: Yasua, Bani, Kérébia, Yamin, Akub, Kabetayi, Odiya, Maséya, Kélita, Azaria, Yôzabad, Anañ, Pelaya a Belévit, be nga bo ésaé ya kôñelane be metiñe na be tuʼa me wôk a bôte bese be nga tele betetele.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, mizli levihey: Yesuwa, Bani, Serebiya, Yamin, Akup, Sabetay, Hodiya, Maˀaseya, Kelita, Azariya, Yosabat, Hanan waɗ Pelaya, mizli tayna a zlaka a dubunaka taŋ Ɓimujuwa tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yeesu'a e Baani e Serebiya e Yamin e Akkubu e Sabbetay e Hodiyya e Ma'aseya e Kelita e Azariya e Yozabat e Hanan e Pelaya, Lewi'en, paamtini tawreeta haa ummaatoore dariinde haa nokkuure maare.
Fulfulde_DC: Yeesu'a e Baani e Serebiya e Yamin e Akkubu e Sabbetay e Hodiyya e Ma'aseya e Kelita e Azariya e Yozabat e Hanan e Pelaya, Lewi'en, paamtini tawreeta haa ummaatoore dariinde haa nokkuure maare.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa kura yor ŋgɔn woyo, ɓɛɛ Yesua, Bani, Sɛrɛbia, Yamin, Akub, Sabetai, Hɔdia, Masɛya, Kɛlita, Azaria, Yɔzabad, Hanaŋ in Pɛlaya nɛ yaa so nɛ́ o be Levii we ɗoŋ Heembea ha̧ wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa kura yor ŋgɔn woyo, ɓɛɛ Yesua, Bani, Sɛrɛbia, Yamin, Akub, Sabetai, Hɔdia, Masɛya, Kɛlita, Azaria, Yɔzabad, Hanaŋ in Pɛlaya nɛ yaa so nɛ́ o be Levii we ɗoŋ Heembea ha̧ wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ zhɛne kasatenji meslete, ntake yɛ Yɛshəwa, Bani, Shɛrɛbiya, Yamin, Akəwb, Shabetay, Hodiya, Masɛya, Kelita, Azariya, Yozabad, Hanan le Pelaya nyi kaka Lɛvi kateke nda wəsə mahalegə ke mbeli.
Tupurri: Josuwe, Bani, Serebiya, Yamin, Akub, Sabetay, Hodiya, Maaseya, Kelita, Asariya, Yosabad, Hanan, Pelaya wo de jar Lefidn hay wo go naa wer jag liñgin go ne jarn wo maga aà mo laa wo wer äe, day jarn raw wo lagge go deele.

Francais: Ils lisaient distinctement dans le livre, dans la loi de Dieu, et ils en donnaient le sens, et l'on comprenait ce qui était lu.
Anglais: So they read in the book in the law of God distinctly, and gave the sense, and caused them to understand the reading.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ka jaŋ ɗerwella vi gatta vi Lawna goy haraŋ ŋaa'a ŋolo, nisi ka dum cawam goyo kay nisi ma hum caw sle ma jaŋamna.
Bulu: Be mbe be lañek ne sañesañ e kalate metiñe me Zambʼété, a kate atinan ya vôm ba te lañ, ane bôt be ne tuʼa wôk jôm ba te lañ.
Guiziga: Joˀ a slufa ɗerewol Ɓimujuwa ngi Buymisemuŋ tuwa, ti jiviɗ naŋ macin kwaŋ kwaŋ, a ɓa taŋ mbiɗeˀvra naŋ, ɓa a slaka wala ngi ɓi taŋ maslufaka taŋ di vuna.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe njaŋngi nder deftere tawreeta Allah bee laaɓɗum, ɓe passitiri nde haa yimɓe paama ko jaŋnga.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe njaŋngi nder deftere tawreeta Allah bee laaɓɗum, ɓe passitiri nde haa yimɓe paama ko jaŋnga.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tɔr so nɛ́ mɔ zaŋ kalata Heembea ko Sɔ̧ nɛ sa̧a̧‘a̧, we nɛ ɗoŋ-aa ha̧ o bíí mɛ zii gba̧a̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tɔr so nɛ́ mɔ zaŋ kalata Heembea ko Sɔ̧ nɛ sa̧a̧‘a̧, we nɛ ɗoŋ-aa ha̧ o bíí mɛ zii gba̧a̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ntake hɛ kajaŋga palepa ta wəsə mahalegəa Shala same same ba'a kancɛ nda ghena nya mbe ke mbeli, yitea fate wəsə nya kejaŋgate geva yayata wəndə.
Tupurri: AÀ hay wo kee kefder jag liñgi mani Baan go crage day saara hay go naa wer äe maga jar mo laa wo wer fen maga saara hay kee ne hara mono.

Francais: Et Néhémie, le gouverneur, Esdras, le prêtre et le scribe, et les lévites qui instruisaient le peuple, dirent à tout le peuple : "Ce jour est saint pour Yahweh, votre Dieu ; ne soyez pas dans le deuil et dans les larmes." Car tout le peuple pleurait en entendant les paroles de la loi.
Anglais: And Nehemiah, which is the Tirshatha, and Ezra the priest the scribe, and the Levites that taught the people, said unto all the people, This day is holy unto the  Lord  your God; mourn not, nor weep. For all the people wept, when they heard the words of the law.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nehemiya ma guvernera, Esdras mul-ma-ɗifinna ma wi ɗota hiɗi sa Levitna sa hat sumuna di tam sumun kaf ala: Buurta vaydit zawni vuli goy tam Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vigiya; lakgi hay yorta hiɗi tiynɗi. Kay sumun kaf ka tiya hay li ma nisi hum yoboyna vi gatta.
Bulu: Néhémie ngovina, Esdras ntuni a ñyeme bekalate, nalé fe belevite, be nga bo ésaé ya yeʼele bôt. Be nga jô bôte bese na: Môse wu ô ne ntelan ngumba asu Nti, e Zambe wônan. Te taban ôlun été nge e miliʼi été! Amu bôte bese be nga yôn éyoñ be nga wôʼô mejô ya kalate metiñ.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Nehemi, mbur miwi li ati Masay Esdras misina toho gwata waɗ Levihey maɓaka pulaˀvra ngi Ɓimujuwa da mizli gar na, a ɓaka taŋ: «Hin misenna i hin ngi Bumbulvuŋ, Buymisemuŋ kum. Anja ki likam ta, yo ki tuwam ta!» Asi mike na, mizli gar macinaka mingiɓi ngir Ɓimujuwa tuwa na, a roko tuwam zleˀe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nehemiya, ngomna e moodibbo Esira, limanjo e Lewi'en faamtinɓe ummaatoore nde mbi'i ɓe fuu: “Hannde woni nyalaade senaande ngam Allah Jawmiraawo mooɗon. Taa cune, taa mboye.” Ngam ummaatoore fuu ɗon woya, saa'i ɓe ɗon nana bolle tawreeta.
Fulfulde_DC: Nehemiya, ngomna e moodibbo Esira, limanjo e Lewi'en faamtinɓe ummaatoore nde mbi'i ɓe fuu: “Hannde woni nyalaade senaande ngam Allah Jawmiraawo mooɗon. Taa cune, taa mboye.” Ngam ummaatoore fuu ɗon woya, saa'i ɓe ɗon nana bolle tawreeta.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Nehemii, wi-duk-zu nù in Ɛsdras wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ duka nɛ́ wi-yɔr-mɔ ká bá nɛ̀ o be Levii nɛ usi mɔ ha̧ dukbíí tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Wese’ɛ nɛ́ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ. K’ɛ́nɛ́ zim mɔ na, in k’ɛ́nɛ́ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ na mbɛt!» Dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ hi̧i̧ so nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧, ŋgimbi nɛ wa zii nɛ o gba̧a̧ Heembea'i. Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Ɛsdras tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa woyo:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Nehemii, wi-duk-zu nù in Ɛsdras wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ duka nɛ́ wi-yɔr-mɔ ká bá nɛ̀ o be Levii nɛ usi mɔ ha̧ dukbíí tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa: «Wese’ɛ nɛ́ ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ. K’ɛ́nɛ́ zim mɔ na, in k’ɛ́nɛ́ hi̧i̧ kɔ̧a̧ na mbɛt!» Dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ hi̧i̧ so nɛ́ kɔ̧a̧, ŋgimbi nɛ wa zii nɛ o gba̧a̧ Heembea'i. Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Ɛsdras tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ wa woyo:
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛ tsene ta mbeli kanehwene kwa fate jaŋga shɛ hɛ. Vatse nda se yɛ Nɛhɛmi nya kaŋgwamna, Ɛsdras, nde dzeghe Shala nya kande rafe wəshi mahalegə le ka Lɛvi nyi kencɛ nda ghena nyi mbe ke mbeli kageze: «Veci nya keveyi geva tekeleke kaŋa Shala Mahwətə ta ŋayɛ veci nya! Veci keheɗe kema ba'a kenehwene ŋkɛ we.»
Tupurri: Nehemi je waçaç ree prog no, Esdras je sië jag ma naa wer waçaçre Baan wo de jar Lefid maga hay wo had jarn kal wo riñ jarn wo äuy gano: Wur se ka'n wara diñ wur maga go sagsag ma Manwuri, Baa äay no. Law wee wa, ra wee wa lay! Sen na werga jarn wo äuy hay ra wo de maga saara laa waçaçre jag liñgin wo mono.

Francais: Et Néhémie leur dit : "Allez, mangez des viandes grasses et buvez des liqueurs douces, et envoyez des portions à celui qui n'a rien de préparé, car ce jour est saint pour notre Seigneur; ne vous affligez pas, car la joie en Yahweh est votre force."
Anglais: Then he said unto them, Go your way, eat the fat, and drink the sweet, and send portions unto them for whom nothing is prepared: for this day is holy unto our Lord: neither be ye sorry; for the joy of the  Lord  is your strength.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Esdras di tisiya: Tuɗgiya, tigi tin ma hiɗi mula, cigi dolay ma sleɗna, jokgi gal hena tam sum sa fisin mayɗina, kay fatta vaydit zawni vuli goy tam Bum-sumuna vaya; nigi ma to sutaygiɗi, kay firita hay Ma-Vatɗina kayn ti donota vigiya.
Bulu: Esdras a nga jô be na: Kelan a di betit be ne avoñ, a nyu biôm bi nʼévôvoé, a lôme mengap e be ba be nji bi jôm: amu môse wu ô ne ntelan asu Nti wongan; te wôʼan ôlun amu avaʼa Nti nde é ne ngule jenan.
Guiziga: Esdras a ɓa t'ani ava ma: «A ram ngi hay kumoy, zumam gwat mezleŋ, yo sam gwat mundumoy. Mizli manja gwatay na, saka taŋ ti mi nga taŋ, vur hin misenna i muvula le da Bumbulvuŋ ndra. Anja ki likam ta, asi mumul maso ti vu Bumbulvuŋ na, mavulukum gidaŋ i nah.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Esira wi'i ɓe: “Njehe jonta, nyaame payɗum, njare mbelɗam, nelde boo geɗe nyaamdu haa mo taaskitinaay nyaamdu. Ngam hannde woni nyalaade senaande ngam Jawmiraawo men. Taa cune, ngam seyo iwŋgo diga Jawmiraawo woni semmbe mon.”
Fulfulde_DC: Esira wi'i ɓe: “Njehe jonta, nyaame payɗum, njare mbelɗam, nelde boo geɗe nyaamdu haa mo taaskitinaay nyaamdu. Ngam hannde woni nyalaade senaande ngam Jawmiraawo men. Taa cune, ngam seyo iwŋgo diga Jawmiraawo woni semmbe mon.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ nɛ́ de nyɔŋmɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ o de mɔ in ɛ̀nɛ̀ tóm ŋma nɛnɛ ha̧ o bíí nɛ bo nɛnɛ na, wen sɔsɔɔ'ɛ nɛ́ wese ko GASA WAN k’ɛɛ; ká see'nɛ́ ɗaŋ na, wen desee ko GASA WAN nɛ́ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ sí ɗoŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɔ́ŋ nɛ́ de nyɔŋmɔ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ́ o de mɔ in ɛ̀nɛ̀ tóm ŋma nɛnɛ ha̧ o bíí nɛ bo nɛnɛ na, wen sɔsɔɔ'ɛ nɛ́ wese ko GASA WAN k’ɛɛ; ká see'nɛ́ ɗaŋ na, wen desee ko GASA WAN nɛ́ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Ɛsdras mtsehete: «Kwiɗi mə sha ghɛa ŋayɛ, zeme mə wəshi ganji, sa mə wəshi ganji, ɗave nda mə ke mbeli nyi keɗema ketakɛ, kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe veci nya keveyi geva tekeleke kaŋa Mahwətə ta ɓəmə. Nzama yɛ le kema teheɗe ma! Zlama ta Mahwətə ya kaberete ta ŋayɛ.»
Tupurri: Esdras hay riñ ra gano: See wee, wo wee ree naèy ma de noo wo, joo wee feçeçre ma bay jiigi wo day haç wee te äaara ne jar maga ma äaara bay wo go de 'wuçygi wa ëa mono. Gahaçyla, wur sen diñ wur maga go sagsag ma Wañkluu naa no, law wee wa werga fruygi mani Manwurn diñ eegre äay no.

Francais: Les lévites calmaient tout le peuple, en disant : "Taisez-vous ; car ce jour est saint ; ne vous affligez pas."
Anglais: So the Levites stilled all the people, saying, Hold your peace, for the day is holy; neither be ye grieved.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Levitna kaw ka sleɗ dik sumun kaf hiɗi dita ta ala: Zangiya, kay buurta ta vaydit zawni na' peldete, togi sutaygiɗi.
Bulu: Belévit be jeʼe bôte bese minlem be jôʼô na: Tabaʼane bivôl, amu môse wu ô nʼétyi, te wôʼan ôlun!
Guiziga: Levihey a taˀaka mi da mizli, a ɓaka taŋ: «Cifam teˀ teˀ takwa, asi hin misenna i muvula le da Bumbulvuŋ. Anja ki likam ta.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lewi'en boo nde'itini yimɓe, mbi'i ɓe: “Nde'ite, ngam nyalaade nde'e nde senaande, taa cune.”
Fulfulde_DC: Lewi'en boo nde'itini yimɓe, mbi'i ɓe: “Nde'ite, ngam nyalaade nde'e nde senaande, taa cune.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be Levii gaia dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kàɗì, wen wese’ɛ ɔ sa̧a̧, ká see'nɛ́ ɗaŋ na.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be Levii gaia dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ tɔ̧ nɛnɛ‘e: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kàɗì, wen wese’ɛ ɔ sa̧a̧, ká see'nɛ́ ɗaŋ na.»
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka Lɛvi gweɗakwete mbeli perə kwa geze hɛ: «Gweɗakwe pe yɛ! Kwa nza ŋkɛ, nahe veci nya keveyi geva tekeleke kaŋa Shala. Mba yɛ kenza le kema teheɗe!»
Tupurri: Jar Lefidn hay wo teñ nen jarn wo äuy gano: Hem wee mbay werga wur sen diñ wur ma sara. Law wee wa so!

Francais: Et tout le peuple s'en alla pour manger et boire, envoyer des portions et se livrer à de grandes réjouissances. Car ils avaient compris les paroles qu'on leur avait fait connaître.
Anglais: And all the people went their way to eat, and to drink, and to send portions, and to make great mirth, because they had understood the words that were declared unto them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sumun kaf kali kay ti'e kay ci'e kaw, kay vul galla (mi segena) kay li firita ta ŋolda. Kay nisi humi yoboyna ma cawam ka ɗekay goyna.
Bulu: Ane bôte bese be nga ke be nga tuʼa wôʼô mejô be nga kate be.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, mizli gar a ram ngi hay taŋhay, ɓa a zumam gwat, ɓa a sam gwata. Yo mizli mujuwam vu tahay na, ɓa a saka taŋ ti mi nga taŋ, waɗ ɓa a bigaka mumul taŋ mihaɗa na, asi mingiɓi mudubunaka taŋ di na, a cinaka pulaˀavra naŋ le kuy kuy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden yimɓe fuu ndilli nyaamoygo e yaroygo, ɓe neldi geɗe nyaamdu boo. Ɓe ceyi bee seyo maŋngo ngam ɓe paami bolle ɗe ɓe anndini ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden yimɓe fuu ndilli nyaamoygo e yaroygo, ɓe neldi geɗe nyaamdu boo. Ɓe ceyi bee seyo maŋngo ngam ɓe paami bolle ɗe ɓe anndini ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ yaka mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ in mɛ nɔ mɔ, in ha̧ wa mɛ tom mɔ ha̧ o ŋmaa, de nɛ gasa gbaŋa wen wa zia wen nɛ wa tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ dukbíí nɛ oi-aa lɛŋ yaka mɛ nyɔŋ mɔ in mɛ nɔ mɔ, in ha̧ wa mɛ tom mɔ ha̧ o ŋmaa, de nɛ gasa gbaŋa wen wa zia wen nɛ wa tɔ̧a̧ ha̧ wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsagha, pɛtɛ mbeli kalə kazeme wəshi ba'a kasa wəshi. Pa hɛ ɗave wəshi kezeme ke mbeli nyi keɗema ketakɛ, ntake hɛ kamene gəsəkə nya wəba le zlama, kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe hɛ kefate ghena nyi gezave nda mbeli ke hɛ.
Tupurri: Jarn wo äuy kal wo rawge reege lay, jooge lay maga saara mo haç te äe ne jar lay, saara mo joñ fruygi ma kluu lay. Gahaçyla, aà hay laa wo wer waçaçre maga aè hay naa wer äaara ne hara mono.

Francais: Le second jour, les chefs de famille de tout le peuple, les prêtres et les lévites s'assemblèrent auprès d'Esdras le scribe, afin de s'instruire plus complètement des paroles de la loi.
Anglais: And on the second day were gathered together the chief of the fathers of all the people, the priests, and the Levites, unto Ezra the scribe, even to understand the words of the law.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buurta ma'ta, sa ŋulona vi jafna vi sumun kaf, muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna tok tuwsi kat Esdras, sa ma wi ɗota, kay tun ŋalda visiya kay yoboyna vi gatta.
Bulu: E môse baa, minlô menda me bôte ya ngum ayoñ betuni a Belévit, be nga sulan e be Esdras ñyeme bekalate na be vôʼôlô mejô ya metiñ.
Guiziga: Angi hin mucuw naŋ na, buy ngi hayay ngi wuzla mizli gar, masayay ati leviheye, a kusom kos kos a ciki Esdras, mbur misina toho gwat tuwa, ɓa a slaka wala ngi ɓi ngir Ɓimujuwa na kuy kuy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jaŋngo man baaba-ci'e'en nder ummaatoore fuu e liman'en e Lewi'en mooɓti haa moodibbo Esira ngam ɓe keɗito bolle tawreeta.
Fulfulde_DC: Jaŋngo man baaba-ci'e'en nder ummaatoore fuu e liman'en e Lewi'en mooɓti haa moodibbo Esira ngam ɓe keɗito bolle tawreeta.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, o gasawi nutua ko dukbíí, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii mɔi̧a ŋmaa sɛn katɛ Ɛsdras wi-yɔr-mɔ, ha̧ wa mɛ kii mɔ tɛ Heembea wen zia gba̧a̧-a̧,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ yiitoo ɔɔ-zɛ, o gasawi nutua ko dukbíí, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii mɔi̧a ŋmaa sɛn katɛ Ɛsdras wi-yɔr-mɔ, ha̧ wa mɛ kii mɔ tɛ Heembea wen zia gba̧a̧-a̧,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe kwa bake ta hɛ, pa mbelia jama nyi mbe pɛtɛa hwelefefi, ka dzeghe Shala le ka Lɛvi tsenete geva yitea Ɛsdras, nde rafe wəshi mahalegə, kezha fave zeweve ta ghena nyi mbe wəshi mahalegə megela.
Tupurri: Ti naw ma de äogn mono, wañre ma ti feele ma yoo jarn wo äuy, jar sië jagn wo de jar Lefid raw wo tayge le see Esdras je had waçaçre Baan ma lagge seëem co' sug waçaçre jag liñgi no.

Francais: Et ils trouvèrent écrit dans la loi que Yahweh avait prescrite par l'organe de Moïse, que les enfants d'Israël devaient habiter sous des tentes pendant la fête du septième mois,
Anglais: And they found written in the law which the  Lord  had commanded by Moses, that the children of Israel should dwell in booths in the feast of the seventh month:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi fum ɗoy hay gatta ta Ma-Vatɗina ɗo'a, vula' hay ɓam Mususta ala, sum sa Israyella ma lak hay guɗukŋa hay yuldeta vi til ma siɗiyana.
Bulu: Be nga koone ntilan e metiñ été na Nti a nga kobô a anyu Môze na: Bone bʼIsraél ba yiane tabe bibeme si éyoñ abôʼô ya ngone zamgbwale da boban.
Guiziga: A lumam a tohoko ar Ɓimujuwa misenna, gwat Bumbulvuŋ miɓa ɗaˀ le da Israyeley ti balam Moyis na: ti hin ngi muguzlum ngi kiya mitarnaˀ naŋ na, sey Israyeley a hinam ar mazlaɓay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe tawi nder maaka ko Jawmiraawo umri bee hunnduko Muusa: “Saa'i juulde nder lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru, Isra'iila'en fuu njooɗo nder bukkaaji.”
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe tawi nder maaka ko Jawmiraawo umri bee hunnduko Muusa: “Saa'i juulde nder lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru, Isra'iila'en fuu njooɗo nder bukkaaji.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ wa kpa zaŋ kalata Heembea nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ‘e: «O be  Israɛl  a̧ ɔ́ nɛ́ kɔ̧ tua-ŋgui wese gbaŋa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ wa kpa zaŋ kalata Heembea nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ so ha̧ Moisɛ‘e: «O be  Israɛl  a̧ ɔ́ nɛ́ kɔ̧ tua-ŋgui wese gbaŋa mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo fio-zɛ,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe wəsə mahalegə nya gezeke nda Shala ke hɛ laka Moyize ne, pa ntsate ŋkwa nya kegeze nda ke ka Israyɛl kezha nza hɛ mbe ghwəli hwa “gəsəkəa ghwəli” te tere kwa mberefaŋe:
Tupurri: Saara wo da'ge de yerge äil jag liñgi maga Manwur hay yern nen do Moyis ga jar Israyel wo nen nage äil mburyug ti wur joñge few ma nen few ma de renam no,

Francais: et qu'ils devaient faire entendre et publier une proclamation dans toutes leurs villes et à Jérusalem, en disant : "Allez à la montagne et rapportez des rameaux d'olivier, des rameaux d'olivier sauvage, des rameaux de myrte, des rameaux de palmier et des rameaux d'arbres touffus pour faire des tentes, selon qu'il est écrit."
Anglais: And that they should publish and proclaim in all their cities, and in Jerusalem, saying, Go forth unto the mount, and fetch olive branches, and pine branches, and myrtle branches, and palm branches, and branches of thick trees, to make booths, as it is written.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: A nisi ma di labar goyo, siwel goy hay hoyok-ziyna visi kaf, hay Yerusalem kaw ala: Cukgiyay goy kay hiɗiyn pa, margi hum-gun olive, hiɗi hum-gu olive ma fulla, hum gu-warana, hum gomona hiɗi gu goɗayna, kay kot guɗukŋa, ki nam ka ɗoy nala.
Bulu: Nalé fe na ba yiane mialane foé e bitisone biab a e Yérusaleme na: Kelane nkôl a nyoñ mebui mʼôlivié, mebui mʼôlivié yʼafan, mebui me mirte, mebui melen a mebui bilé bise bi bili abui mekaé, mi lôñe bibem, avale ntilan ô né.
Guiziga: Yo anja sey a ɓaka ɓi ngi muguzlum misenna, a tilam di mi ar walahay taŋhay gar waɗ a Zeruzalem, a ɓaka mizli: «Bam, a ram nga muwã, nguwoko mihaŋ ngi tutumbur mihirva ti hirvihey ati ngi ɓuhoy, kalaf ngi mirte,   mihaŋ ngi Babazlahay, waɗ mihaŋ ngi widis mutukuf tukufoy, soko taŋ ɓa ngi ɗiya mazlaɓ, kaɓa mutohoko ɓi nah.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde ɓe nani ɗum, ɓe ngooyni nder Urusaliima e gure maɓɓe fuu: “Njehe kooseeje, ngadde lice diga jaytunje gese e jaytunje ladde e asuraaje e dibinooje e leɗɗe cukkuɗe, mbaare bukkaaji, bana ko winnda .”
Fulfulde_DC: Nde ɓe nani ɗum, ɓe ngooyni nder Urusaliima e gure maɓɓe fuu: “Njehe kooseeje, ngadde lice diga jaytunje gese e jaytunje ladde e asuraaje e dibinooje e leɗɗe cukkuɗe, mbaare bukkaaji, bana ko winnda .”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: in wa a̧ tɔ̧́ wen-aa ha̧ bíí lɛŋ sɛn saaye kɔ-wa in sɛn Jerusalɛm hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ zu kaya, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí o wa̧a̧-te-nɔ̧́ nɛ‘i guna in o wan nɛ hɔ nɛ ta-tɛ, wa̧a̧ be-te nɛ pɛr-aa ɔ dee,  wa̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ in o ŋma da̧a̧ wa̧a̧-te wen dea-a nɛ o tua-ŋgui  hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ga.› »
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: in wa a̧ tɔ̧́ wen-aa ha̧ bíí lɛŋ sɛn saaye kɔ-wa in sɛn Jerusalɛm hee mɔ'ɔ ga: ‹Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ zu kaya, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí o wa̧a̧-te-nɔ̧́ nɛ‘i guna in o wan nɛ hɔ nɛ ta-tɛ, wa̧a̧ be-te nɛ pɛr-aa ɔ dee,  wa̧a̧ ndɛŋgɛ in o ŋma da̧a̧ wa̧a̧-te wen dea-a nɛ o tua-ŋgui  hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ so ga.› »
Kapsiki_DC: nahe hɛ kehi kaɗepete ba'a kazlapete ghena ta gəsəkəa shɛ mbe yɛ meleme ta nci ba'a mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm kala nya: «Kwiɗi mə kadzeme yɛ ghweme katsasle dzeve ta yɛ bekele kwa wəza wəza ba'a nyi hwa gamba, ŋa yɛ sewahe, ŋa yɛ peha ba'a yɛ wəfe nyi zhiɓə kezha mene ghwəli, kala nya kerafete geva.»
Tupurri: ga aà wo nen 'wad äay go äi leege äaaran wo äuy lay, go Jerusalem lay gano: Laa wee wo go yoo huuli wo, hrag wee sug koo Olifiye le, sug koo Olifiye ma mbasga, sug koo mirte, sug hare wo de sug koore ma kliäkliä wo ma bag mburyug wo do maga aà de yerge nono.

Francais: Alors le peuple y alla, et ils rapportèrent des rameaux, et ils se firent des tentes chacun sur son toit, dans leurs cours, dans les parvis de la maison de Dieu, sur la place de la porte de l'Eau et sur la place de la porte d'Ephraïm.
Anglais: So the people went forth, and brought them, and made themselves booths, every one upon the roof of his house, and in their courts, and in the courts of the house of God, and in the street of the water gate, and in the street of the gate of Ephraim.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala sumun cuki goyo, nisi maramu. Nisi kot guɗukŋa, gigekaw kulo'o hay wur-daŋŋa vi ziyda vi Lawna, hay liyna vi vun-galana vi niyna, hiɗi vun-galana vi Efrayim.
Bulu: Nde bôte be nga ke a nyoñe mebui bilé mete. Be nga lôñe bebiene bibem, môt ase éfuse si ya nda jé, e minseñe miap, e minseñe ya nda Zambe, e vôme ya mbé mendim, a e vôme ya mbé Efrayim.
Guiziga: Ar nah na, mizli a bam, a nguwoko kalaf ngi ɗiya mazlaɓaya. Mbur gar na, a ɗiyi a hirnga viŋ naŋ midika ti dike, malla a mamay taŋhay, a mamay ngi hay ngi Buymisemuŋ malla ar li misi a mizlingre ngi Yam, waɗ ar li misi a mizlingre Efrayim.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ummaatoore wurti, waddi ɗe. Nden ɓe mbaɗi bukkaaji, koo moy dow soorowol mum, koo haa daldal saare mum. Non boo haa daldal haykaliiru Allah, haa babal yeeso Dammugal Ndiyam e babal yeeso Dammugal Efrayim.
Fulfulde_DC: Ummaatoore wurti, waddi ɗe. Nden ɓe mbaɗi bukkaaji, koo moy dow soorowol mum, koo haa daldal saare mum. Non boo haa daldal haykaliiru Allah, haa babal yeeso Dammugal Ndiyam e babal yeeso Dammugal Efrayim.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dukbíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ɛ́ mɛ kii o mɔɔ-de-tua, ɓɛɛ wa de o tua-ŋgui kɔ-wa, o ŋma sɛn zu tua kɔ‘i, o ŋma sɛn bee-gara kɔ‘i, o ŋma sɛn bee-gara Tua ko Sɔ̧, o ŋma sɛn bee-gara nɛ duk Nú Garo Yì in o ŋma sɛn bee-gara Nú Garo ko Efraim.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dukbíí lɛŋ nɛ̀ɛ́ mɛ kii o mɔɔ-de-tua, ɓɛɛ wa de o tua-ŋgui kɔ-wa, o ŋma sɛn zu tua kɔ‘i, o ŋma sɛn bee-gara kɔ‘i, o ŋma sɛn bee-gara Tua ko Sɔ̧, o ŋma sɛn bee-gara nɛ duk Nú Garo Yì in o ŋma sɛn bee-gara Nú Garo ko Efraim.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka Israyɛl lə kazeleke dzeve ta wəfe kezha mene yɛ ghwəli, ma kweci mbeli ne, pelɛ dɛɓere nya kənəa cɛa nci ŋa nci, kwa zlave ta nci ŋa kweci, dzeyi te ŋwela nya yitea ghɛa Shala ŋa kweci, dzeyi te ŋwela ta mɛ degha ta Yɛmə ŋa kweci ba'a mɛa mɛ degha ta Ɛfrayim ŋa kweci.
Tupurri: Mo so no jarn raw wo laage go, kal wo hragge äe le. Saara raw wo bag mburyug wo, wosela äuy ciñ ti tiñ äe ma de lawge, jar po wo feele äaara wo, äil feele tiñ mani Baa no, ti ngeel ma jag faage Biin wo, ti ngeel ma jag tiñ mani Efrayim no.

Francais: Toute l'assemblée de ceux qui étaient revenus de la captivité fit des tentes et habita sous les tentes. Depuis les jours de Josué, fils de Nun, jusqu'à ce jour, les enfants d'Israël n'avaient rien fait de pareil. Et il y eut de très grandes réjouissances.
Anglais: And all the congregation of them that were come again out of the captivity made booths, and sat under the booths: for since the days of Jeshua the son of Nun unto that day had not the children of Israel done so. And there was very great gladness.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tokŋa vi nisi sa hotay hay gorvot pana kot guɗukŋa; nisi lak hay guɗuk namna. Tam caw tam liyna vi Yosuwa goora vi Nun pa ta-ta tam buur namna, sum sa Israyella bay li va ki kayn nala tuwa, firita li ŋolo.
Bulu: Ekôane bôt ése ya ba be nga so minkôm é nga lôñe bibem a tabe bie si. Ataté melu Yasua mone Nun a kui môse wu, bone bʼIsraél be nji tame bo jame nalé: beta mevak me nga boban.
Guiziga: Mizli mukusom kos kos tuwa gar taŋ, ati mizli mumoko tir beke tuwa, a ɗiyam mazlaɓaya, a hinam angi taŋ. Dambalaka na, zle ti hin ngi Zozuwe, mangal ngi Nun, hã a ndilo hin nah na, Israyeley a gam gwat misi kanah ɗaˀ ta wãˀ. A gi avu taŋ tapasa i hin ngi mumul madiɗa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe jama'aare wartuɓe diga daheeki fuu mbaɗi bukkaaji, njooɗi nder maaji. Diga wakkati Yosuwa ɓii Nuuna haa wargo nyalaade man, Isra'iila'en meetaay waɗugo irin ɗu'um. Ɓe ceyi bee seyo maŋngo.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe jama'aare wartuɓe diga daheeki fuu mbaɗi bukkaaji, njooɗi nder maaji. Diga wakkati Yosuwa ɓii Nuuna haa wargo nyalaade man, Isra'iila'en meetaay waɗugo irin ɗu'um. Ɓe ceyi bee seyo maŋngo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Giiwi lɛŋ nɛ mɔi̧a, o wi nɛ pia nɛ tɛ bara dee tua-ŋgui, ɓɛɛ wa ɔ sɛnɛ. Tɛ ŋgimbi ko Josue bem ko Nun hɔ sɔsɔɔ, o be  Israɛl  de mɔ hegɔ na. Duka nɛ́ mɔɔ gasa desee nyɛmna.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Giiwi lɛŋ nɛ mɔi̧a, o wi nɛ pia nɛ tɛ bara dee tua-ŋgui, ɓɛɛ wa ɔ sɛnɛ. Tɛ ŋgimbi ko Josue bem ko Nun hɔ sɔsɔɔ, o be  Israɛl  de mɔ hegɔ na. Duka nɛ́ mɔɔ gasa desee nyɛmna.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛa mbeli nyi ketsenete geva tagha, nyi kezhɛneke geva nyi menete yɛ ghwəli kantishɛnji mbe. Kavəa zlama nya wəba se vəa shɛ, kwa nza ŋkɛ kegha ka Israyɛl kamenete gəsəkəa shɛ se mɛa vəa Zhozəwɛ, wəzege ta Nəwn we.
Tupurri: Ngaäa jar maga hay wo le ti dañgay day fer wo le mo äuy raw wo bag mburyug wo, saara lag go äil mburyug wo. Tï¡ï¡ le ti kal mani Josuwe je ni Nun haçaç a go ti wur sen mono, jar Israyel joñ wo te mo ma dosen no kay gaa, fruygi joñ debañ debañ ti wur sen ni.

Francais: On lut dans le livre de la loi de Dieu chaque jour, depuis le premier jour jusqu'au dernier. On célébra la fête pendant sept jours, et le huitième jour il y eut une assemblée solennelle, selon le rite prescrit.
Anglais: Also day by day, from the first day unto the last day, he read in the book of the law of God. And they kept the feast seven days; and on the eighth day was a solemn assembly, according unto the manner.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi jaŋ hay ɗerwelda vi gatta vi Lawna, hay buurta kaf, tun caw tam buur ma jewn pa ta-ta tam ma cawna. Nisi li yuldeta ir buur siɗiya, yuldeta ŋolda nisi la' hay buurta glafandita, kuɗ lawta ta colayta.
Bulu: Môs ôse be nga lañ e kalate metiñ été, ataté môs ôsu a kui wu wo suʼulan. Be nga jem abôk tañe melu zamgbwal. Ekôan ja dib abôk é nga boban e môse muame, aval ane ñyeʼelan ô mbe.
Guiziga: Zle avu hin muɓulaˀ ngi muguzlumo, hã avu hin ngi dirba naŋ wãˀ na, Esdras ara slufa taŋ ɗerewol Ɓimujuwa ngi Buymisemuŋ vur hin gar. A gaka muguzlumo hã hin tarnaˀa. Yo angi sirik taŋ, hin midangafaɗ naŋ na, a gam di kus madiɗa ngi kiɗa mi naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kala nyalaade fuu ɓe njaŋngani ɓe deftere tawreeta Allah, diga nyalaade aranndeere haa ragareere. Ɓe mbaɗi juulde man nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi. Nyalaade joweetataɓre boo ɓe mbaɗi mooɓtorde senaande, bana ko umra.
Fulfulde_DC: Kala nyalaade fuu ɓe njaŋngani ɓe deftere tawreeta Allah, diga nyalaade aranndeere haa ragareere. Ɓe mbaɗi juulde man nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi. Nyalaade joweetataɓre boo ɓe mbaɗi mooɓtorde senaande, bana ko umra.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra mɔ zaŋ Kalata Heembea ko Sɔ̧ dam ɗoŋ wese gbaŋa'i lɛŋ, hɔ nɛnɛ sɔŋkur-aa. Gbaŋa'i duka tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa mɔi̧ kaɗi nɛnɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ɔɔ-zɛ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yɔra so.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra mɔ zaŋ Kalata Heembea ko Sɔ̧ dam ɗoŋ wese gbaŋa'i lɛŋ, hɔ nɛnɛ sɔŋkur-aa. Gbaŋa'i duka tɛ zɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, ɓɛɛ wa mɔi̧ kaɗi nɛnɛ tɛ mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-taar ɔɔ-zɛ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yɔra so.
Kapsiki_DC: Mbe yayata vecia gəsəkə, se te kwa ghate ta hɛ pa te kwa keɗaŋe, pa mbeli jaŋgate kwete ŋkwa mbe palepa ta wəsə mahalegəa Shala. Hɛ mberefaŋe menete gəsəkə, ma te deghese ta hɛ, pa mbeli menete tsene nya wəba kala nya seneve mbeli kamene.
Tupurri: AÈ hay keege äil kefder jag liñgi mani Baan nen naw tum, tï¡ï¡ le ti naw ma tañgun haçaç wo go ti naw ma blam no. AÀ raw joñ few nen naw renam day aè kal joñ tayge ma kluu ti naw ma de nenma'n do maga aà joñn tum nono.

Francais: Le vingt-quatrième jour du même mois, les enfants d'Israël s'assemblèrent pour un jeûne, revêtus de sacs, avec de la poussière sur la tête.
Anglais: Now in the twenty and fourth day of this month the children of Israel were assembled with fasting, and with sackclothes, and earth upon them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buurta dok-ma' yam fiɗita vi til namna, sum sa Israyella tok tuwsiya, nisi cuk sligar bolla tisiya, goɓ tuwsi hiɗi nagana kaw, kay li laata.
Bulu: Ngon éte é too melu mewôm mebaé a menyin, bone bʼIsraél be nga sulan be beʼe minkuta a nyôle ñwoʼon asub a étek asu mbômbane zaé ya kañe Zambe.
Guiziga: Angi hin kukur cuw nga mufaɗ ngi kiya mitarnaˀ naŋ nah na, Israyeleye, zana ngi vagay ɓaˀ ɓaˀ avu vu, yo hohoy kor kor avu vu, dar a kusom ɓa a gam dalyam.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyannde noogas e nayaɓre lewru man, Isra'iila'en mooɓti, ɓe cuumi, ɓe ɓorni limce buhuuje, ɓe ukki mbulwuldi dow ko'e maɓɓe .
Fulfulde_DC: Nyannde noogas e nayaɓre lewru man, Isra'iila'en mooɓti, ɓe cuumi, ɓe ɓorni limce buhuuje, ɓe ukki mbulwuldi dow ko'e maɓɓe .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ kpɔk fio-zɛ‘i tɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ, o be  Israɛl  mɔi̧a ŋmaa; wa lɛŋ pi̧i̧ nɛ́ laa-bufu, ɓɛɛ tɛ-wa lɛŋ nɛ́ fuunu, wen ha̧ wa mɛ zim yì.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ kpɔk fio-zɛ‘i tɛ ɓu-yiitoo-zua-naar ɔɔ-zɛ, o be  Israɛl  mɔi̧a ŋmaa; wa lɛŋ pi̧i̧ nɛ́ laa-bufu, ɓɛɛ tɛ-wa lɛŋ nɛ́ fuunu, wen ha̧ wa mɛ zim yì.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe hɛ kwa bakemsə wəfaɗeghəmbe te terea shɛnyɛ ne, pa ka Israyɛl tsenete geva kezha mene səwəmayɛ. Pa hɛ hwepahwe wəsə hwa hwə, kərəaghe keləwə kənəa ghəa nci.
Tupurri: Nen naw do äog ti naa nen few se ma de renamn mono, jar Israyel kal wo tayge le de lag bugu wo ti de sir ma heçeç bii.

Francais: Ceux qui étaient de la race d'Israël, s'étant séparés de tous les fils de l'étranger, se tinrent debout et confessèrent leurs péchés et les iniquités de leurs pères.
Anglais: And the seed of Israel separated themselves from all strangers, and stood and confessed their sins, and the iniquities of their fathers.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi sa hay jafna vi Israyel poŋ irsi goy hiɗi sa pulla, nisi co'o kay ham sulukŋa visiya hiɗi sulukŋa vi sumaysiya.
Bulu: Eyoñe bôte bese ya mvoñe Israél be maneya kandan a bikuu be nga sulane vôme wua, asu ya meme minseme miab a bikobe bʼésaa bap.
Guiziga: Mizli misi taŋ i sukwi Israyel gar na, a ngicam ngac pal taŋ avu mizli mulakaya, a cifam baˀ pal taŋ ɓa a njikaka mungra taŋhay ati ngi dideˀ taŋhay aya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Isra'iila'en ceedi bee jananɓe, ɓe ndari, ɓe mbaŋgini hakkeeji maɓɓe e aybeeji kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe yeeso Allah.
Fulfulde_DC: Isra'iila'en ceedi bee jananɓe, ɓe ndari, ɓe mbaŋgini hakkeeji maɓɓe e aybeeji kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe yeeso Allah.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O mgbák be  Israɛl  kɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛ̀ nɛ o gɛnɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa gbar ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa in o ko o dáà kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O mgbák be  Israɛl  kɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛ̀ nɛ o gɛnɛ lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ wa gbar ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa in o ko o dáà kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ nehemte geva le mbeli nyi keɗema kaka Zhəwif, ntake hɛ kampi dzeve te jaɗafa ta nci ba'a ŋa ka shihɛ nci.
Tupurri: Jar maga sen hay wo ti wer mani Israyel raw wo caa äil see äaara go de waaren wo äuy, day aà wo ma wii fuggi äil ti älagge äaaran wo de debaycoçoçre mani paçaçre äaaran wo.

Francais: Lorsqu'ils se furent levés à leur place, ils lurent dans le livre de la loi de Yahweh, leur Dieu, pendant un quart de la journée, et, pendant un autre quart, ils confessèrent leurs péchés et adorèrent Yahweh, leur Dieu.
Anglais: And they stood up in their place, and read in the book of the law of the  Lord  their God one fourth part of the day; and another fourth part they confessed, and worshipped the  Lord  their God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nisi lak kulo'o hay liyna visiya visiya, nisi jaŋ hay ɗerwella vi gatta vi Ma-Vatɗina, Lawna visiya, ir gal ma fiɗina vi fatta kepe; ir gal ma fiɗina vi fatta lo, nisi ham sulukŋa visi goyo, nisi girif gaa vok Ma-Vatɗina Lawna visiya.
Bulu: Eyoñe be nga tebe tetele e vôme wop, be nga lañe kalate metiñe Nti, e Zambe wop, tañe mewolo mela; tañe mewolo mefe mela, be nga meme minseme miap, a kumbu si asu Nti, e Zambe wop.
Guiziga: A zlaka a slikiɗam tir li cifi taŋhaya, deŋ deŋ yom, dar ara cinaka maslufaka taŋ ɗerewol ngi Ɓimujuwa ngi Bumbulvuŋ, Buymisemuŋ taŋ na, hã ler makir. Yo ar ler makir mekelemeye ma na, ara njikaka mungra taŋhay, a hurukom huruk huruk a mbuŋ Bumbulvuŋ, Buymisemuŋ taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koo moy dari haa nokkuure mum. Ɓe nani jaŋgɗe deftere tawreeta Jawmiraawo Allah maɓɓe, baakin saa'aaji tati. Saa'aaji tati feere ɓe mbaŋgini hakkeeji maɓɓe, ɓe cujidani Allah Jawmiraawo maɓɓe.
