Tupurri: go Sanowa, go Adulam wo de äi leege ma ti äaaran wo go Lakis de prog äe no, go Aseka de sir ma ti äen wo. Saara lag tiñ le Beer-Seba haçaç a go ti log Hinom.

Francais: Des fils de Benjamin s'établirent depuis Geba, à Machmas, à Haï, à Béthel et dans les villes de sa dépendance,
Anglais: The children also of Benjamin from Geba dwelt at Michmash, and Aija, and Beth–el, and in their villages,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Benyamin lak kayni tun caw hay Geba pa, hay Mikmas, hay Aya, hay Betel hiɗi naga ma kuɗa'na,
Bulu: Bone be Bényamin be nga tabe ataté Géba, Mikmak, Aya, Bétél a mevôm me tii a nye,
Guiziga: Mizli ngi Benjameŋheye, a pam zle a Geba, Mikmas, Aya, Betel ati purok naŋhaya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe Benyamin njooɗi haa Geba e Mikmas e Ayya, haa Baytila e gure maagol,
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe Benyamin njooɗi haa Geba e Mikmas e Ayya, haa Baytila e gure maagol,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Bɛnjamin ɔɔ kɔ‘i ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Gɛba, Mikmas, Aya, Bɛtɛl gú nɛ̀ o be ye mɛ ká̧ a̧;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Bɛnjamin ɔɔ kɔ‘i ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ Gɛba, Mikmas, Aya, Bɛtɛl gú nɛ̀ o be ye mɛ ká̧ a̧;
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbeli nyi kwa yita ta Bɛnjamɛn nzanji mbe yɛ Gɛba, Mikmas, Aya, Bɛtɛl le meleme nyi dzeyi yite,
Tupurri: Jar Benjame lag wo le Geba haçaç wo wo go Mikmase, go Aya, go Betel de sir ma ti äen wo,

Francais: à Anathoth, à Nob, à Anania, à Asor,
Anglais: And at Anathoth, Nob, Ananiah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay Anatot, hay Nob, hay Hananiya,
Bulu: Anatôt, Nob, Anania.
Guiziga: a Anatot, Nop, Ananiya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: haa Anatot e Noba e Ananiya,
Fulfulde_DC: haa Anatot e Noba e Ananiya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: in Anatot, Nɔb, Anania,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: in Anatot, Nɔb, Anania,
Kapsiki_DC: Anatot, Nob, Ananiya,
Tupurri: go Anatod, go Nob, go Hananiya,

Francais: à Rama, à Géthaïm, à Hadid,
Anglais: Hazor, Ramah, Gittaim,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay Hatsor, hay Rama, hay Gittayim,
Bulu: Asor, Rama, Gutayim,
Guiziga: Hasor, Rama, Gitayim,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: haa Hacoor e Rama e Gittayim,
Fulfulde_DC: haa Hacoor e Rama e Gittayim,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hasɔr, Rama, Gitayim,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hasɔr, Rama, Gitayim,
Kapsiki_DC: Hasor, Rama, Gitayim,
Tupurri: go Hatsor, go Rama, go Gitayim,

Francais: à Séboïm, à Néballat,
Anglais: Hadid, Zeboim, Neballat,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay Hadid, hay Seboyim, hay Neballat,
Bulu: Adib, Tebôyim, Nebalat
Guiziga: Hadit, Seboyim, Nebalat,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: haa Hadida e Cebo'im e Neballat,
Fulfulde_DC: haa Hadida e Cebo'im e Neballat,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hadid, Sɛboim, Nɛbalat;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hadid, Sɛboim, Nɛbalat;
Kapsiki_DC: Hadid, Seboyim, Nebalat,
Tupurri: go Hadid, go Seboyim, go Nebalad,

Francais: à Lod et à Ono, dans la Vallée des Ouvriers.
Anglais: Lod, and Ono, the valley of craftsmen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay Lod hiɗi Ono, lokŋa vi sa kot slena.
Bulu: Lod, Onô, mbiʼili bekôme biôm a mo.
Guiziga: Lot, Ono waɗ ar sozo ngi mizli misina ɗiya gwat ngi gi ti haŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: haa Lodo e Oono e nder waadiwol Waɗooɓe Sanaa'a.
Fulfulde_DC: haa Lodo e Oono e nder waadiwol Waɗooɓe Sanaa'a.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Lod, Ɔnɔ sɛn kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ko o Wi-de-tom-nɛ-er.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Lod, Ɔnɔ sɛn kɔ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ ko o Wi-de-tom-nɛ-er.
Kapsiki_DC: Lod, Ono ba'a kwa zlərəa ka ɗepe mene wəshi.
Tupurri: go Lod wo de Ono, log mani jar bag do ti joñre ma defeë defeën wo.

Francais: Il y eut, parmi les lévites, des classes appartenant à Juda qui se joignirent à Benjamin.
Anglais: And of the Levites were divisions in Judah, and in Benjamin.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jar sa Levitna, sum segen yaway goy hay Yuda pa jok hay Benyamin.
Bulu: Bevoʼo ya Belévit be nga too e Yuda be nga ke lat a Bényamin.
Guiziga: Mekelemey a wuzla Leviheye, a slikiɗam baɗ a ruwuy Zuda nga ruwuy Benjameŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lewi'en woɗɓe nder geɓe Yahuuda ndilli haa lesdi Benyamin.
Fulfulde_DC: Lewi'en woɗɓe nder geɓe Yahuuda ndilli haa lesdi Benyamin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋma be Levii nɛ ɔɔ so ye tɛ nù Juda nɛɛ de ye sɛn nú Bɛnjamin.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋma be Levii nɛ ɔɔ so ye tɛ nù Juda nɛɛ de ye sɛn nú Bɛnjamin.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa kweci wəvəsəa ka Lɛvi slənji shave mbe hɛɗia Zhəwda le ghɛ kalə kadzete ŋa Bɛnjamɛn.
Tupurri: Jar Lefid ma yoo jar Juda po raw wo wo laa tiñ yoo jar Benjame wo.

Francais: Voici les prêtres et les lévites qui revinrent avec Zorobabel, fils de Salathiel, et avec Josué:
Anglais: Now these are the priests and the Levites that went up with Zerubbabel the son of Shealtiel, and Jeshua: Seraiah, Jeremiah, Ezra,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna sa fokay goy hiɗi Zorobabel goora vi Seyaltiyel, hiɗi Yosuwa: Seraya, Yeremiyas, Esdras,
Bulu: Betuni a Belévit be nga so mekaban ba be Zôrôbabél mone Séaltiél, a Yasua, mbe ba: Seraya, Irméya, Ezra,
Guiziga: Masayay ati levihey munduloko ati Zorobabel, mangal ngi Seyaltiyel, waɗ Yesuwa na, i ti: Seraya, Irmeya, Esra,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa inɗe liman'en e Lewi'en warduɓe bee Zorobaabila ɓii Salatiyel e Yeesu'a: Seraya, Yeremiya, Esira,
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa inɗe liman'en e Lewi'en warduɓe bee Zorobaabila ɓii Salatiyel e Yeesu'a: Seraya, Yeremiya, Esira,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ pia so in Zorobabɛl, bem ko Sealtiɛl, in Yesua nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Sɛraya, Irmeya, Ɛsdras;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ pia so in Zorobabɛl, bem ko Sealtiɛl, in Yesua nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Sɛraya, Irmeya, Ɛsdras;
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi sləa ka dzeghe Shala le ka Lɛvi nyi kezhɛneke geva zlaɓe le Zorobabɛl, wəzege ta Shɛyaltiyɛl ba'a Yɛshəwa nyi: yɛ Seraya, Zhɛrɛmi, Ɛzra,
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu jar sië jagn wo de jar Lefid maga fer wo le wer Sorobabel je ni Sealtiyeln wo de Josuwe mono: AÀ hay wo diñ Seraya, Jermi, Esdras,

Francais: Saraïas, Jérémie, Esdras, Amarias, Melluch,
Anglais: Amariah, Malluch, Hattush,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Amariya, Malluk, Hattus,
Bulu: Amaria, Maluk, Atuk,
Guiziga: Amariya, Maluk, Hatus,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Amariya, Malluku, Hattus,
Fulfulde_DC: Amariya, Malluku, Hattus,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Amaria, Maluk, Hatus;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Amaria, Maluk, Hatus;
Kapsiki_DC: Amariya, Maləwk, Hatəwsh,
Tupurri: Amariya, Malug, Hatus,

Francais: Hattus, Sechénias, Réhum, Mérimuth,
Anglais: Shechaniah, Rehum, Meremoth,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sekaniya, Rehum, Meremot,
Bulu: Sekania, Rehum, Merémôt,
Guiziga: Sekaniya, Rehum, Meremot,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sekaniya, Rehum, Meremot,
Fulfulde_DC: Sekaniya, Rehum, Meremot,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛkania, Rɛhum, Mɛrɛmɔt;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛkania, Rɛhum, Mɛrɛmɔt;
Kapsiki_DC: Shekaniya, Rehəwm, Merɛmot,
Tupurri: Sekaniya, Rehum, Meremod,

Francais: Addo, Genthon, Abias,
Anglais: Iddo, Ginnetho, Abijah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Iddo, Ginnetoy, Abiya,
Bulu: Iddô, Ginetôyi; Abia,
Guiziga: Ido, Ginetoy, Abiya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Iddo, Ginnetoy, Abiyya,
Fulfulde_DC: Iddo, Ginnetoy, Abiyya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ido, Ginɛtɔi, Abia;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ido, Ginɛtɔi, Abia;
Kapsiki_DC: Ido, Ginetoy, Abiya,
Tupurri: Ido, Ginetoy, Abiya,

Francais: Miamin, Maadias, Belga, Seméïas,
Anglais: Miamin, Maadiah, Bilgah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Miryamin, Maadiya, Bilga,
Bulu: Miamin, Maadia, Bilga,
Guiziga: Miyamin, Maˀadiya, Bilga,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Miyamin, Ma'adiya, Bilga,
Fulfulde_DC: Miyamin, Ma'adiya, Bilga,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Miyamin, Madia, Bilga;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Miyamin, Madia, Bilga;
Kapsiki_DC: Miyamin, Ma'adiya, Bilga,
Tupurri: Miryamin, Maadiya, Bilga,

Francais: Joïarib, Idaïas, Sellum, Amoc, Helcias, Idaïas.
Anglais: Shemaiah, and Joiarib, Jedaiah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Semayeya, Yoyarib, Yedaya,
Bulu: Semaya, Yôyarib, Yedaya,
Guiziga: Semaya, Yoyarip, Yedaya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sema'ya, Yoyaribu, Yeda'ya,
Fulfulde_DC: Sema'ya, Yoyaribu, Yeda'ya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛmaya, Yɔyarib, Yɛdaya;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛmaya, Yɔyarib, Yɛdaya;
Kapsiki_DC: Shemaya, Yoyarib, Yedaya,
Tupurri: Semaeya, Yoyarib, Yedaeya,

Francais: Ce furent là les chefs des prêtres et de leurs frères au temps de Josué.
Anglais: Sallu, Amok, Hilkiah, Jedaiah. These were the chief of the priests and of their brethren in the days of Jeshua.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sallu, Amok, Hilkiya, Yedaya, kayni si muliyan ŋulo sa-ɗifinna hiɗi ɓosiyosina, hay liyna vi Yosuwa.
Bulu: Salu, Amôk, Ilkuia a Yedaya. Melu Yesua, bana bese be mbe bivete ya menda betuni a Belévit.
Guiziga: Salu, Amok, Hilkiya waɗ Yedaya. Ti hin ngi Yesuwa na, mizli hanayna gar, i buy ngi masayay ati ngi sukum taŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sallu, Amok, Hilkiyya, Yeda'ya. Kamɓe ngoni ardiiɓe liman'en e deerɗiraaɓe maɓɓe nder zamanu Yeesu'a.
Fulfulde_DC: Sallu, Amok, Hilkiyya, Yeda'ya. Kamɓe ngoni ardiiɓe liman'en e deerɗiraaɓe maɓɓe nder zamanu Yeesu'a.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Salu, Amɔk, Hilkia, Yɛdaya. O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ o gasawi zu o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in zu o be Levii tɛ ŋgimbi ko Yesua.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Salu, Amɔk, Hilkia, Yɛdaya. O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ o gasawi zu o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in zu o be Levii tɛ ŋgimbi ko Yesua.
Kapsiki_DC: Saləw, Amok, Hilkiya le Yedaya. Ma te vəa Yɛshəwa ne, pɛtɛa mbeli nyi kese kambeli nyi te ghəa ka dzeghe Shala le ka Lɛvi.
Tupurri: Salu, Amog, Hilkiya, Yedaeya. Sen mo na diñ jar kluuri jar sië jagn wo de heçeçre äaaran wo ti wur mani Josuwen mono.

Francais: Lévites : Josué, Bennui, Cedmiel, Sarébias, Juda, Mathanias, qui était préposé, avec ses frères, au chant des louanges;
Anglais: Moreover the Levites: Jeshua, Binnui, Kadmiel, Sherebiah, Judah, and Mattaniah, which was over the thanksgiving, he and his brethren.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa Levitna: Yosuwa, Binnuy, Kadmiyel, Serebiya, Yuda, Mattaniya, ma hiɗi ɓosiyomna ka sli nul ma suburta;
Bulu: Bevoʼo ya Belévit be mbe môé na: Yesua, Binui, Kadmiél, Kérébia, Yeuda a Matania. Matania a bobenyañe bé be nga bo ésaé nyiane bia.
Guiziga: A wuzla Leviheye i ti: Yesuwa, Binuwi, Kaɗmiyel, Serebiya, Yehuda ati Mataniya. Mataniya ati sukum naŋhaya, slra taŋ i zli dimis ngi hunuma Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lewi'en ngoni: Yeesu'a, Binnuy, Kadmiyel, Serebiya, Yahuuda e Mattaniya. Kaŋko e deerɗiraaɓe maako ngoni halfitinaaɓe gime maŋgtooje.
Fulfulde_DC: Lewi'en ngoni: Yeesu'a, Binnuy, Kadmiyel, Serebiya, Yahuuda e Mattaniya. Kaŋko e deerɗiraaɓe maako ngoni halfitinaaɓe gime maŋgtooje.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be Levii nɛ́ Yesua, Binui, Kadmiɛl, Sɛrɛbia, Yehuda in Matania. Matania in o bíí kɔ‘i nɛ́ o wi-ba-ger gima-gasi Sɔ̧,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be Levii nɛ́ Yesua, Binui, Kadmiɛl, Sɛrɛbia, Yehuda in Matania. Matania in o bíí kɔ‘i nɛ́ o wi-ba-ger gima-gasi Sɔ̧,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma hwa ka Lɛvi ne, yɛ: Yɛshəwa, Binəwi, Kadmiyɛl, Shɛrɛbiya, Yehəwda ba'a Mataniya. Yɛ Mataniya le ka menəhɛnyɛ ka gha cimə ketsahe Shala,
Tupurri: Jar Lefid hay wo diñ Josuwe, Benuwi, Kadmiyel, Serebiya, Juda wo de Mataniya je maga hay wo de heçeçre äe oodge pel seege de siñ togoëgen wo mono,

Francais: Becbécias et Hanni, leurs frères, formaient dans le service le choeur opposé.
Anglais: Also Bakbukiah and Unni, their brethren, were over against them in the watches.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bakbukiya, hiɗi Unni, sa ka li lopna vok irsiya.
Bulu: Bekbukia a Uni ba be be be nga bo ésaé bebé vôme wua.
Guiziga: Bakbukiya ati Uni, sukum taŋ Leviheye, taŋ dedeŋ, hiri pulaˀ pulaˀ ng'ar taŋ, ɓa ngi tiɓa dimise.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bakbukiya e Unni e deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum'en tiitotiri bee maɓɓe nder kuuɗe muuɗum'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Bakbukiya e Unni e deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum'en tiitotiri bee maɓɓe nder kuuɗe muuɗum'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ Bakbukia in Uni nɛ duka so nɛ́ o ŋma be Levii mbɛt yora tan ti wa kɔ̧ nɛ gima nú wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ Bakbukia in Uni nɛ duka so nɛ́ o ŋma be Levii mbɛt yora tan ti wa kɔ̧ nɛ gima nú wa.
Kapsiki_DC: nda zhɛne nda yɛ Bakbəwkiya le Əwni, ka menəhɛ nci nyi kemene slene kwa kema ta nci ke hɛ.
Tupurri: diñ Bakbukiya wo de Uni maga hay wo lagge pel äaara jag joñre mono.

Francais: Josué engendra Joakim, Joakim engendra Eliasib, Eliasib engendra Joïada,
Anglais: And Jeshua begat Joiakim, Joiakim also begat Eliashib, and Eliashib begat Joiada,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosuwa vuɗ Yoyakim, Yoyakim vuɗ Eliyasib, Eliyasib vuɗ Yoyada,
Bulu: Yasua a nga biaé Yôyakim, Yôyakim a nga biaé Eliasib, Eliasib a nga biaé Yôyada.
Guiziga: Yesuwa a yi Yoyakim, Yoyakim a yi Eliyasip, Eliyasip a yi Yoyada,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yeesu'a danyi Yooyakim, Yooyakim danyi Eliyasib, Eliyasib danyi Yoyada,
Fulfulde_DC: Yeesu'a danyi Yooyakim, Yooyakim danyi Eliyasib, Eliyasib danyi Yoyada,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yesua kòó Yoyakim, Yoyakim kòó Eliasib, Eliasib kòó Yoyada,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yesua kòó Yoyakim, Yoyakim kòó Eliasib, Eliasib kòó Yoyada,
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛshəwa ya kayitenyɛa Zhowakim, Zhowakim ya kaŋa Ɛliyashib, Ɛliyashib ya kaŋa Yoyada,
Tupurri: Josuwe biñ Yoyakim, Yoyakim raw biñ Eliyakib, Eliyakib raw biñ Yoyada.

Francais: Joïada engendra Jonathan, et Jonathan engendra Jeddoa.
Anglais: And Joiada begat Jonathan, and Jonathan begat Jaddua.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yoyada vuɗ Yonatan, Yonatan vuɗ Yadduwa.
Bulu: Yôyada a nga biaé Yadua.
Guiziga: Yoyada a yi Yonataŋ, yo Yonataŋ a yi Yaduwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yoyada danyi Yonatan, Yonatan danyi Yaddu'a.
Fulfulde_DC: Yoyada danyi Yonatan, Yonatan danyi Yaddu'a.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yoyada kòó Yɔnataŋ, ɓɛɛ Yɔnataŋ kó Yadua.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yoyada kòó Yɔnataŋ, ɓɛɛ Yɔnataŋ kó Yadua.
Kapsiki_DC: Yoyada ya kaŋa Yonatan, Yonatan ya kaŋa Yadəwa.
Tupurri: Yoyada raw biñ Jonatañ day Jonatañ raw biñ Jaduwa.

Francais: Voici quels étaient, au temps de Joakim, les prêtres, chefs de famille : pour Saraïas, Maraïas; pour Jérémie, Ananie;
Anglais: And in the days of Joiakim were priests, the chief of the fathers: of Seraiah, Meraiah; of Jeremiah, Hananiah;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si muliyan-sa-ɗifinna sa hay liyna vi Yoyakim, sa ŋulona vi jafna: Kay Seraya, Meraya, kay Yeremiyas, Hananiya;
Bulu: Betuni ya melu Yôyakim be too bivete ya menda me bôt mbe ba: Méraya asu Seraya; Anania asu Yérémi,
Guiziga: Ti hin ngi Yoyakim na, buy ngi hayaya, masayay ani: asi muy ngi Serayahay i Meraya, asi ngi Irmeyahaya, i Hananiya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder zamanu Yooyakim, ɓe'e ngoni baaba-ci'e'en liman'en: Meraya ngam saare Seraya, Hananiya ngam saare Yeremiya,
Fulfulde_DC: Nder zamanu Yooyakim, ɓe'e ngoni baaba-ci'e'en liman'en: Meraya ngam saare Seraya, Hananiya ngam saare Yeremiya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ ŋgimbi ko Yoyakim, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ yaa nɛ́ o gasawi nutua nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: tɛ nutua ko Sɛraya nɛ́ Mɛraya, ko Irmeya nɛ́ Hanania,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ ŋgimbi ko Yoyakim, o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ yaa nɛ́ o gasawi nutua nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: tɛ nutua ko Sɛraya nɛ́ Mɛraya, ko Irmeya nɛ́ Hanania,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te və nya se Zhowakim kawəndə kwelea ka dzeghe Shala ne, mbeli nyi ya kambeli nyi kese te ghəa ghɛa ka dzeghe Shala: Meraya ya kaŋa ghɛa Seraya, Hananiya ya kaŋa ghɛa Zhɛrɛmi,
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu jar sië jag maga hay wo diñ wañre ma ti feele wo ti kal mani Yoyakimn mono: Ti feele mani Serayan diñ Meraya, ti mani Jermin diñ Hananiya,

Francais: pour Esdras, Mosollam; pour Amarias, Johanan;
Anglais: Of Ezra, Meshullam; of Amariah, Jehohanan;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay Esdras, Mesullam; kay Amariya, Yohanan;
Bulu: Mesulam asu Esdras, Yôanañ asu Amaria,
Guiziga: asi ngi Ezraˀahaya, i Mesulam, asi ngi Amariyahaya, i Yohanaŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mesullam ngam saare Esira, Yehohanan ngam saare Amariya,
Fulfulde_DC: Mesullam ngam saare Esira, Yehohanan ngam saare Amariya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Ɛsdras nɛ́ Mɛsulam, ko Amaria nɛ́ Yohanaŋ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Ɛsdras nɛ́ Mɛsulam, ko Amaria nɛ́ Yohanaŋ,
Kapsiki_DC: Meshəwlam ya kaŋa ghɛa Ɛzra, Yohanan ya kaŋa ghɛa Amariya,
Tupurri: ti mani Esdras diñ Mesulam, ti mani Amariyan diñ Johanan,

Francais: pour Milicho, Jonathan ; pour Sébénias, Joseph;
Anglais: Of Melicu, Jonathan; of Shebaniah, Joseph;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay Meluki, Yonatan; kay Sebaniya, Yosef;
Bulu: Yônatañ asu Meluki, Yôsep asu Sebania,
Guiziga: asi ngi Melukuhoyo i Yonataŋ, asi ngi Sebaniyahaya, i Zozef,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yonatan ngam saare Meliku, Yusufu ngam saare Sebaniya,
Fulfulde_DC: Yonatan ngam saare Meliku, Yusufu ngam saare Sebaniya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Mɛliu nɛ́ Yɔnataŋ, ko Sɛbania nɛ́ Jɔzɛf,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Mɛliu nɛ́ Yɔnataŋ, ko Sɛbania nɛ́ Jɔzɛf,
Kapsiki_DC: Yonatan ya kaŋa ghɛa Melikəw, Zhozɛf ya kaŋa ghɛa Shebaniya,
Tupurri: ti mani Melukin diñ Jonatañ, ti mani Sebaniyan de Josef,

Francais: pour Haram, Edna ; pour Maraïoth, Helci ;
Anglais: Of Harim, Adna; of Meraioth, Helkai;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay Harim, Adna; kay Merayot, Helkay;
Bulu: Adna asu Arim; Elkayi asu Merayôt,
Guiziga: asi ngi Harimeye, i Atna, asi ngi Merayotoy, i Helkay,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Adna ngam saare Harim, Helkay ngam saare Merayot,
Fulfulde_DC: Adna ngam saare Harim, Helkay ngam saare Merayot,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Harim nɛ́ Adna, ko Mɛrayot nɛ́ Hɛlkai,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Harim nɛ́ Adna, ko Mɛrayot nɛ́ Hɛlkai,
Kapsiki_DC: Adna ya kaŋa ghɛa Harim, Hɛlkay ya kaŋa ghɛa Merayot,
Tupurri: ti mani Harimn diñ Ada, ti mani Merayodn diñ Helkay,

Francais: pour Addo, Zacharie ; pour Genthon, Mosollam ;
Anglais: Of Iddo, Zechariah; of Ginnethon, Meshullam;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay Iddo, Zakariya, kay Ginneton, Mesullam;
Bulu: Zakari asu Iddô; Mesulam asu Ginetôn;
Guiziga: Zakari asi ngi Idohoy, Mesulam asi ngi Ginetoŋhoy,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Zekariya ngam saare Iddo, Mesullam ngam saare Ginneton,
Fulfulde_DC: Zekariya ngam saare Iddo, Mesullam ngam saare Ginneton,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Ido nɛ́ Zakarii, ko Ginɛtɔŋ nɛ́ Mɛsulam,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Ido nɛ́ Zakarii, ko Ginɛtɔŋ nɛ́ Mɛsulam,
Kapsiki_DC: Zakari ya kaŋa ghɛa Ido, Meshəwlam ya kaŋa ghɛa Gineton,
Tupurri: ti mani Idon diñ Sakari, ti mani Ginetonn diñ Mesulam,

Francais: pour Abias, Zéchri; pour Miamin et Moadias, Phelti ;
Anglais: Of Abijah, Zichri; of Miniamin, of Moadiah, Piltai;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay Abiya, Zikri; kay Minyamin hiɗi Mowadiya, Piltay;
Bulu: Zikri asu Abia Piltayi asu Minyamin a Môadia;
Guiziga: Zikri asi ngi Abiyahay, mbur ngi Miniyaminey, Piltay asi ngi Moˀadiyahay,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Zikiri ngam saare Abiyya, Piltay ngam ci'e Miyamin e Mo'adiya,
Fulfulde_DC: Zikiri ngam saare Abiyya, Piltay ngam ci'e Miyamin e Mo'adiya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Abia nɛ́ Zikri, ko Miniamin nɛ́... , ko Mɔadia nɛ́ Piltai,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Abia nɛ́ Zikri, ko Miniamin nɛ́... , ko Mɔadia nɛ́ Piltai,
Kapsiki_DC: Zikri ya kaŋa ghɛa Abiya, kaŋa ghɛa Miniyamin ne, ... Piltay ya kaŋa ghɛa Mowadiya,
Tupurri: ti mani Abiyan diñ Sikri, ti mani Miniyamin wo de Moadiyan diñ Piltay,

Francais: pour Belga, Sammua ; pour Séméias, Jonathan;
Anglais: Of Bilgah, Shammua; of Shemaiah, Jonathan;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay Bilga, Sammuwa; kay Semayeya, Yonatan;
Bulu: Samua asu Bilga; Yônatan asu Semaéya;
Guiziga: Samiwa asi ngi Bilgahay, Yonataŋ asi ngi Semayahay,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sammu'a ngam saare Bilga, Yonatan ngam saare Sema'ya,
Fulfulde_DC: Sammu'a ngam saare Bilga, Yonatan ngam saare Sema'ya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Bilga nɛ́ Samua, ko Sɛmaya nɛ́ Yɔnataŋ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Bilga nɛ́ Samua, ko Sɛmaya nɛ́ Yɔnataŋ,
Kapsiki_DC: Shaməwa ya kaŋa ghɛa Bilga, Yonatan ya kaŋa ghɛa Shemaya,
Tupurri: ti mani Bilgan diñ Samuwa, ti mani Yedaeyan diñ Jonatañ,

Francais: pour Joïarib, Mathanaï ; pour Jodaïas, Azzi ;
Anglais: And of Joiarib, Mattenai; of Jedaiah, Uzzi;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay Yoyarib, Matnay; kay Yedaya, Uzzi;
Bulu: Matnayi asu Yôyarib; Uzi asu Yedaéya,
Guiziga: Matenay asi ngi Yoyaripey, Uzi asi ngi Yedayahay,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mattenay ngam saare Yoyaribu, Uzzi ngam saare Yeda'ya,
Fulfulde_DC: Mattenay ngam saare Yoyaribu, Uzzi ngam saare Yeda'ya,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Yɔyarib nɛ́ Matɛnai, ko Yɛdaya nɛ́ Uzi,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Yɔyarib nɛ́ Matɛnai, ko Yɛdaya nɛ́ Uzi,
Kapsiki_DC: Matenay ya kaŋa ghɛa Yoyarib, Əwzi ya kaŋa ghɛa Yedaya,
Tupurri: ti mani Yoyaribn diñ Matnay, ti mani Yedaeya diñ Usi,

Francais: pour Sellaï, Célaï; pour Amoc, Héber;
Anglais: Of Sallai, Kallai; of Amok, Eber;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay Sallay, Kallay; kay Amok, Eber;
Bulu: Kalayi asu Salayi; Eber asu Amôk;
Guiziga: Kalay asi ngi Salayay, Eber asi ngi Amokoy,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kallay ngam saare Sallay, Eber ngam saare Amok,
Fulfulde_DC: Kallay ngam saare Sallay, Eber ngam saare Amok,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Salai nɛ́ Kalai, ko Amɔk nɛ́ Ebɛr,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Salai nɛ́ Kalai, ko Amɔk nɛ́ Ebɛr,
Kapsiki_DC: Kalay ya kaŋa ghɛa Salay, Ɛbɛr ya kaŋa ghɛa Amok,
Tupurri: ti mani Salayn diñ Kalay, ti mani Amogn diñ Eber,

Francais: pour Helcias, Hasébias; pour Idaïas, Nathanaël.
Anglais: Of Hilkiah, Hashabiah; of Jedaiah, Nethaneel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay Hilkiya, Hasabiya; kay Yedaya, Netaneel.
Bulu: Akabia asu Ilkiya, Netanil asu Yedaéya.
Guiziga: Hasabiya asi ngi Hilkiyahay, waɗ Netaneyel asi ngi Yedeyahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hasabiya ngam saare Hilkiyya, Netaneyel ngam saare Yeda'ya.
Fulfulde_DC: Hasabiya ngam saare Hilkiyya, Netaneyel ngam saare Yeda'ya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Hilkia nɛ́ Hasabia, ɓɛɛ ko Yɛdaya nɛ́ Nɛtaneɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Hilkia nɛ́ Hasabia, ɓɛɛ ko Yɛdaya nɛ́ Nɛtaneɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Hashabiya ya kaŋa ghɛa Hilkiya, Netanɛyɛl ya kaŋa ghɛa Yedaya.
Tupurri: ti mani Hilkiyan diñ Hasabiya, ti mani Yedaeyan diñ Netaneele.

Francais: Au temps d'Eliasib, de Joiada, de Johanan et de Jeddoa, les lévites, chefs de famille, et les prêtres furent inscrits, sous le règne de Darius, le Perse.
Anglais: The Levites in the days of Eliashib, Joiada, and Johanan, and Jaddua, were recorded chief of the fathers: also the priests, to the reign of Darius the Persian.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay liyna vi Eliyasib, vi Yoyada, vi Yohanan hiɗi Yadduwa, sa Levitna, sa ŋulona vi jafna hiɗi muliyan-sa-ɗifinna kaw, sesi ɗoys gaa'a hay liyna vi mulda vi Dariyus ma Persena.
Bulu: Melu Eliasib, Yôyada, Yôanañ a Yadua, Belévit, bivete ya menda me bôt a betuni, be nga tilibane môé éjôé Darius, mone Perse.
Guiziga: Angi hin ngi ti Eliyasip ati Yoyada, Yohanaŋ waɗ Yaduwa na, Levi, buy ngi hayay ati masayaya, a tohoko slimiɗ taŋhaya toh toh le, hã a ndila hin ngi zumabuy ngi Dariyus, buy Perse.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder zamanu Eliyasib e Yoyada e Yohanan e Yaddu'a, inɗe Lewi'en laatiiɓe baaba-ci'e'en mbinndaama non boo liman'en haa wargo laamu Dariyus Persiijo.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder zamanu Eliyasib e Yoyada e Yohanan e Yaddu'a, inɗe Lewi'en laatiiɓe baaba-ci'e'en mbinndaama non boo liman'en haa wargo laamu Dariyus Persiijo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ Eliasib, Yoyada, Yohanaŋ in Yadua duka nɛ́ gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ɗoŋ ŋmaa, wa yɔra nin o be Levii in o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ yaa so nɛ́ gasawi nutua zaŋ kalata hɔ ŋgimbi-wan ko Darius be Pɛrsɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ Eliasib, Yoyada, Yohanaŋ in Yadua duka nɛ́ gasa wan-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ɗoŋ ŋmaa, wa yɔra nin o be Levii in o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nɛ yaa so nɛ́ gasawi nutua zaŋ kalata hɔ ŋgimbi-wan ko Darius be Pɛrsɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Te vəa yɛ Ɛliyashib, Yoyada, Yohanan le Yadəwa ne, nahe mbeli kerafeyi sləa ka Lɛvi nyi te ghəa ghɛ mbe palepa, tsagha ŋa ka dzeghe Shala pa te vəa Dariyəs, meghea ka Pɛrse.
Tupurri: Ti kal mani Eliyakib, Yoyada, Yahanan wo de Yaduwa mono, jar Lefid maga wo diñ wañre ma ti feelen wo de jar sië jag hay wo le go de yerge de maga Dariyus je Persen hay ti wañ mono.

Francais: Les fils de Lévi, chefs de famille, furent inscrits dans le livre des Chroniques, jusqu'au temps de Johanan, fils d'Eliasib.
Anglais: The sons of Levi, the chief of the fathers, were written in the book of the chronicles, even until the days of Johanan the son of Eliashib.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Levi sa ŋulona vi jafna, sesi ɗoys gaa'a hay ɗerwella vi labar-ma-Liyna ta-ta hay liyna vi Yohanan, goora vi Eliyasib.
Bulu: Bone be Lévi, bivete ya menda me bôt, be nga tiliban e kalate minkañete a kui melu Yôanañ mon Eliasib.
Guiziga: Levi, buy ngi hayaya, a tohoko slimiɗ taŋhaya ar ɗerewol ngi slufa ɓi madiɗa madiɗa mucohomoy zleˀe, hã a ndila hin ngi Yohanaŋ, dideˀ ngi Eliyasip.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lewi'en laatiiɓe baaba-ci'e'en mbinndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe, haa wargo zamanu Yohanan ɓii Eliyasib.
Fulfulde_DC: Lewi'en laatiiɓe baaba-ci'e'en mbinndaama nder Deftere Habaruuji Nyalaaɗe, haa wargo zamanu Yohanan ɓii Eliyasib.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa yɔra nin o gasawi nutua ko o be Levii zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ hɔ tɛ ŋgimbi ko Yohanaŋ be-koo Eliasib.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa yɔra nin o gasawi nutua ko o be Levii zaŋ Kalata Nyɛrɛ hɔ tɛ ŋgimbi ko Yohanaŋ be-koo Eliasib.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma sləa mbeli nyi te ghəa ghɛa ka Lɛvi ne, mbe palepa nya nza wəshi nyi jama jama nyi kemenete geva rafete geva hɛ, ama deke hwa'a te vəa Yohanan, shia Ɛliyashib.
Tupurri: Weere jar Lefid maga wo diñ wañre ma ti feelen hay wo go de yerge äil kefder maga aè yer waçaçre ma tum nen nawn wo ni mono, haçaç a go ti wur mani Yahanan, je ni Eliyakib no.

Francais: Chefs des lévites : Hasébias, Sérébias et Josué, fils de Cedmiel, chargés, avec leurs frères en face d'eux, de célébrer et de louer Dieu, selon l'ordre de David, homme de Dieu, un groupe alternant avec l'autre groupe.
Anglais: And the chief of the Levites: Hashabiah, Sherebiah, and Jeshua the son of Kadmiel, with their brethren over against them, to praise and to give thanks, according to the commandment of David the man of God, ward over against ward.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa ŋulona vi sa Levitna, Hasabiya, Serebiya, hiɗi Yosuwa goora vi Kadmiyel hiɗi ɓosiyosina, ka lakay ɗiger vok ir segena, lopna vuli tisiya kay gi nulla, subur sem Ma-Vatɗina kaw, irsi ka poŋi kuɗ vokŋa ki David sana vi Lawna vulsi hagatis nala.
Bulu: Bivete Belévit: Akabia, Sérébia a Yasua mone Kadmiél a bobenyañe bap be nga tele bôte bevoʼo yat be yiʼa étôtok a duma Nti bia, avale David môta Zambe a nga bendé, be too minsamba minsamba.
Guiziga: Buy ngi si Leviheye i ti: Hasabiya, Serebiya ati Yesuwa, mangal ngi Kaɗmiyel, waɗ sukum taŋ Levi mekelemeye deŋ deŋ, hiri pulaˀ pulaˀ ng'ar taŋ ngi zli dimis ngi hunuma Buymisemuŋ. Asi mike na, Davit, mbur ngi Buymisemuŋ a vula ɓi nah le kanah, ɓa a zlaka, mizli ti ngay taŋ ti ngay taŋ, a hunumaka Buymisemuŋ, yo a gakaŋ sise.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O gasawi zu o be Levii nɛ́ Hasabia, Sɛrɛbia in Yesua, bem ko Kadmiɛl, bá nɛ́ o nya-wa nɛ ya tan ti wa, wen bia gima nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen ko David, bíí ko Sɔ̧; o ndé nyɛm nɛ̀ ŋgimbi kɔ‘i, gasi nɛ́ Sɔ̧, de nɛ́ osoko ha̧ a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O gasawi zu o be Levii nɛ́ Hasabia, Sɛrɛbia in Yesua, bem ko Kadmiɛl, bá nɛ́ o nya-wa nɛ ya tan ti wa, wen bia gima nyɛm nɛ̀ ɗoŋ wen ko David, bíí ko Sɔ̧; o ndé nyɛm nɛ̀ ŋgimbi kɔ‘i, gasi nɛ́ Sɔ̧, de nɛ́ osoko ha̧ a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa mbelia jama ta ka Lɛvi, yɛ: Hashabiya, Shɛrɛbiya ba'a Yɛshəwa nya kawəzege ta Kadmiyɛl ghereŋenji kwa kema ta kweci ka menəhɛ nci kezha gha cimə ketsahe Shala ba'a nya keve zləvə te, kenza və kemene slene kaŋa nci. Kala nya gezeke David, wəndəa Shala.
Tupurri: Wañre jar Lefid maga diñ Hasabiya, Serebiya, Josuwe je ni Kadmiyel wo de heçeçre äaara ma odge pel kaçaçra ma lan hay wo diñ jar maga waçaçre togoëge Manwurn wo de mañge ti äe ciñn hay do äaara do jag maga Dafid je mani Baan hay waçaçn nono, jar go de carge ta' ta'a.

Francais: Mathanias, Becbécias, Abdias, Mosollam, Telmon et Accub, portiers, faisaient la garde au seuil des portes.
Anglais: Mattaniah, and Bakbukiah, Obadiah, Meshullam, Talmon, Akkub, were porters keeping the ward at the thresholds of the gates.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mataniya, Bakbukiya, Abdiyas, Mesullam, Talmon hiɗi Akkub, sa ŋom vun-galana, nisi ka ŋom vun-galana vi ziyna.
Bulu: Matania Bakbukia, Abdias, Mesulam, Talmon a Akub, bebaʼale mimbé be nga bo ésaé bebaʼale be tele mimbé yôp.
Guiziga: Mataniya, Bakbukiya, Abadiya, Mesulam, Talmoŋ ati Akupo, slra nga taŋ i jigina mizlingre ati gwatay muwam taŋ vu ar hay ngi ciki mizlingre vuna.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-pɛm-nù tua nɛ́ Matania, Bakbukia, Obadia, Mɛsulam, Talmɔŋ in Akub; wa ya so pɛm nɛ o fara-a-mɔ mgbák nú garo Tua ko Sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-pɛm-nù tua nɛ́ Matania, Bakbukia, Obadia, Mɛsulam, Talmɔŋ in Akub; wa ya so pɛm nɛ o fara-a-mɔ mgbák nú garo Tua ko Sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ka ya degha Mataniya, Bakbəwkiya, Obadiya, Meshəwlam, Talmon ba'a Akəwb ne, slene ta ya cɛ kebete wəshi kezeme nyi takwa yitea mɛa degha ta ghɛa Shala yamene hɛ.
Tupurri: Mataniya, Bakbukiya, Abdiyas, Mesulam, Talmon wo de Akub jar gor jag tiñn hay wo lagge jag tiñn wo gorge lage.

Francais: Ils vivaient au temps de Joakim, fils de Josué, fils de Josédec, et au temps de Néhémie, le gouverneur, et d'Esdras, le prêtre et le scribe.
Anglais: These were in the days of Joiakim the son of Jeshua, the son of Jozadak, and in the days of Nehemiah the governor, and of Ezra the priest, the scribe.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ka hay lopna hay liyna vi Yoyakim, goora vi Yosuwa, goora vi Yotsadak, hay liyna vi Nehemiya ma guvernera, hiɗi Esdras mul-ma-ɗifinna ma ɗota kaw.
Bulu: Be nga too melu Yôyakim mone Yasua, mone Yôsadak, a melu Néhémie ngovina, Esdras ntuni a ntili bekalate.
Guiziga: Mizli gar na, a gaka slra nga taŋ angi hin ngi Yoyakim, mangal ngi Yesuwa, dideˀ ngi Yosadak, yo angi hin ngi ti Nehemi, buy miwi li ati Masay Esdras misina toho gwat.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kamɓe ɓe ngeeɗi nder zamanu Yooyakim ɓii Yeesu'a ɓii Yocadak e Nehemiya ngomnaajo e Esira, limanjo e moodibbo tawreeta.
Fulfulde_DC: Kamɓe ɓe ngeeɗi nder zamanu Yooyakim ɓii Yeesu'a ɓii Yocadak e Nehemiya ngomnaajo e Esira, limanjo e moodibbo tawreeta.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee so tom sɛn tɛ ŋgimbi ko Yoyakim bem ko Yesua, be-koo Yosadak in sɛn tɛ ŋgimbi ko Nehemii wi-duk-zu nù, in Ɛsdras wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in wi-yɔr-kalata mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee so tom sɛn tɛ ŋgimbi ko Yoyakim bem ko Yesua, be-koo Yosadak in sɛn tɛ ŋgimbi ko Nehemii wi-duk-zu nù, in Ɛsdras wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in wi-yɔr-kalata mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Te vəa Zhowakim, wəzege ta Yɛshəwa ba'a shia Yosadak ba'a te vəa Nɛhɛmi nya kaŋgwamna le Ɛsdras, nde dzeghe Shala nya kande rafe wəshi mahalegə se hɛ kamene slene.
Tupurri: Jar sen hay wo tenen ti' ti kal mani Yoyakim je ni Josuwe, je ni Yotsadag no, ti kal mani Nehemi je waçaç ree progn wo de Esdras je sië jag ma had waçaçre Baa no.

Francais: Lors de la dédicace des murailles de Jérusalem, on convoqua les lévites de tous les lieux qu'ils habitaient, pour les faire venir à Jérusalem, afin de célébrer la dédicace avec joie, avec des louanges et des chants, au son des cymbales, des cithares et des harpes.
Anglais: And at the dedication of the wall of Jerusalem they sought the Levites out of all their places, to bring them to Jerusalem, to keep the dedication with gladness, both with thanksgivings, and with singing, with cymbals, psalteries, and with harps.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nisi li mal-vunda vi gulmunna vi Yerusalem, nisi kali gar sum sa Levitna hay liyn kaf ma nisi ka lakay haya kay marsi hay Yerusalem, kay nisi ma li yuldeta hay firita hiɗi nul ma gina, hiɗi cina vi kaway beɗayna, hiɗi dilla, hiɗi dil ŋulona kaw.
Bulu: Eyoñe mveane Zambe mfine ya Yérusalém ô nga kpwaan, be nga ke nyoñe Belévit mevôm mese be nga too a zuu be Yérusalém, nalé abôʼô da ye boban e mevaʼa été, a nyiane bia yʼékañaʼa, a mbômane biwoé, memvet a bingombé.
Guiziga: Ngi gi muguzlum ngi vula mohol ngi Zeruzaleme da Bumbulvuŋ, mizli a ram nga supoko Levihey ar li taŋ mipam anga anga gar, ɓa a soko nga Zeruzaleme, ngi gi muguzlum ngi wuna moholo, ti mumul, ti hunuma vu ti dimis, ti kiɗa jãw jãway, kãkuhoy waɗ gujuvuroy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i cenki mahol Urusaliima, ɓe ɗaɓɓitoyi Lewi'en haa nokkuuje ɓe ngoni fuu haa ɓe ngara Urusaliima, ɓe mbaɗa juulde cenki mahol bee seyo, bee gettooje e gimi, bee koŋsiije e moolooji e garayaaji.
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i cenki mahol Urusaliima, ɓe ɗaɓɓitoyi Lewi'en haa nokkuuje ɓe ngoni fuu haa ɓe ngara Urusaliima, ɓe mbaɗa juulde cenki mahol bee seyo, bee gettooje e gimi, bee koŋsiije e moolooji e garayaaji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi dee gbaŋa garo Jerusalɛm, wa saa o be Levii lɛŋ nɛ fara nɛ wa ya sɛnɛ mɛ tɛ pii Jerusalɛm, wen dee gbaŋa nɛ desee, nɛ zɔnamɔ, nɛ gima, ba sɔkɔ, koloŋ in kunde.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi dee gbaŋa garo Jerusalɛm, wa saa o be Levii lɛŋ nɛ fara nɛ wa ya sɛnɛ mɛ tɛ pii Jerusalɛm, wen dee gbaŋa nɛ desee, nɛ zɔnamɔ, nɛ gima, ba sɔkɔ, koloŋ in kunde.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa nahemte ŋa ta zlia Zhɛrəzalɛm mbeli ne, pa mbeli hekakɛ ka Lɛvi se te ŋkwa nyi nza hɛ pɛtɛ kezha mene gəsəkə zlama mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm le cimə ketsahe Shala nyi tsa yɛ ciŋəci, yɛ gagera ba'a yɛ getsepele mbeli yite.
Tupurri: Ti wur joñge few kor ma Jerusalemn mono, aè raw woge kië jar Lefid wo le ti ngeel maga aà hay wo le de tiñ ni mo äuy no, maga aà mo aà wo Jerusalem nen maga aè mo joñ few nen fruygi siñ wo, de ro soñre wo, ro mandilna wo de dilna wo.

Francais: Les fils des chantres se rassemblèrent de la campagne environnant Jérusalem, des villages des Nétophatiens, de Beth-Galgal
Anglais: And the sons of the singers gathered themselves together, both out of the plain country round about Jerusalem, and from the villages of Netophathi;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi sum sa gi nulla tok tuwsiyay hay ziy ma ŋuyi kat Yerusalemna pa, hay ziyna vi sum sa Netofana pa,
Bulu: Bone beyia bia be nga sulan be soʼo mefôla ma bômane Yérusalém a minlame ya Nétôfa,
Guiziga: Mizli dimisey a kusoko tir vay prok ngi Zeruzalemey, waɗ tir walahay Netofahay,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-bii-gima mɔi̧a ŋmaa tɛnɛ nɛ ká̧ Jerusalɛm nɛ tɛ o ye ko o be Nɛtɔfa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-bii-gima mɔi̧a ŋmaa tɛnɛ nɛ ká̧ Jerusalɛm nɛ tɛ o ye ko o be Nɛtɔfa,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋwalea ka gha cimə tseneke geva se te hɛɗi nya dzeyi yitea Zhɛrəzalɛm ba'a se mbe yɛ meleme ta ka Netofa,
Tupurri: Weere jar 'wad siñ ma ti Jerusalem karan tay wo see äaara le äuy de ma äi leege mani jar Netofan wo,

Francais: et du territoire de Géba et d'Azmaveth; car les chantres s'étaient bâti des villages aux alentours de Jérusalem.
Anglais: Also from the house of Gilgal, and out of the fields of Geba and Azmaveth: for the singers had builded them villages round about Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay Bet-Gilgal hiɗi fulda vi Geba hiɗi Azmavet; kay sa gi nulla ziyna visi ma nisi inimna ka ŋuyi kat Yerusalem.
Bulu: be soʼo fe Bét-Gilgal a mefane ya Géba a Azmavét; amu beyia bia be nga lôñe bebiene minlam e mefôla ma bômane Yérusalém.
Guiziga: zle a Bet-Gilgal ati purok ngi Gebahay, waɗ ti Asmavet, asi mizli dimiseye, a pam ti walahay taŋhay gun hirnga ngi Zeruzaleme.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nɛ Bɛt-Gilgal in nɛ ká̧ Geba in Azmavɛt, wen o wi-bii-gima dee so kɔ-wa ye nɛ ká̧ Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nɛ Bɛt-Gilgal in nɛ ká̧ Geba in Azmavɛt, wen o wi-bii-gima dee so kɔ-wa ye nɛ ká̧ Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: se mbe Bɛt-Gilgal ba'a se te hɛɗia yɛ Gɛba le Azmavɛt, kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe ka gha cimə keŋate yɛ meleme ta nci dzeyi yitea Zhɛrəzalɛm.
Tupurri: de ma Bet-Gilgaln wo, ma ti prog ma Geban wo de ma Asamafedn wo no, werga aà hay wo de lag tiñ ti Jerusalem kara äuy.

Francais: Les prêtres et les lévites, après s'être purifiés, purifièrent le peuple, les portes et la muraille.
Anglais: And the priests and the Levites purified themselves, and purified the people, and the gates, and the wall.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna por tuwsiya, por sumuna, nisi por vun-galana hiɗi gulmunna kaw.
Bulu: Betuni a Belévit be nga tune bebiene a tune fe bôte ya ayoñ, mimbé a mfin.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, masayay ati levihey a gam mezegwel ngi zuɓa hiryi taŋhay avra, yo ngi zuɓa hiryi ngi sukwi Israyel gar, hiryi ngi mizlingrehey ati ngi mohol ngi Zeruzalem vuna.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Liman'en e Lewi'en aarti senugo ko'e muuɗum'en. Nden ɓe ceni yimɓe e dammuɗe e mahol.
Fulfulde_DC: Liman'en e Lewi'en aarti senugo ko'e muuɗum'en. Nden ɓe ceni yimɓe e dammuɗe e mahol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii  ɗafa  war-tɛ in war-tɛ o bíí, war o nú garo in kiitɛ garo mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii  ɗafa  war-tɛ in war-tɛ o bíí, war o nú garo in kiitɛ garo mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka dzeghe Shala le ka Lɛvi pɛmte geva wɛŋe wɛŋe. Pa hɛ gezete nda ke mbeli pɛtɛ kezha pɛ geva wɛŋe perə, pa hɛ yaɓemte yɛ gelembe ba'a zli nya yitea meleme wɛŋe wɛŋe.
Tupurri: Jar sië jagn wo de jar Lefidn raw wo façaç see äaara go, façaç wo jarn wo go de jag faagen wo de kor no.

Francais: Je fis monter sur la muraille les princes de Juda, et je formai deux grands choeurs de procession. Le premier choeur se mit en marche vers le côté droit, sur la muraille, vers la porte du Fumier.
Anglais: Then I brought up the princes of Judah upon the wall, and appointed two great companies of them that gave thanks, whereof one went on the right hand upon the wall toward the dung gate:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nan jik sa ŋulona vi Yuda kulo kay gulmunna, nan lak vokŋa vi sa gi nulla goy ma'. Vok ma jewna tun caw tuɗa hay gal ma jufna kulo kay gulmunna, gal ma vun-galana vi zigidikŋa.
Bulu: Me nga bo na bivete ya Yuda bi bet e mfine yôp, a me nga kôme minsamba beyia bia mibaé. Nsambʼôsu ô nga wulu e mfine yôb e mbo nnôm, be kelek e mbé akun.
Guiziga: Ar nah na, yi ɓi ɓa buy ngi si Zudahaya, a jiɗam ng'ar moholo. Yi ɗuf ngay madiɗa madiɗa, taˀ taˀ cuw ngi zli dimisi. Ngay mizli dimis mudumbuŋ, aru tir vay hazum, kini ngir ti mizlingre ngi Zay gwatay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Min, mi wa'ini ardiiɓe Yahuuda dow mahol, mi darni yimooɓe geɓe mawɗe ɗiɗi ngam yimugo gime gettooje. Yeɓre woore yehi dow hoore mahol gal juŋngo nyaamo heedi Dammugal Jiddere.
Fulfulde_DC: Min, mi wa'ini ardiiɓe Yahuuda dow mahol, mi darni yimooɓe geɓe mawɗe ɗiɗi ngam yimugo gime gettooje. Yeɓre woore yehi dow hoore mahol gal juŋngo nyaamo heedi Dammugal Jiddere.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mi dee ha̧ o gasawi nù Juda mɛ daŋ zu garo. Mi mɔi̧a o wi-bii-gima nɛ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ mi kɛ̧ wa tɛ fara yiitoo. Kuti-a gbara kɔ‘i nɛ zu garo nɛ war wiiko si nú garo nɛ‘i sa'e Zuku-paa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mi dee ha̧ o gasawi nù Juda mɛ daŋ zu garo. Mi mɔi̧a o wi-bii-gima nɛ dɔka-a, ɓɛɛ mi kɛ̧ wa tɛ fara yiitoo. Kuti-a gbara kɔ‘i nɛ zu garo nɛ war wiiko si nú garo nɛ‘i sa'e Zuku-paa,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa 'ya tsenete mbeli nyi te ghəa ka Zhəwda pelɛ zli. Pa 'ya veyi wəvəsəa ka gha cimə nyi jama jama bake. Ntəŋə kwa ghate dzeyi laka bela kwa zeme te zli laka mɛ degha ta Dədə.
Tupurri: Ndi raw ga wañre ma Judan mo ëii wo ti kor no, day ndi kal car äil jar go ta' ta' äog ma 'wad siñ. Jar ma tañgun fer wo nen ti äañ war go ciñ ti korn ti' de kañ ti äaara ne jag tiñ rumgi no.

Francais: Derrière eux marchaient Osaïas et la moitié des princes de Juda,
Anglais: And after them went Hoshaiah, and half of the princes of Judah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugolsiya Hoseya hiɗi galla vi jafna vi Yuda ka tuɗa,
Bulu: Ozé a éfase bivete jia ya Yuda be nga wulu e mvuse jap.
Guiziga: Maram sek a dirba taŋ ya kwana, i ti: Hosaya waɗ reta ngi buy ngi si Zudahaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hosa'ya tokki nde bee reeta ardiiɓe Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Hosa'ya tokki nde bee reeta ardiiɓe Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ Hɔsaya in reeta gasawi Juda gbar ɗoŋ wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ Hɔsaya in reeta gasawi Juda gbar ɗoŋ wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ka gha cimə dzeghwa yɛ Hoshaya le kwete bela ta mbeli nyi te ghəa ka Zhəwda,
Tupurri: Ose wo de wañre ma Juda wo plañ hay wo de kañge seege wer äaara, wañre sen hay wo diñ

Francais: Azarias, Esdras, Mosollam,
Anglais: And Azariah, Ezra, and Meshullam,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗi Azariya, Esdras, Mesullam,
Bulu: Azaria, Esdras, Mesulam,
Guiziga: waɗ Azariya, Esra, Mesulam,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Non boo Azariya e Esira e Mesullam
Fulfulde_DC: Non boo Azariya e Esira e Mesullam
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ Azaria, Ɛsdras, Mɛsulam;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Hɔ-ɗoŋ-aa, nɛ́ Azaria, Ɛsdras, Mɛsulam;
Kapsiki_DC: zhɛne yɛ Azariya, Ɛzra, Meshəwlam,
Tupurri: Asariya, Esdras, Mesulam,

Francais: Juda, Benjamin, Séméïas et Jérémie;
Anglais: Judah, and Benjamin, and Shemaiah, and Jeremiah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yuda, Benyamin, Semayeya hiɗi Yeremiyas,
Bulu: Yuda, Bényamin, Semaéya a Yérémi,
Guiziga: Yehuda, Benjameŋ, Simeya ati Irmeya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Yahuuda e Benyamin e Sema'ya e Yeremiya
Fulfulde_DC: e Yahuuda e Benyamin e Sema'ya e Yeremiya
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yehuda, Bɛnjamin, Sɛmaya in Irmeya.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yehuda, Bɛnjamin, Sɛmaya in Irmeya.
Kapsiki_DC: Yehəwda, Bɛnjamɛn, Shemaya ba'a Zhɛrɛmi.
Tupurri: Juda, Benjame, Semaeya wo de Jermi.

Francais: des fils de prêtres avec des trompettes, Zacharie, fils de Jonathan, fils de Séméïas, fils de Mathanias, fils de Michée, fils de Zéchur, fils d'Asaph,
Anglais: And certain of the priests' sons with trumpets; namely, Zechariah the son of Jonathan, the son of Shemaiah, the son of Mattaniah, the son of Michaiah, the son of Zaccur, the son of Asaph:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ gurona vi muliyan-sa-ɗifinna, hiɗi togolomna, Zakariya, goora vi Yonatan, goora vi Semayeya, goora vi Mattaniya, goora vi Mikka, goora vi Zakkur, goora vi Asaf,
Bulu: bevoʼo ya bon betuni, be bili metoñ: Zakari mone Yônatan, mone Semaéya, mone Matania, mone Mikaya, mone Zakur, monʼAsaf,
Guiziga: A dirba nah ma na, i masayay ti zarahay. Zakari, dideˀ ngi Asaf, angi tizer ngi Zakur, Mikaya, Mataniya, Semaya ati Yonataŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e woɗɓe liman'en bee algaytaaji e Zekariya ɓii Yonatan ɓii Sema'ya ɓii Mattaniya ɓii Mikaya ɓii Zakkur ɓii Asaf
Fulfulde_DC: e woɗɓe liman'en bee algaytaaji e Zekariya ɓii Yonatan ɓii Sema'ya ɓii Mattaniya ɓii Mikaya ɓii Zakkur ɓii Asaf
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ ɗoŋ woyo, nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ a̧ kaia mbia, ɓɛɛ Zakarii, bem ko Yɔnataŋ, bem ko Sɛmaya, bem ko Matania, bem ko Mikaya, bem ko Zakur, bem ko Asaf,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ ɗoŋ woyo, nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ a̧ kaia mbia, ɓɛɛ Zakarii, bem ko Yɔnataŋ, bem ko Sɛmaya, bem ko Matania, bem ko Mikaya, bem ko Zakur, bem ko Asaf,
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta nci ka dzeghe Shala nyi kevɛ veke, Zakari nya kahwelefe ta Asaf laka Zakəwr, Mikaya, Mataniya, Shemaya ba'a Yonatan,
Tupurri: Le nen blam ni pa diñ jar sië jagn wo de coçoç wo do, diñ Sakari je ni Jonatañ, je ni Semaeya, je ni Mataniya, je ni Mise, je ni Sakur, je ni Asafn

Francais: et ses frères, Séméïas, Azaréel, Malalaï, Galalaï, Maaï, Nathanaël, Juda et Hanani, avec les instruments de musique de David, homme de Dieu. Esdras, le scribe, était devant eux.
Anglais: And his brethren, Shemaiah, and Azarael, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Nethaneel, and Judah, Hanani, with the musical instruments of David the man of God, and Ezra the scribe before them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗi ɓosiyomna, Semayeya, Azareel, Milalay, Gilalay, Maay, Netaneel, Yuda hiɗi Hanani, hiɗi slen ma gi nulla vi David sana vi Lawna. Esdras sa ma wi ɗota ka tuni voksiya.
Bulu: a bobenyañe bé: Semaéya Azaril, Milalayi, Gilalayi, Maayi, Netanil, Yuda a Anani, be bili biôme mezik bi David môta Zambe; Esdras ñyeme bekalate a too asuzoʼo wop.
Guiziga: ati sukum naŋhay, Semaya, Azarel, Milalay, Gilalay, Maˀay, Netaneyel, Yehuda waɗ Hanani, ara supoko taŋ ti gwat ngi dunguroy, ngi Davit mbur ngi Bumbulvuŋ. Esdras, mbur misina toho gwata, naŋ ɓaˀ a mbuŋ taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum'en Sema'ya e Azareyel e Milalay e Gilalay e Ma'ay e Netaneyel e Yahuuda e Hanani, bee kuuje gimruɗe Daawuda, goɗɗo Allah. Moodibbo Esira ardi ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: e deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum'en Sema'ya e Azareyel e Milalay e Gilalay e Ma'ay e Netaneyel e Yahuuda e Hanani, bee kuuje gimruɗe Daawuda, goɗɗo Allah. Moodibbo Esira ardi ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: in o nya-a̧ Sɛmaya, Azarɛl, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Nɛtaneɛl, Yehuda in Hanani kai kɔ-wa nɛ mɔɔ-de-gima ko David bíí ko Sɔ̧. Nɛ́ Ɛsdras, wi-yɔr-mɔ a̧ duk ti ha̧ wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: in o nya-a̧ Sɛmaya, Azarɛl, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Nɛtaneɛl, Yehuda in Hanani kai kɔ-wa nɛ mɔɔ-de-gima ko David bíí ko Sɔ̧. Nɛ́ Ɛsdras, wi-yɔr-mɔ a̧ duk ti ha̧ wa.
Kapsiki_DC: le ka menəhɛnyɛ Shemaya, Azarɛl, Milalay, Gilalay, Ma'ay, Netanɛyɛl, Yehəwda ba'a Hanani katəkwə təkwə hɛ. Wəshi ketsa nyi feɗete David, wəndəa Shala ya va hɛ. Ɛsdras, nde rafe wəshi mahalegə ya te ghəa wəvəsəa shɛ.
Tupurri: wo de heçeçre äe Semaeya, Asareel, Milalay, Gilalay, Maay, Netaneel, Juda wo de Hanani saara de feçeçre joçoç mani Dafid je mani Baan do äaara. Esdras je had waçaçre Baa hay pel äaara.

Francais: A la porte de la Source, ils montèrent vis-à-vis d'eux les degrés de la cité de David, par la montée de la muraille, au-dessus de la maison de David, jusqu'à la porte de l'Eau, vers l'orient.
Anglais: And at the fountain gate, which was over against them, they went up by the stairs of the city of David, at the going up of the wall, above the house of David, even unto the water gate eastward.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Co kat vun-galana vi kaat kayni, nisi ka vun liyn ma jik kulo'o hay ziyda vi David; nisi jik kulo kay gulmunna, nisi ka suw kulo'o kay ziyna vi David, bugolda nisi kali voksi ta-ta tam vun-galana vi niyna, hay gal ma kuɗuwna vi hoyok-ziyna.
Bulu: Eyoñ be kuiya mbé anjeñ, be nga teme na be kuiya abete ya vôm étabaʼa David é né; nde be nga bete je mfine yôb ôbien, a vôm ate be mbe ôyabe yôb a beta ndaa David, ane be nga kee dulu ôsu a kui mbé mendim, e tison mfaʼa jôp da tôô.
Guiziga: Mizli dimisey tuwa mindilam a mizlingre ngi ru ng'ar Miviɗiviɗi ngi yama, keɗ na, li majiɗam ti jiɗ ng'ar Walahay ngi Daviti. Joˀ a jiɗam tir li majiɗam ti jiɗ tir mohol vuna, taŋ misi a hirngi hay ngi Davite, a ram sesẽŋ a mizlingre ngi Yam, misi tisi pas ngi mipriki.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mba'i Dammugal Seeɓoore, ɓe tiiti cir, ɓe mba'i jaaɓruɗe haa Berniwol Daawuda, ɓe tokki wa'orde mahol dow saare Daawuda yahugo Dammugal Ndiyam haa fuunaaŋge.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mba'i Dammugal Seeɓoore, ɓe tiiti cir, ɓe mba'i jaaɓruɗe haa Berniwol Daawuda, ɓe tokki wa'orde mahol dow saare Daawuda yahugo Dammugal Ndiyam haa fuunaaŋge.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ nú garo Zu-zer, wa gbara nɛ fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ sitɛ  ye  ko David, ɓir nɛnɛ nɛ mgbák ká̧ tua-wan ko David, hɔ nɛnɛ Nú-Garo-Yì si war daŋa-wese.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ̀ nú garo Zu-zer, wa gbara nɛ fara-daŋ-nɛnɛ sitɛ  ye  ko David, ɓir nɛnɛ nɛ mgbák ká̧ tua-wan ko David, hɔ nɛnɛ Nú-Garo-Yì si war daŋa-wese.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa ntsehe hɛ mɛa mɛ degha ta Meja ne, hwa'a hɛ yitea yɛ taŋa nyi kedzeme meleme ta David. Pa hɛ dzemenji te zlia shɛ pelɛ te ghəa ghɛa David, kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, ntəŋə hɛ mbe kema pa mɛa mɛ degha ta Yɛmə nya laka ŋkwa kesame ta veci.
Tupurri: AÀ wo wo dayge ti jag faage gedel no, saara raw cegaëge wo go ne ngeel maga aè ëii wo ni Dafid ni ti, see wo go ciñ ti tiñ mani Dafid no, haçaç wo wo jag faage Biin nen nen wur bo toñ.

Francais: Le second choeur se mit en marche du côté opposé; J'étais derrière lui, avec l'autre moitié du peuple, sur la muraille.
Anglais: And the other company of them that gave thanks went over against them, and I after them, and the half of the people upon the wall, from beyond the tower of the furnaces even unto the broad wall;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Vok ma ma'na vi nulla kali hay gal ma gulla, nan tap kuɗum kulo kay gulmunna, galla vi sum segena ka tapay kuɗma'a. Numa jik goboy tam simdir ma yor kawayna, bugolda numa co hay liyn ma yam gulmunna beɗay goyo;
Bulu: Nsamba baa ya beyia bia ô nga taté dulu mbo ngal. Me nga too be mvus a éfase bôt évok, e mfine yôp. Bi nga lôte bebé nkume mimbeʼe mi nduan, a bebé vôme mfin ô ne ndam;
Guiziga: Ngay mucuw naŋ ngi mizli dimiseye, aru kini tir vay haŋ gula, ya vuna ɓaˀ a dirba taŋ ar moholo waɗ reta ngi buyoy mindiram tuwa. I cohom kini ti hirngi hay musubur ngi di gwat, i ram sesẽŋ avu ɓiɓir ngi mohol mindih ndah ndah a diga na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yeɓre ɗiɗawre boo yehi gal juŋngo nano. Mi tokki nde bee reeta ardiiɓe Yahuuda feere dow mahol. Min tokki mahol dow suudu towndu wi'eteendu Defrudu, haa yotti mahol jaasŋgol.
Fulfulde_DC: Yeɓre ɗiɗawre boo yehi gal juŋngo nano. Mi tokki nde bee reeta ardiiɓe Yahuuda feere dow mahol. Min tokki mahol dow suudu towndu wi'eteendu Defrudu, haa yotti mahol jaasŋgol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Yiitoo-aa baa kɔ‘i nɛ́ zu garo nɛ war gale; mi duka so kɔ‘m ɗoŋ wa in oi reeta o gasawi; ɛɛ ɓira zu Fara-dɔ-brɛt, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ hɔ tɛ Pɛsa Garo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Yiitoo-aa baa kɔ‘i nɛ́ zu garo nɛ war gale; mi duka so kɔ‘m ɗoŋ wa in oi reeta o gasawi; ɛɛ ɓira zu Fara-dɔ-brɛt, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ hɔ tɛ Pɛsa Garo.
Kapsiki_DC: Ntəŋə kwa bake ta bela ta ka gha cimə dzeyi laka bela kwa gwela, kwa sebe ta nci ghen'yɛ le kwete bela ta mbeli dzate te zli, kənəa ŋkwa keya ŋkwa ta cɛ keta ɗafa hwa'a te ŋkwa nya nza zli kebezlenyɛ.
Tupurri: Jar siñ ma de äog fer wo de seelen nen äañ guuri. Ndi hay nen blam äaara de te jar ma lan wo, wuur go ciñ ti kor no, wuur hee ciñ ti tiñ ma de geçeçre ma ti ngeel jië feçeçre no, haçaç wuur wo go ti kor ma de diy no.

Francais: D'au-dessus de la tour des Fourneaux, on alla jusqu'à la muraille large; puis, d'au dessus de la porte d'Ephraïm, de la Vieille porte, de la porte des Poissons, de la tour de Hananéel et de la tour de Méa, jusqu'à la porte des Brebis ; et l'on s'arrêta à la porte de la Prison.
Anglais: And from above the gate of Ephraim, and above the old gate, and above the fish gate, and the tower of Hananeel, and the tower of Meah, even unto the sheep gate: and they stood still in the prison gate.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: numa tuɗ vokma'a kulo kay vun-galana vi Efrayim, kat vun-galana ma busayna hiɗi vun-galana vi kulufna; kat simdira vi Hananeel hiɗi simdira vi Meya, ta-ta kat vun-galana vi fok-dimina. Numa col tam vun-galana vi daŋgayna.
Bulu: bi nga kee dulu ôsu mbé Efrayime yôp, mbé Yekana yôp, a mbé bekos, éyoñ bi lôteya nkum Ananil a nkume mintet, bi nga lôte mbé mintômba a kui mbé bebaʼale.
Guiziga: I ram ti hirnga mizlingre ngi Efrayim, ti hirnga mizlingre ngi Yesana, waɗ ti hirnga mizlingre ngi kilifey. A dirba nah, ti hirngi hay musubur ngi Hananeyel ati hay musubur mazilaka Skat, hã sesẽŋ a mizlingre tumuŋhoy. I sa ra kiɗam mi a mizlingre ngi mijigina lihey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Min tokkiti dow Dammugal Efrayim e Dammugal Yesana e Dammugal Liɗɗi e suudu Hananiyel towndu e suudu towndu wi'eteendu Teemerre e Dammugal Baali. Min kaaɗi haa Dammugal Aynol.
Fulfulde_DC: Min tokkiti dow Dammugal Efrayim e Dammugal Yesana e Dammugal Liɗɗi e suudu Hananiyel towndu e suudu towndu wi'eteendu Teemerre e Dammugal Baali. Min kaaɗi haa Dammugal Aynol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛɛ ɓira zu nú garo ko Efraim, ko Yesana, nú garo ko o Zoro, tɛ fara-pɛm-mɔ ko Hananeɛl in wan nɛ‘i sa'e Gɔmŋmaa, hɔ sɛn nú garo ko o Sami, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ yor zu nú Garo-pɛm-mɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛɛ ɓira zu nú garo ko Efraim, ko Yesana, nú garo ko o Zoro, tɛ fara-pɛm-mɔ ko Hananeɛl in wan nɛ‘i sa'e Gɔmŋmaa, hɔ sɛn nú garo ko o Sami, ɓɛɛ ɛɛ yor zu nú Garo-pɛm-mɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ghen'yɛ dzeyi n'yɛ kənəa mɛ degha ta Ɛfrayim, ŋa Yeshana ba'a ŋa Kelepe. Ma kwa sebe ta yɛ cɛa ka ya ŋkwa ta Hananɛyɛl le ŋa Gwəmsə ne, pa ghen'yɛ zlakemte mɛ degha ta Timɛti kezha ntsehe mɛa mɛ degha ta ka ya ŋkwa.
Tupurri: Wuur hee ciñ ti jag tiñ mani Efrayim no, ti jag tiñ ma äaaäaa no, ti jag faage Ceçeçn wo, ciñ ti tiñ ma de geçeçre mani Hananeel no, ti tiñ ma de geçeçre mani Meya no haçaç wo go jag tiñ Saçaçren wo. Wuur raw lagge jag tiñ dañgay no.

Francais: Les deux choeurs s'arrêtèrent dans la maison de Dieu, ainsi que moi et la moitié des magistrats qui était avec moi,
Anglais: So stood the two companies of them that gave thanks in the house of God, and I, and the half of the rulers with me:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Vok ma gi nulla ma ma'na co lak hay ziyna vi Lawna; nanu hiɗi sa ɗiger-lawta sa ay kuɗanu numa li ki kayn nala kaw,
Bulu: Minsamba beyia bia mi nga tebe e nda Zambe; ma a bekobô mejô be nga tôñe ma bi nga tebe.
Guiziga: Ngay ngi mizli dimisey mitaˀtaˀ cuw tuwa, a cicam ar hay ngi Buymisemuŋ, waɗ ya vuna ati reta ngi buyoy, ndra mindiram bummoˀ tuwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Geɓe yimooɓe ɗiɗi fuu ndari haa haykaliiru Allah. Reeta kaliifa'en ɗon ngondi bee am,
Fulfulde_DC: Geɓe yimooɓe ɗiɗi fuu ndari haa haykaliiru Allah. Reeta kaliifa'en ɗon ngondi bee am,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ ɗoŋ, o duk wi-bii-gima yiitoo nɔ‘i yee kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ in mi nɛ tɛ‘m mbɛt, o reeta gasawi nɛ yaa so in am,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ ɗoŋ, o duk wi-bii-gima yiitoo nɔ‘i yee kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ in mi nɛ tɛ‘m mbɛt, o reeta gasawi nɛ yaa so in am,
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ, pa wəvəsəa ka gha cimə nyi bake nyighɛ ghereŋenji mbe ghɛa Shala. Pa 'ya ghereŋe ɗa perə, tsagha kwete bela ta mbeli nyi te ghə mbeli nyi kwa sebe ta ɗa.
Tupurri: Jar siñ se ta' ta' wer äogn wo wo lagge äil tiñ mani Baa no, ndi de see äi lay, jar kluuri maga hay wo wer äi mo äuy lay,

Francais: et les prêtres Eliacim, Maasias, Miamin, Michée, Elioénaï, Zacharie, Ananie, avec des trompettes,
Anglais: And the priests; Eliakim, Maaseiah, Miniamin, Michaiah, Elioenai, Zechariah, and Hananiah, with trumpets;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: muliyan-sa-ɗifinna Eliyakim, Maaseya, Minyamin, Mikka, Elyohenay, Zakariya, Hananiya, hiɗi togolomna,
Bulu: Betuni: Eliakim, Maaséya, Miniamin, Mikaya, Elioénayi, Zakari a Anania be nga loñe metoñ.
Guiziga: Yo masayay: Eliyakim, Maˀaseya, Miniyamin, Mikaya, Eliyohenay, Zakari waɗ Hananiya, ara fam zara.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: non boo liman'en Eliyakim e Ma'aseya e Miyamin e Mikaya e Eliyo'enay e Zekariya e Hananiya, bee algaytaaji
Fulfulde_DC: non boo liman'en Eliyakim e Ma'aseya e Miyamin e Mikaya e Eliyo'enay e Zekariya e Hananiya, bee algaytaaji
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eliakim, Masɛya, Miniamin, Mikaya in Ɛlyɔnai, Zakarii in Hanania nɛ̀ o mbia,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ká bá nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eliakim, Masɛya, Miniamin, Mikaya in Ɛlyɔnai, Zakarii in Hanania nɛ̀ o mbia,
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ Ɛliyakim, Masɛya, Miniyamin, Mikaya, Ɛliyohɛnay, Zakari ba'a Hananiya nyi kaka dzeghe Shala ka vɛ veke.
Tupurri: Jar sië jag Eliyakim, Maaseya, Minyamin, Mise, Elyoenay, Sakari, Hananiya maga hay wo de coçoç do wo lay,

Francais: et Maasias, Séméïas, Eléazar, Azzi, Johanan, Melchias, Elam et Ezer. Et les chantres se firent entendre, avec Jezraïas, leur chef.
Anglais: And Maaseiah, and Shemaiah, and Eleazar, and Uzzi, and Jehohanan, and Malchijah, and Elam, and Ezer. And the singers sang loud, with Jezrahiah their overseer.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗi Maaseya, Semayeya, Elam hiɗi Ezer, sa gi nulla di delsi goyo, sa ma ŋomda ma tuni voksina mi Yizrahiya.
Bulu: Maaséya, Semaéya, Eléazar, Uzi, Yôanañ, Malkiya, Elam a Ezére fe be nga too. Beyia bia be nga yia tyiñe yôp. Evete jab é mbe Yizraya.
Guiziga: Yo waɗ Maˀaseya, Semaya, Elazar, Uzi, Yohanaŋ, Malkiya, Elam waɗ Ezer. Mizli dimisey mazlaka dimis taŋ macin na, baɗ tivi Izrahiya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Ma'aseya e Sema'ya e Eli'azaaru e Uzzi e Yohanan e Malkiyya e Elam e Ezer. Nden yimooɓe puɗɗi yimugo, Yisrahiya limtani ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: e Ma'aseya e Sema'ya e Eli'azaaru e Uzzi e Yohanan e Malkiyya e Elam e Ezer. Nden yimooɓe puɗɗi yimugo, Yisrahiya limtani ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: sɛka Masɛya, Sɛmaya, Eleazar, Uzi, Yohanaŋ, Malkia, Elam ba nɛ Ezɛr. Izrahia, wi-duk-zu gima ŋmaa nú tɛ gima in o wi-bii-gima kɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: sɛka Masɛya, Sɛmaya, Eleazar, Uzi, Yohanaŋ, Malkia, Elam ba nɛ Ezɛr. Izrahia, wi-duk-zu gima ŋmaa nú tɛ gima in o wi-bii-gima kɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha yɛ Masɛya, Shemaya, Ɛlazar, Əwzi, Yohanan, Malkiya ba'a Ɛzɛr. Ma kwa gaka cimə ne, Izrahiya ya te kema ta nci.
Tupurri: Maaseja, Semaeya, Eleyasar, Usi, Yohanan, Malkiya, Elam wo de Eser wo lay, äuy wuur lag äil tiñ Baa no: Jar 'wad siñ 'waan wo nen maga jar mo laa ne, je waçaç ree äaara hay diñ Yisrahiya.

Francais: Ils offrirent ce jour-là de grands sacrifices et se livrèrent aux réjouissances, car Dieu leur avait donné un grand sujet de joie. Les femmes et les enfants se réjouirent aussi, et les cris de joie de Jérusalem furent entendus au loin.
Anglais: Also that day they offered great sacrifices, and rejoiced: for God had made them rejoice with great joy: the wives also and the children rejoiced: so that the joy of Jerusalem was heard even afar off.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buur namna kayni sumun li ɗifin ŋolo, nisi li firi ŋolo, kay Lawna li va ma firi ŋolo tisiya. Boyna hiɗi gurosgurayna kaw li firiya, goy gine'e pa san ka hum del firita ta Yerusalemta.
Bulu: Môs ôte, bôt be nga tyiʼi biôm abui a bo abui mevak, amu Zambe a nga ve be beta jam ya vaʼa nye. Binga a bongô fe be nga vak: bôt be nga wôʼôtane mevaʼa ya Yérusalém mete ôyap.
Guiziga: Tapasa, mizli a gam mikuli haɗi teˀe da Buymisemuŋ, a mumulom haɗa, asi Buymisemuŋ a vula taŋ mumul le haɗa teˀe. Ngwasay ati ziri kwana, a mumulom haɗa ya, hã mumul taŋ na, a zuɓa le ngiɗ ngiɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyannde maajum ɓe lii'ani Allah kirsaaɗi ɗuuɗɗi. Ɓe ceyi, ngam Allah hokki ɓe seyo maŋngo. Rewɓe e ɓikkoy ceyodi bee maɓɓe. Hoolo seyo Urusaliima yehi daayiiɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyannde maajum ɓe lii'ani Allah kirsaaɗi ɗuuɗɗi. Ɓe ceyi, ngam Allah hokki ɓe seyo maŋngo. Rewɓe e ɓikkoy ceyodi bee maɓɓe. Hoolo seyo Urusaliima yehi daayiiɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ɗafa Sɔ̧ nɛ dɔka-a wese'i, ɓɛɛ wa de nyɛŋɛ mbɛt, wen nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ dee ha̧ wa mɛ kpa gasa desee hegɔ. O okoo in o obem dee nyɛŋɛ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wi zii gayamɔ desee ko o bíí Jerusalɛm nɛ nyɛi̧a-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ɗafa Sɔ̧ nɛ dɔka-a wese'i, ɓɛɛ wa de nyɛŋɛ mbɛt, wen nɛ́ Sɔ̧ a̧ dee ha̧ wa mɛ kpa gasa desee hegɔ. O okoo in o obem dee nyɛŋɛ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ wi zii gayamɔ desee ko o bíí Jerusalɛm nɛ nyɛi̧a-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te vecia shɛ, kwele kwele dzeghekɛ melɛ mbeli mbe zlama ta gəsəkə. Kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe Shala keviɗikɛ wənəa mbelia ŋkɛ le zlama nya wəba. Mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm ne, kazlama yɛ mi le ŋwale kwele kwele perə, kafefa gaka ta nci mbeli cakeɗake.
Tupurri: Ti wur sen ni jar joñ wo siëgi jag wo debañ day joñ wo fruygi debañ lay werga Baa hay haç fen fruy äil äaara ne hara. Naare wo de kamliiri kal wo joñ fruygi, aè hay laa war fruygi ma Jerusalem wo go haçaç haçaç.

Francais: En ce temps-là, on établit des hommes préposés aux chambres qui servaient de magasins pour les offrandes prélevées, les prémices et les dîmes, et on les chargea d'y recueillir, du territoire des villes, les portions assignées par la loi aux prêtres et aux lévites ; car Juda se réjouissait de voir à leur poste les prêtres et les lévites,
Anglais: And at that time were some appointed over the chambers for the treasures, for the offerings, for the firstfruits, and for the tithes, to gather into them out of the fields of the cities the portions of the law for the priests and Levites: for Judah rejoiced for the priests and for the Levites that waited.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buur namna, nisi tun sum sa ŋom feera kay lak sle ma vulum goyn haya, lak vun-jaf ma jewna, gal-ma-doogona, nisi vulsi hagata kay yaw galla vi muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna goy hay nagata hiɗi hoyok-ziyn kaf, kay jafna vi Yuda ka li firi kayn kay sa Levitna ka li lopna visiya,
Bulu: Môs ôte, be nga telé bôt ba yiane baʼale bitune menda ba naane bembômô a mengabʼ awômô; be nga telé be na be ke ba nyoñe mengabe mete, mme atiñ da ve asu betuni a Belévit, mengabe mete me soʼo mefub ma bômane bitison. Bôte bese be nga vak amu ésaé betuni a Belévit be nga bo,
Guiziga: Viŋhey ada, taŋ hĩˀĩ ngi wi vu ti gwat micikiɗeffe ngi migamay ati mukuruˀ gwatay. Ti di nah so na, a wunam mizli ɓa ngi jigina viŋ tayna. Gwatay masoko taŋ tir prokoy mugun hirnga taŋ, kaɓa majuwaka ɓi nah ngi vul da masayay ati leviheye, ɓa mizli tayna a cikilaka taŋ, a paka taŋ ng'ar viŋ tayna. Asi mike na, masayay ati levihey misi angi slra taŋ na, ada a cira hiri da Zudahaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyannde nde ɓe njo'ini aynooɓe haa cuuɗi cigorɗi ngam dokke e ɓenndalooje aartuɗe e zakkaaji, ngam sigaago ton ko yimɓe ngaddi diga gese taariiɗe gure, waato geɗe ɗe tawreeta ta'ani liman'en e Lewi'en. Yahuudu'en ceyori kuugal liman'en e Lewi'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Nyannde nde ɓe njo'ini aynooɓe haa cuuɗi cigorɗi ngam dokke e ɓenndalooje aartuɗe e zakkaaji, ngam sigaago ton ko yimɓe ngaddi diga gese taariiɗe gure, waato geɗe ɗe tawreeta ta'ani liman'en e Lewi'en. Yahuudu'en ceyori kuugal liman'en e Lewi'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wese'i, wa ee o wi-pɛm-mɔ nú o gɔna-bɛr-tua nɛ wa a zu-nyɔnɔ in o zu-mɔ sɛnɛ. Nɛ́ o wi nɔ‘i a̧ tɛ kai mɔ nɛ o bíí kai tɛnɛ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o ye hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Heembea gɔna wen o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii ga, wen o be Juda kpaa so desee nyɛmna zu o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ tom.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wese'i, wa ee o wi-pɛm-mɔ nú o gɔna-bɛr-tua nɛ wa a zu-nyɔnɔ in o zu-mɔ sɛnɛ. Nɛ́ o wi nɔ‘i a̧ tɛ kai mɔ nɛ o bíí kai tɛnɛ nɛ̀ ɗoŋ o ye hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ Heembea gɔna wen o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii ga, wen o be Juda kpaa so desee nyɛmna zu o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in o be Levii nɛ a̧a̧ tɛ tom.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te vəa shɛnyɛ, pa mbeli dapave nda ya yɛ cɛ kebete wəshi gəməa ka ghate ta ya ta wəfe ba'a kwa meŋe ta bela ta wəshi kwa wəza wəza ke kweci mbeli. Ma mbelia shɛhɛ ne, ghenci ka bete wəshi nyi kese mbe wəve nyi dzeyi yitea yɛ meleme mbe cɛa shɛhɛ, wəshi nyi gezete wəsə mahalegə kaŋa ka dzeghe Shala le ka Lɛvi. Kwa nza ŋkɛ pɛtɛ ka Zhəwda kazlama te slene nya menete ka dzeghe Shala le ka Lɛvi,
Tupurri: Ti wur sen ni mono, aè raw lag jar wo jag tiñ maga aè lag feçeçre haçgen wo, jag feçeçren wo de dimn wo ni mono, day aè raw haç joñre ne hara maga aà mo tar wo feçeçre maga jag liñgi waçaç ti äaara ga aà wo diñ ma jar sië jagn wo de jar Lefidn wo le äi leegen wo äuy. Gahaçyla, Juda hay wo joñ fruygi ti maga jar sië jagn wo de jar Lefidn hay wo jag joñre äaara no,

Francais: observant le service de leur Dieu, et le service des purifications ; et de même, les chantres et les portiers, selon l'ordonnance de David et de Salomon, son fils.
Anglais: And both the singers and the porters kept the ward of their God, and the ward of the purification, according to the commandment of David, and of Solomon his son.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi ka li kuɗ slen ma ka ɗek kay lopna vi Lawna, nisiya hiɗi lopna vi poora, hiɗi sa gi nulla, hiɗi sa ŋom vun-galana kaw, kuɗ dita vi David hiɗi goora valam Salomon;
Bulu: ane be nga baʼale jam ese da fombô ésaé Zambe wop, a ésaé ntunan, nalé fe beyia bia a bebaʼale mimbé, avale David a Solômon mone wé be nga bendé;
Guiziga: I taŋ magaka slra ngi Bumbulvuŋ taŋ, waɗ slra ngi mezegwel ngi zuɓa hiryi avra. Amma mizli dimisey ati mijigina mizlingreheye, a gaka slra nga taŋ kaɓa Davit ati mangal naŋ Salomoŋ mupulaka taŋ jiviɗ naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe kuuwi kuugal Allah maɓɓe e kuugal cenki. Yimooɓe e aynooɓe dammuɗe, kamɓe boo ɓe kuuwi fodde umroore Daawuda e ɓiyum Suleymaanu .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe kuuwi kuugal Allah maɓɓe e kuugal cenki. Yimooɓe e aynooɓe dammuɗe, kamɓe boo ɓe kuuwi fodde umroore Daawuda e ɓiyum Suleymaanu .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa duka so de nɛ tom ko Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa in tom  ɗafa  war-tɛ-wa, ɓɛɛ ko o wi-bii-gima in o wi-pɛm-nú tua, wa de nɛ tom nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen ko David in bem kɔ̧-a̧ Salomɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa duka so de nɛ tom ko Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa in tom  ɗafa  war-tɛ-wa, ɓɛɛ ko o wi-bii-gima in o wi-pɛm-nú tua, wa de nɛ tom nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen ko David in bem kɔ̧-a̧ Salomɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: nyi kemene slene ta Shala ta nci ba'a slene ta yaɓe wəshi wɛŋe wɛŋe kala wəsə keshi. Ma ka gha cimə le ka ya degha perə ne, kala nya gezete meghe David le wəzege ta ŋkɛ Salomon mene hɛ.
Tupurri: hay wo hoo sug ti joñre mani Baa äaara no, ti joñre façëge jarn lay mono. Jar 'wad siñn wo de jar gor jag tiñ hay wo joñge no lay, do maga Dafid wo de weel äe Salomoñ hay waçaçn wo nono.

Francais: Car autrefois, dans les jours de David et d'Asaph, le chef des chantres, il y avait des chants de louange et d'actions de grâces en l'honneur de Dieu.
Anglais: For in the days of David and Asaph of old there were chief of the singers, and songs of praise and thanksgiving unto God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay jew ɓa-ɓa hay liyna vi David hiɗi Asaf, sa ŋulona vi sa gi nulla hiɗi nul ma suburta hiɗi lop ma slugona hay sem Lawna ka'a.
Bulu: amu melu mvus, éyoñe David a Asaf, bivete beyia bia bi nga too, nalé fe bia ya nkañan a mvean akéva asu duma Zambe.
Guiziga: Asi mike na, ti hin ngi Davit ati ngi Asaf na, buy ngi mizli dimisey ada, a zlam dimis ngi hunuma Buymisemuŋ ati ngi gaŋ sise.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam diga ɓooyma, nder zamanu Daawuda e Asaf, woodino ardiiɓe dow yimooɓe e gimi maŋgtooje e gettooje ngam Allah.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam diga ɓooyma, nder zamanu Daawuda e Asaf, woodino ardiiɓe dow yimooɓe e gimi maŋgtooje e gettooje ngam Allah.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓeemɛ tɛ ŋgimbi ko David in Asaf, o gasawi ko o wi-bii-gima a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ wen bia gima-gasi-sɔ̧ in gima-dee-osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓeemɛ tɛ ŋgimbi ko David in Asaf, o gasawi ko o wi-bii-gima a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ wen bia gima-gasi-sɔ̧ in gima-dee-osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa nza ŋkɛ vəashi, te vəa yɛ David le nde gha cimə Asaf ne, mbeli nyi te ghə cimə ka gha cimə ketsahe Shala ba'a kwa tsa nda hana.
Tupurri: Gahaçyla, ti wurpo le nen Dafid wo de Asaf, wañre jar 'wad siñ hay wo we de siñ ma togoëge, ma joñ suse' ma mañ ti Baa ciñ wo.

Francais: Tout Israël, dans les jours de Zorobabel et de Néhémie, donnait jour par jour les portions des chantres et des portiers ; on donnait aux lévites les saintes offrandes, et les lévites en donnaient leur part aux fils d'Aaron.
Anglais: And all Israel in the days of Zerubbabel, and in the days of Nehemiah, gave the portions of the singers and the porters, every day his portion: and they sanctified holy things unto the Levites; and the Levites sanctified them unto the children of Aaron.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay liyna vi Zorobabel hiɗi Nehemiya kayni, sum sa Israyella kaf vul galla vi sa gi nulla hiɗi sa ŋom vun-galana goyo, hay buurta buurta, hiɗi gal ma peldetna tam sa Levitna, sa Levitna vul gal ma peldetna tam gurona vi Aaron kaw.
Bulu: Melu Zôrôbabél a Néhémie, Israél ase a nga ve mengabe beyia bia a ma bebaʼale mimbé môs ôse; avale te fe mfaʼa mengap me ne ntelan étyi asu Belévit, a Belévit be nga ve mengap me ne ntelan étyi asu bone bʼAron.
Guiziga: Ti hin ngi Zorobabel ati Nehemi, vur hin gar na, Israyeleye, ar gwat taŋhay gar na, a vulaka mi ngi mizli dimisey waɗ ngi mijigina mizlingreheye. Yo gwat muvula da Bumbulvuŋ gar na, naɓa i ngi Levihey, joˀ Leviheye kwana, a vulaka mi ngi ziri ngi Aroŋhoyo ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder zamanu Zorobaabila e zamanu Nehemiya, Isra'iila'en fuu ndokki geɗe haa yimooɓe e aynooɓe dammuɗe, fodde haaje kala nyalaade fuu. Non boo dokke cenaaɗe ngam Lewi'en. Lewi'en boo ndokki liman'en, danygol Haruna, ko tawreeta yeɗani ɓe nder dokke ɗe'e.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder zamanu Zorobaabila e zamanu Nehemiya, Isra'iila'en fuu ndokki geɗe haa yimooɓe e aynooɓe dammuɗe, fodde haaje kala nyalaade fuu. Non boo dokke cenaaɗe ngam Lewi'en. Lewi'en boo ndokki liman'en, danygol Haruna, ko tawreeta yeɗani ɓe nder dokke ɗe'e.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ ŋgimbi ko Zorobabɛl in Nehemii, o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ ha̧ nɛ mɔ nɛ o wi-bii-gima in o wi-pɛm-nú Tua ko Sɔ̧ tɛ kpa dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ o mɔ nɛ wa e ha̧ Sɔ̧, wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ o be Levii, sɛka o be Levii tɛɛ ha̧ kɔ‘i war mɔ ko o bezaŋ Arɔŋ ha̧ wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ ŋgimbi ko Zorobabɛl in Nehemii, o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ ha̧ nɛ mɔ nɛ o wi-bii-gima in o wi-pɛm-nú Tua ko Sɔ̧ tɛ kpa dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ o mɔ nɛ wa e ha̧ Sɔ̧, wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ o be Levii, sɛka o be Levii tɛɛ ha̧ kɔ‘i war mɔ ko o bezaŋ Arɔŋ ha̧ wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Te vəa Zorobabɛl, kala nya te ŋa Nɛhɛmi ne, pɛtɛ ve nda ŋa nci bela ta wəshi ka Israyɛl keveci keveci ke ka gha cimə le ka ya degha. Pa hɛ ndeke nda wəshi gəmə nyi keveyi geva tekeleke ke ka Lɛvi ɓiyitsa, pa ka Lɛvi ndeke nda ŋa nci bela ke ka dzeghe Shala nyi kahwelefefia Aron.
Tupurri: Jar Israyel wo äuy, ti kal mani Sorobabeln wo de Nehemi, hay wo haç nen mo mani jar 'wad siñn wo de jar gor jag tiñn wo ne hara tumtum nen naw, hay wo haç feçeçre maga wo go sagsag ma jar Lefidn wo ne hara lay, day jar Lefid hay wo haç feçeçre maga wo go sagsag ma jar ni AÈron wo ne hara lay.

Francais: En ce temps-là, on lut aux oreilles du peuple dans le livre de Moïse, et l'on y trouva écrit que l'Ammonite et de Moabite ne devaient jamais entrer dans l'assemblée de Dieu,
Anglais: On that day they read in the book of Moses in the audience of the people; and therein was found written, that the Ammonite and the Moabite should not come into the congregation of God for ever;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay liy namna, nisi jaŋ hay ɗerwelda vi Musus vok ir sumun kafe, nisi fi ɗot ala sa ma Levitna hiɗi sa Amonna as kal kalaf hay tokŋa vi Lawn noŋɗi,
Bulu: Melu mete be nga lañ e kalate Môze été, bôte bese be too, a koone ntilane na: MonʼAmonite a mone Môabite be nji yiane nyiin ésulane bôte Zambe,
Guiziga: Ti di nah, ara slufaka ɗerewol ngi Moyis a mbuŋ mizli gar, a tohoko anga na, Amoŋhoy ati Moˀapaya, t'anta cam ar jum ngi mizli ngi Buymisemuŋhoyo ta ndiɗaˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nyannde nde ɓe njaŋngani ummaatoore deftere Muusa, nder maare ɓe tawi ko winnda bana ni'i: “Ammooniijo koo Mo'abiijo meetataa nastugo jama'aare Allah sam,
Fulfulde_DC: Nyannde nde ɓe njaŋngani ummaatoore deftere Muusa, nder maare ɓe tawi ko winnda bana ni'i: “Ammooniijo koo Mo'abiijo meetataa nastugo jama'aare Allah sam,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi'i, wa tɔra mɔ zaŋ kalata ko Moisɛ ti dukbíí, ɓɛɛ wa kpa'e be Amɔŋ in be Mɔab beka ye zaŋ dukbíí ko Sɔ̧ na,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi'i, wa tɔra mɔ zaŋ kalata ko Moisɛ ti dukbíí, ɓɛɛ wa kpa'e be Amɔŋ in be Mɔab beka ye zaŋ dukbíí ko Sɔ̧ na,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma vəa ŋkwa shɛ, kwa jaŋga palepa ta Moyize mbeli kwa kema ta mbeli pɛtɛ ne, pa mbeli ntsate ŋkwa nya rafete geva ŋkɛ te: «Ka Amon le ka Mowab ne, kadzehwa tsene mbelia Shala tɛape we.»
Tupurri: Ti wur sen ni aè kal kee kefder mani Moyisn ne jar no, day aè raw da'ge ni ga je Amoñn wo de je Mowabn bay wo nen laage yoo tayge jar mani Baan wo wa hase,

Francais: parce qu'ils n'étaient pas venus au-devant des enfants d'Israël avec du pain et de l'eau, et parce qu'ils avaient payé contre eux Balaam pour qu'il les maudit; mais notre Dieu avait changé la malédiction en bénédiction.
Anglais: Because they met not the children of Israel with bread and with water, but hired Balaam against them, that he should curse them: howbeit our God turned the curse into a blessing.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay nisi may co ŋaf ir sa Israyella hiɗi funɗi hiɗi niynɗi kaw, kay nisi vul gurjuta mi Balaam kay nam beɗ sa Israyella, may Lawna vuma'a muɗ be'da goy bolda.
Bulu: amu be nji ke zu tôbane bone bʼIsraél be bili belet a mendim, a amu be nga kuse Balame na a yoʼé be: ve Zambe wongan a nga kôñelane biyoʼé bi bo bibotan.
Guiziga: Asi zleˀe ada na, Amoŋhoy ati Moˀapay a soko jam hirnga ti Israyeleye ti gwat ngi zum ati yam ngi si ta. Amma Moˀapaya jak ma na, a wurkaka Balaˀama, ɓa anja a nisa Israyeleye. Amma Buymisemuŋ ndra a mbiɗa nise, a tiri di ɗuwula mi jaka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ngam yaake ɓe potti bee Isra'iila'en, ɓe ngaddanaay ɓe nyaamdu e ndiyam, ammaa ɓe ndokki Balaama ceede ngam haa o naala ɓe. Ammaa Allah men laatini naaloore man barka .”
Fulfulde_DC: ngam yaake ɓe potti bee Isra'iila'en, ɓe ngaddanaay ɓe nyaamdu e ndiyam, ammaa ɓe ndokki Balaama ceede ngam haa o naala ɓe. Ammaa Allah men laatini naaloore man barka .”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wen wa ha̧ so yì in brɛt ha̧ o be  Israɛl  na. Wa yoɓa so Balam mɛ fom wa mbɛt, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ kpai fom'i nɛ̀ de yoŋgo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wen wa ha̧ so yì in brɛt ha̧ o be  Israɛl  na. Wa yoɓa so Balam mɛ fom wa mbɛt, ɓɛɛ Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ kpai fom'i nɛ̀ de yoŋgo.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa nza ŋkɛ vəashi ne, kekemaneve ka Israyɛl hɛ le ɗafa ba'a yɛmə we. Ɓiyitsa, ka Mowab shɛhɛ ka ŋkikɛ nda ke Balam kezha se ŋkɛ kabezla ka Israyɛl, ama pa Shala ta ɓəmə zhɛrete bezla kawəpi.
Tupurri: wer maga aà hay caa wo pel jar Israyel wo le de reege wo de bii gaa, day haç wo mopo go ne Balaam maga aà mo faë ra go ama Baa raw kol faëgen go diñ bosa'a.

Francais: Lorsqu'on eut entendu cette loi, on sépara d'Israël tous les étrangers.
Anglais: Now it came to pass, when they had heard the law, that they separated from Israel all the mixed multitude.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nisi hum vun-ma-gatna humna, nisi poŋ ir sa pulla kaf goy hiɗi sa Israyella.
Bulu: Eyoñ be nga wôʼô atiñ , be nga kandé Israél a bikule bise.
Guiziga: Israyeley tuwa, taŋ micinaka muslufaka Ɓimujuwa ngi Bumbulvuŋ nah na, a bam ti mizli Israyele migisiŋ gisiŋ tahaya gar avra.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde yimɓe nani umroore tawreeta nde'e, ɓe ngurtini jilligara'en fuu nder jama'aare Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde yimɓe nani umroore tawreeta nde'e, ɓe ngurtini jilligara'en fuu nder jama'aare Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ o bíí zia heembea'i kaɗi, wa foo o gɛnɛ yinɛ mgbara o be  Israɛl .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ o bíí zia heembea'i kaɗi, wa foo o gɛnɛ yinɛ mgbara o be  Israɛl .
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa fate ghena ta wəsə mahalegə nyagha ka Israyɛl ne, pa hɛ zəzəte kaŋka pɛtɛa kweci hwelefefi shave hwa ghəa nci.
Tupurri: De maga aè laa jag liñgin no kay aè raw caa äil Israyel wo go de waaren wo.

Francais: Avant cela, le prêtre Eliasib, qui avait l'intendance des chambres de la maison de notre Dieu et qui était allié de Tobie,
Anglais: And before this, Eliashib the priest, having the oversight of the chamber of the house of our God, was allied unto Tobiah:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jew van kayni, mul-ma-ɗifinna Eliyasib, ma ka musi kalaf hay ziyɗa vi Lawna vuma'a, namu mi sugol Tobiya,
Bulu: Nalé a ngenan te boban, Eliasib, ntuni a mbe ntelan e bitune bi nda bi Zambe wongan, a too fe évuvumane Tôbiya,
Guiziga: Dumbuŋ zleˀe na, a vulaka slra ngir viŋ ngi hay ngi Buymisemuŋ ndra le da Eliyasipe. Eliyasip i muy migweˀ ngi Tobiya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛti ha̧ mɔ‘i, wa hoka Eliasib wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mɛ de tom bɛr Tua ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ; a̧ nɛ́ nam ko Tobia.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛti ha̧ mɔ‘i, wa hoka Eliasib wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ mɛ de tom bɛr Tua ko Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ; a̧ nɛ́ nam ko Tobia.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te kwete və vəashi ne, nahe mbeli keveyi nde dzeghe Shala Ɛliyashib kawəndə nya te ghəa cɛ nyi vare ghɛa Shala ta ɓəmə. Ma kwa nza hɛ kamenə le Tobiya,
Tupurri: Go tañgu sen me' Eliyakib je mooben raw hayge go äil tiñ ma ti jeñ tiñ Baa wuur no, se hay diñ kaw Tobiya.

Francais: avait disposé pour ce dernier une grande chambre où l'on mettait auparavant les offrandes, l'encens, les ustensiles, la dîme du blé, du vin nouveau et de l'huile, la taxe des lévites, des chantres et des portiers, et ce qui était prélevé pour les prêtres.
Anglais: And he had prepared for him a great chamber, where aforetime they laid the meat offerings, the frankincense, and the vessels, and the tithes of the corn, the new wine, and the oil, which was commanded to be given to the Levites, and the singers, and the porters; and the offerings of the priests.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ki kayn nala ziyda kalafta ta ŋolda ta jewe lak haya slen ma vulda, urdina, jakŋa, gal-ma-doogona, vi alkamarena, vi vin ma jibetna hiɗi mula, slen ma hagata vuli kay vulum tam sa Levitna, sa gi nulla hiɗi sa ŋom vun-galana, hiɗi galla ma yawam goyo kay muliyan-sa-ɗifinna kaw, nam mus Tobiya haya'a.
Bulu: a nga ve nye beta étune nda , e vôme mimvean, ôtu, biôm mebelan, ngab awômô ya fôn, mfefé woon a mbon, biôm bi nga veban asu Belévit, beyia bia a bebaʼale mimbé, a biôm be nga vaa asu betuni bi nga taté bo bi tabeʼe.
Guiziga: Naŋ misi i muy naŋ migweˀ tuwa na, a ɗiyaŋ viŋ madiɗa, ar li mapam gwat ngi migamay ngi gi mikuli, mukuturɓuy, gazlangahay, mukuruˀ ngi alkamari, ngi mbaazla si ati mal, gwat mupula jiviɗ naŋ le ngi vul da Levihey, da mizli dimisey ati mijigina mizlingrehey, waɗ gwatay mawuɗam avu taŋ neˀneˀ ngi vul da masayay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Eliasib ɗafa so fara ha̧ a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ pɛsa bɛr-tua nɛ wa mɔi̧ so o ha̧a̧mɔ, fuu-nyama, o nyɛk, o zu alkamaari, zu dɔ̧ɔ̧ in zu nɔ̧́ si sɛnɛ. Mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ́ war mɔ nɛ o be Levii, o wi-bii-gima in o wi-pɛm-nú tua gú nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ kpa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Eliasib ɗafa so fara ha̧ a̧ sɛn kɔ̧ pɛsa bɛr-tua nɛ wa mɔi̧ so o ha̧a̧mɔ, fuu-nyama, o nyɛk, o zu alkamaari, zu dɔ̧ɔ̧ in zu nɔ̧́ si sɛnɛ. Mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ́ war mɔ nɛ o be Levii, o wi-bii-gima in o wi-pɛm-nú tua gú nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ kpa.
Kapsiki_DC: pa ŋkɛ ndeke nda cɛ nya wəba nya bete wəshi gəmə nyi kese te wəve, 'wərdə kwa hə hə ba'a wəshi kemene slene mbe ghɛa Shala mbeli mbe, tsagha wəshia ka dzeghe Shala ba'a kwa meŋe ta bela ta ha, ŋa tɛ mɛnɛfɛ le ŋa n'yi nyi keveyi geva tekeleke ke ka Lɛvi, ka gha cimə ba'a ka ya degha.
Tupurri: Wersen se raw 'wuçy tiñ naw ma kluu ne hene, diñ tiñ maga aè hay tañgu lag feçeçre maga aè haç ra wo ni mono, trusa no, de tasan wo, de dim coore ble no, dim yii ma defayn wo de dim noon wo ni mono. Sen hay na diñ tiñ maga aè hay haç faage äe ne jar Lefid wo, jar 'wad siñn wo de jar gor jag tiñn wo do mono diñ tiñ ma lag feçeçre maga aè caa nen sen go ma jar sië jagn wo mono.

Francais: Quand tout cela eut lieu, je n'étais point à Jérusalem; car, la trente deuxième année d'Artaxerxès, roi de Babylone, j'étais retourné près du roi.
Anglais: But in all this time was not I at Jerusalem: for in the two and thirtieth year of Artaxerxes king of Babylon came I unto the king, and after certain days obtained I leave of the king:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nan may hay Yerusalemɗi hay li ma slen kayni kaf li'e, kay nan ay hotay kat mulla Artakserses, mulla vi Babilon hay busata dok-ɦidi yam zleeŋe vi mulda valamu. Mulla vulan
Bulu: Me mbe momo Yérusalém éyoñe mam mete me nga boban, amu me nga beta bulan e be njô bôt, mbu mewôme lale a baa Artakzersés njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga too. Amané mbu, njô bôt
Guiziga: Hirak ti gwat tayna gar mucohom na, y'anta zleˀe a Zeruzaleme ta. Asi mike na, angi vi mizli ngir makir nga cuw naŋ ngi zumabuy ngi Artakzerses, buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ na, yi mi le zleˀe ng'avu buyo. Amma a dirba nah hin neˀ na, yi cufuɗ jiviɗ avu buyo
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i maajum mi walaaɗonno haa Urusaliima, ngam nder nduuɓu Artahasta, laamiiɗo Baabila, cappanɗe tati e ɗiɗaɓu, mi lortino haa maako. Ɓaawo wakkati seɗɗa mi tori mo duŋayeere dillugo fahin.
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i maajum mi walaaɗonno haa Urusaliima, ngam nder nduuɓu Artahasta, laamiiɗo Baabila, cappanɗe tati e ɗiɗaɓu, mi lortino haa maako. Ɓaawo wakkati seɗɗa mi tori mo duŋayeere dillugo fahin.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mi bo so kɔ‘m sɛn Jerusalɛm ŋgimbi'i na, wen mi sii so kɔ‘m ɗoŋ sɛn katɛ Artazɛrzɛs wannu Babilɔŋ tɛ ɓu-taar-zua-yiitoo pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧. Nɛ ɗoŋ tikiɗi, mi aka ɔma-tɛ er-a,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mi bo so kɔ‘m sɛn Jerusalɛm ŋgimbi'i na, wen mi sii so kɔ‘m ɗoŋ sɛn katɛ Artazɛrzɛs wannu Babilɔŋ tɛ ɓu-taar-zua-yiitoo pɛ-wan kɔ̧-a̧. Nɛ ɗoŋ tikiɗi, mi aka ɔma-tɛ er-a,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma vəa ŋkwa nya menete geva wəshia shɛhɛ ne, mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm 'ya we: nahe 'ya kelə ɗa sha Artasɛrsɛs, meghea Babilone te kwa mahekenemsə bakeghəmbe ta va ta ŋkɛ mbe meghe. Kwa sebe ta və ɓɛhwɛ, pa meghe ndeke ɗa hweŋkwa,
Tupurri: Ndi hay bay Jerusalem ni de maga feçeçre sen joñ wo mo wa, werga ndi hay fer wo go see wañ Artagserses wañ Babilon nen kiñgi ma de do swa' ti äog maga se hay joñ wañ mono. Go ti tawge kiñgin mono, wañ raw haç

Francais: Au bout de quelque temps, j'obtins du roi la permission de revenir à Jérusalem, et je m'aperçus du mal qu'avait fait Eliasib, en faveur de Tobie, en arrangeant une chambre pour lui dans les parvis de la maison de Dieu.
Anglais: And I came to Jerusalem, and understood of the evil that Eliashib did for Tobiah, in preparing him a chamber in the courts of the house of God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hagata kay nan hotay Yerusalem, iran cuk kay joota ta Eliyasib la'ta, hay li ma nam vul ziyda mi Tobiya hay wur-daŋŋa vi ziyda vi Lawna.
Bulu: a nga ve ma nguleya beta zu Yérusalém, éyoñe te nje me nga yene mbia jam Eliasib a nga bo na a ve Tôbiya étune nda ya minseñe nda Zambe.
Guiziga: joˀ yi mi nga Zeruzalem a muŋ. Akẽh na, yi pura malambaˀ Eliyasip miga zleˀe ti naŋ miɗiya viŋ da Tobiya a wazlaray hay ngi Buymisemuŋ na le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde mi warti Urusaliima, mi yi'i halleende nde Eliyasib waɗi, waato o hokki Tobiya suudu haa dalde haykaliiru Allah.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde mi warti Urusaliima, mi yi'i halleende nde Eliyasib waɗi, waato o hokki Tobiya suudu haa dalde haykaliiru Allah.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ mi si ɗoŋ si Jerusalɛm. Mi zɔka ɗaŋmɔ nɛ Eliasib dea tɛ ɗafa fara-ɔɔ ha̧ Tobia kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ mi si ɗoŋ si Jerusalɛm. Mi zɔka ɗaŋmɔ nɛ Eliasib dea tɛ ɗafa fara-ɔɔ ha̧ Tobia kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧.
